 orlando furioso

 "orlando enraged"




 ludovico ariosto

 introduction

 work continuation "orlando innamorato" matteo
 maria boiardo left unfinished upon author's death
 1494 begins less point boiardo left


 brief synopsis boiardo's work omitting
 numerous digressions incidental episodes associated
 events

 court king charlemagne comes angelica daughter
 king cathay india brother argalia angelica
 beautiful woman peers ever seen
 want however order take wife must first
 defeat argalia combat two stricken
 orlando ranaldo "rinaldo" rose

 argalia falls heathen knight ferrau angelica flees
  orlando ranaldo hot pursuit along way
 angelica ranaldo drink magic waters  angelica filled
 burning love ranaldo ranaldo indifferent

 eventually orlando ranaldo arrive angelica's castle
 others also gather angelica's castle including agricane king
 tartary sacripant king circassia agramante king
 africa marfisa "marphisa" rose asian warriorqueen
 except orlando ranaldo heathen

 meanwhile france threatened heathen invaders led king
 gradasso sericana whose principal reason going war
 obtain orlando's sword durindana king rodomonte
 sarzia holy war pagans christians ensues

 ranaldo leaves angelica's castle angelica
 lovesick chaste proper orlando set
 france search waters
 drunk time reverse  ranaldo burns
 angelica angelica indifferent ranaldo orlando
 begin fight king charlemagne fearing
 consequences two best knights kill combat
 intervenes promises angelica whichever two fights
 best heathen leaves care duke
 namus orlando ranaldo arrive paris time
 repulse attack agramante

 namus' camp overrun heathen angelica escapes
 ranaldo pursuit also pursuit ferrau
 defeated argalia considers angelica
 point poem breaks

 orlandoranaldoangelica triangle going
 stories knights loves mixed
 important female knight bradamante
 sister ranaldo falls love noble heathen
 knight named ruggiero "rogero" rose ruggiero said
 descendent alexander great hector also falls
 love bradamante fighting
 opposite sides felt love hopeless
 nevertheless prophecised shall wed found
 famous este line shall rise become one major
 families medieval renaissance italy worth noting
 estes patrons boiardo ariosto
 opposed prophecy atlantes african wizard seeks
 derail fate keep ruggiero becoming christian
 end poem ruggiero imprisoned atlantes' castle
 however bradamante decided follow heart
 pursuit love far away
 bradamanteruggiero story eventually takes center stage
 ariosto's work

 characters importance astolfo peer friend
 orlando kidnaped evil witch morgana sister
 alcina mandricardo fierce hotheaded heathen young
 knight named brandimarte falls love wins
 heart beautiful fiordelisa "flordelice" rose
 play major semimajor roles events ariosto's poem

 dbk

 *****************************************************************

 canto 1

 argument
 angelica pressing danger frights
 flies disorder greenwood shade
 rinaldo's horse escapes following fights
 ferrau spaniard forest glade
 second oath haughty paynim plights
 keeps better first made
 king sacripant regains longlost treasure
 good rinaldo mars promised pleasure



 loves ladies knights arms sing
 courtesies many daring feat
 ancient days story bring
 moors afric passed hostile fleet
 ravaged france agramant king
 flushed youthful rage furious heat
 king charles' roman emperor's head
 vowed due vengeance troyano dead

 ii
 strain roland tell
 things unattempted yet prose rhyme
 strange madness rank fury fell
 man esteemed wise former time
 like cruel pass well
 nigh brought feeble wit fain would climb
 hourly wastes sense concede skill
 strength daring promise fulfil

 iii
 good seed hercules give ear deign
 thou age's grace splendour art
 hippolitus smile upon pain
 tenders humble heart
 though hope quit score vain
 pen pages may pay debt part
 jealous eye offering scan
 scorn gifts give thee

 iv
 amid worthiest shalt thou hear
 fitting praise prepare grace
 record good rogero valiant peer
 ancient root thine illustrious race
 thou wilt lend willing ear
 worth warlike feats shall retrace
 thou thy graver cares little time
 postponing lend thy leisure rhyme

 v
 roland long lady catay
 angelica loved brand
 raised countless trophies damsel gay
 india median tartarian land
 westward measured back way
 nigh pyrenees many band
 germany france king charlemagne
 camped faithful host upon plain

 vi
 make king agramant penance smite
 cheek rash marsilius rue hour
 trained lance sword fight
 led africa swell power
 pushed fell despite
 realm france spain's martial flower
 'twas thus orlando came charles tented
 evil hour soon deed repented

 vii
 seized dame peerless charms
 often human judgment wanders wide
 long warfare kept harms
 western climes eastern shores guide
 land 'mid friends kindred arms
 without contest severed side
 fearing mischief kindled eyes
 prudent emperor reft prize

 viii
 bold orlando cousin free
 rinaldo late contended maid
 enamored beauty rare since
 alike glowing breast either swayed
 charles little liked rivalry
 drew omen thence feebler aid
 abate cause quarrel seized fair
 placed bavarian namus' care

 ix
 vowing warrior content
 conflict fatal day
 good hand gainful succour lent
 slew paynims martial fray
 counter hopes battle went
 thinned squadrons fled disarray
 namus christian captains taken
 pavilion rout forsaken

 x
 lodged charles gentle bonnibel
 ordained valiant victor's meed
 event sprung sell
 combat turned time need
 presaging wisely fortune would rebel
 fatal day christian creed
 entering thick wood discovered near
 close path horseless cavalier

 xi
 shield upon arm knightly wise
 belted mailed helmet head
 knight lightly forest hies
 halfclothed churl win cloth red
 cruel snake swiftly flies
 timid shepherdess startled tread
 poor angelica bridle turns
 approaching knight foot discerns

 xii
 paladin good aymon's seed
 mount albano command
 late baiardo lost gallant steed
 escaped strange adventure hand
 soon seen maid rode speed
 warrior knew yet distant scanned
 angelic features gentle air
 long held fast cupid's snare

 xiii
 affrighted damsel turns palfrey round
 shakes floating bridle wind
 panic seeks choose ground
 open grove prefers thicket blind
 reckless pale trembling astound
 leaves horse devious way find
 forest bore dame
 till sylvan river's bank came

 xiv
 stood fierce ferrau grisly plight
 begrimed dust bathed sweat blood
 lately withdrawn fight
 rest drink refreshing flood
 tarried despite
 since bending bank hasty mood
 dropped helmet crystal tide
 vainly regain treasure tried

 xv
 thither speed drives evermore
 wild panic utters fearful cries
 voice upleaping shore
 saracen lovely visage spies
 pale cheek troubled sore
 arriving quickly warrior's eyes
 though many days news shown
 beautiful angelica known

 xvi
 courteous haply gifted breast
 warm either cousins two
 bold brows steel dressed
 succour sought lent drew
 faulchion rinaldo pressed
 saw little fear champion true
 known sight
 proved arms foeman's might

 xvii
 thus foot warriors vie
 cruel strife blade blade oppose
 marvel plate brittle mail fly
 anvils stood deafening blows
 behoves palfrey swift ply
 feet knights combat close
 vexed utmost speed goading spurs
 waste wood frighted damsel stirs

 xviii
 two struggled long throw
 strife vainly still
 since neither valiant warrior
 opposite force knightly skill
 first parley spanish foe
 good master albano's hill
 one within whose raging breast pent
 reckless fire struggled vent

 xix
 "thou think'st" said "to injure alone
 know thou wilt thyself much molest
 fight yon rising sun
 raging heat kindled thy breast
 thy gain guerdon
 though yield life stoop crest
 shall never thy glorious meed
 flies vainly battle bleed

 xx
 "then much better since stake's
 thou loving like should'st mount stay
 wait battle's end lovely dame
 fly yet way
 lady taken repeat claim
 naked faulchion peerless prey
 else long toil see gain
 simple loss unrequited pain"

 xxi
 peer's proposal pleased paynim well
 hot contention foregone
 fair truce replaced discord fell
 mutual wrongs forgot mischief done
 departure seated sell
 foot spaniard left aymon's son
 mount courser's crupper prayed
 united chased royal maid

 xxii
 oh goodly truth cavaliers old
 rivals different faith bred
 yet weary warriors' wounds cold 
 still smarting strokes fell dread
 yet together ride waste wold
 unsuspecting devious dingle thread
 four spurs infest foaming sides
 courser brings way divides

 xxiii
 warlike pair fault
 knew might palfrey goad
 since without distinction survey
 recent print hoofs either road
 commit chase fortune way
 paynim pricked rinaldo strode
 fierce ferrau bewildered wood
 found late stood

 xxiv
 beside water stoop'd drink
 dropt knightly helmet  cost
 sunk stream since could think
 retrieve late hopes crossed
 treasure fell descends brink
 swift stream seeks morion lost
 casque lies bedded sands
 'twill ask light endeavour hands

 xxv
 bough severs neighbouring tree
 shreds shapes branch pole
 sounds stream anxiously
 fathoms rakes ransacks shelf hole
 angered sore heart restless
 lingered troubled waters roll
 breasthigh mid river rose upright
 apparition angry knight

 xxvi
 armed points except head
 better hand helmet bore
 casque river's bed
 ferrau sought vainly toiling long sore
 upon spanish knight frowned said
 "thou traitor thy word thou perjured moor
 grieve goodly helmet resign
 due long since justly mine

 xxvii
 "remember pagan thine arm laid low
 brother angelica knight
  thy word plighted throw
 arms helmet bright
 fortune compel thee forego
 prize thy despite
 grieve rather grieve thou
 art found perjured traitor thy vow

 xxviii
 "but thou seek'st helmet thy task
 win wear thy renown
 noble prize good orlando's casque
 rinaldo's yet fairer crown
 almontes' mambrino's iron masque
 make one force arms thine
 good helm fitly bestowed
 thy promise long owed"

 xxix
 bristled paynim's every hair view
 grim shade uprising tide
 vanished fresh healthful hue
 lips halfformed accents died
 next hearing argalia slew
 warrior hight stream beside
 thus unknightly breach promise blame
 burned flushed rage shame

 xxx
 time falsehood excuse
 knowing well true phantom's lore
 stood speechless remorse words infuse
 lanfusa's life warrior swore
 never fight foray would use
 helmet good orlando bore
 aspramont bold almontes paid
 life forfeit christian blade

 xxxi
 new vow discharged faithfully
 vain promise whilom plight
 stream departing heavily
 many days sore vexed grieved sprite
 still intent seek orlando
 roved wheresoe'er hoped find knight
 different lot befel rinaldo
 chanced another pathway pursue

 xxxii
 far warrior fared ere spied
 bounding across path gallant steed
 "stay bayardo mine" rinaldo cried
 "too cruel care loss thee breed"
 horse returned side
 deaf prayer flew better speed
 furious chase rinaldo hies
 follow angelica flies

 xxxiii
 dreary woods dark damsel fled
 rude unharboured heath savage height
 every leaf spray rustled bred
 oak elm beech new affright
 foaming palfrey sped
 strange crooked paths furious flight
 shadow seen valley blind
 mountain feared rinaldo behind

 xxxiv
 young roe fawn fallow deer
 mid shelter native glade
 seen hungry pard tiger tear
 bosom bleeding dam dismayed
 bounds forest green ceaseless fear
 destroying beast shade shade
 sapling touched amid pangs
 believes monster's fangs

 xxxv
 one day night half following day
 damsel wanders wide whither knows
 enters deep wood whose branches play
 moved lightly freshening breeze blows
 two clear murmuring rivers stray
 upon banks fresher herbage grows
 twin streams passage slowly clear
 make music stones please ear

 xxxvi
 weening removed way wends
 thousand miles loathed rinaldo's beat
 rest maid intends
 wearied long flight summer's heat
 saddle 'mid spring flowers descends
 takes bridle courser fleet
 loose along river lets pass
 roving banks search lusty grass

 xxxvii
 behold hand thicket surveys
 gay flowering thorn vermeil rose
 tuft reflected stream strays
 beside overshadowing oaks enclose
 hollow within safe vulgar gaze
 seemed place constructed repose
 bows interwoven light
 pierced tangled screen far less sight

 xxxviii
 within soft moss herbage form bed
 delay rest traveller woo
 'twas limbs weary damsel spread
 eyeballs bathed slumber's balmy dew
 little time eased drooping head
 ere weened courser's tramp knew
 softly rises river near
 armed capapie beholds cavalier

 xxxix
 friend foe nothing comprehends
 hope fear doubting bosom tear
 adventure's issue mute attends
 even sigh disturbs air
 cavalier upon bank descends
 sits motionless lost care
 visage propt upon arm sight
 changed senseless stone appeared knight

 xl
 pensive hour drooping head
 rested mute ere began moan
 piteous tale sorrow said
 lamenting soft sweet tone
 tiger's breast pity bred
 mournful wailings rent stone
 sighed wept like rivers flowed
 tears bosom like aetna glowed

 xli
 "thought makes burn freeze hate
 gnaws heart rankles root
 what's left me" said "arrived late
 one favoured bears away fruit
 bare words looks scarce cheered hopeless state
 prime spoils reward another's suit
 since fruit blossom hangs
 longer pine hopeless pangs

 xlii
 "the virgin image rose
 sheltered garden native stock
 solitude safe repose
 blooms unapproached sheperd flock
 earth teems freshening water flows
 breeze dewy dawn sweets unlock
 wistful youth bosom dresses
 enamored damsel braids tresses

 xliii
 "but wanton hands sooner displace
 maternal stem grown
 withered whatsoever grace
 found man heaven bloom beauty gone
 damsel hold higher place
 light life flower
 suffering spoiler's hand crop prize
 forfeits worth every other's eyes

 xliv
 "and cheap except wight
 large boon bestow
 ah false cruel fortune foul despite
 others triumph drown'd woe
 treasure slight
 life forego
 let die 'twere happiness
 longer life must cease love"

 xlv
 ask made sorrowing
 pour'd stream many tears
 answer fair circassia's king
 sacripant oppressed amorous cares
 love source troubles spring
 sole occasion pains fears
 lover's service paid
 well remembered royal maid

 xlvi
 sake orient's farthest reign
 roved thither sun descends rest
 told india pain
 orlando followed west
 learned france charlemagne
 secluded champion rest
 fit guerdon mewed knight
 protect lilies best fight

 xlvii
 warrior field viewed
 short time king charlemagne's disgrace
 vainly angelica pursued
 damsel's footsteps found trace
 weeping monarch rued
 bewailed doleful case
 hence words lamentations run
 might pity stop passing sun

 xlviii
 sacripant laments plight
 makes tepid fountain eyes
 deem needful recite
 pours forth yet plaints piteous cries
 propitious fortune lady bright
 hear youth lament wise
 thus moment compassed without
 chance long ages brought

 xlix
 deep attention warrior weeps
 marks fashion grief tears
 words whose passion never sleeps
 first confession hears
 plaint heart measure keeps
 cold column builder rears
 like haughty maid holds
 world deems none worthy love

 l
 harm amid woods keep
 damsel weened might guidance need
 poor drowning caitiff chindeep
 implores help obstinate indeed
 let occasion sleep
 find escort stand stead
 king long experience knew
 lovers kind true

 li
 maid intends
 heal mischief charms wrought
 past ills furnish glad amends
 full bliss pining lover sought
 keep king play ends
 help device fiction bought
 purpose taxed daring
 reassume wont haughty bearing

 lii
 apparition bright unforeseen
 stood like venus diana fair
 solemn pageant issuing scene
 shadowy wood murky lair
 "peace you" cried youthful queen
 "and god preserve honour care
 suffer blindly entertain
 opinion fame false vain"

 liii
 wonderment mother eyes
 excessive bliss son mourned
 dead lamented still tears sighs
 since thinned files without boy returned
  rapture king's surprise
 ecstasy joy discerned
 lofty presence cheeks heavenly hue
 lovely form broke upon view

 liv
 full fond eager passion pressed
 towards lady divinity
 clasped warrior breast
 catay haply less free
 maid thoughts addressed
 towards native land empery
 feels hope revived bosom beat
 shortly repossess sumptuous seat

 lv
 chances damsel said
 since eastward sent sericane
 seek martial monarch's aid
 swayed sceptre fair domain
 told oft orlando's friendly blade
 saved dishonour death pain
 preserved virgin flower
 pure blossomed natal hour

 lvi
 haply tale true yet seem
 likely one sober sense possessed
 sacripant waked worser dream
 without cavil acquiesced
 since love sees without one guiding gleam
 spies broad day likes best
 one sign afflicted man's disease
 give ready faith things please

 lvii
 "if good anglante's lord prize forbore
 seized fair occasion might
 loss fortune never
 enjoy fair prize invite
 imitate lord little lore
 think not" said apart circassa's knight
 "to quit proffered good shame
 afterthought blame

 lviii
 "no pluck fresh morning rose
 tarry may overblown
 woman experience shows
 deed sweet welcome done
 whatsoever scorn damsel shows
 though awhile may weep make moan
 unchecked anger false true
 sharp repulse bold design pursue"

 lix
 said soft assault prepares
 loud noise within greenwood shade
 beside rang astounded ears
 sore monarch stayed
 donned helm arms wears
 aye wont rove steel belted blade
 replaced bridle courser fleet
 grappled lance sprang seat

 lx
 bold semblance valiant knight
 behold warrior threads forest hoar
 stranger's mantle snowy white
 white alike waving plume wore
 balked bliss full fell despite
 monarch ill interruption bore
 spurred horse meet mid space
 hate fury glowing face

 lxi
 defies fight approaching nigh
 weens make stoop haughty crest
 knight whose worth rate high
 warlike prowess puts present test
 cuts short haughty threats angry cry
 spurs lays levelled lance rest
 tempest wheels circassia's valiant peer
 foeman's head aims spear

 lxii
 brindled bulls tawny lions spring
 forest warfare deadly
 two knights stranger king
 spears alike opposing bucklers thrill
 solid ground encountering
 trembles fruitful vale naked hill
 well mail dressed
 bodies proof saved breast

 lxiii
 swerved chargers destined course
 met like rams butted head head
 warlike saracen's illfated horse
 well valued alive dropt short dead
 stranger's fell senseless perforce
 roused rowel grassy bed
 paynim king extended straight
 lay battered lord weight

 lxiv
 upright upon steed knight unknown
 encounter horse rider threw
 deeming enough conflict done
 cares worthless warfare renew
 endlong readiest path gone
 measures pricking frith forest
 mile little less furious heat
 ere foiled saracen regains feet

 lxv
 bewildered astonished clown
 held plough thunder storm o'erpast
 deafening bolt beat
 nigh deathstricken cattle wakes aghast
 sees distant pine without crown
 saw clad leafy honours last
 rose paynim knight troubled face
 maid spectatress cruel case

 lxvi
 sighs groans yet mischief sore
 endured wounded arm foot bled
 mere shame never
 dyed cheek deep red
 rued fall grieved
 dame lift courser dead
 speechless remained ween
 prisoned tongue voice set free

 lxvii
 "grieve not" said "sir monarch thy fall
 let blame upon thy courser
 welcome forage stall
 rest joust jeopardy
 well thy foe loser may call
 shall glory gain
 first quit ground aught
 angelica fighting fields taught"

 lxviii
 seeks saracen cheer
 behold messenger pouch horn
 panting hackney  man horse appear
 long journey weary forlorn
 questions sacripant approaching near
 seen warrior pass borne
 shield crest white search
 wide forest pricked weary groom

 lxix
 king sacripant made answer "as see
 threw went way
 tell warrior's name may
 informed whose valour foiled fray"
 groom  "that ask
 shall relate without delay
 know combat prostrate laid
 tried valour gentle maid

 lxx
 "bold maid fairer yet bold
 redoubted virgin's name veil
 'twas bradamant marred praise old
 prowess ever sword mail"
 said spurred story told
 left little gladdened tale
 recks says shame
 flushed visage kindles flame

 lxxi
 woeful warrior long thought
 upon cruel case still vain
 found woman defeat wrought
 thinking increased monarch's pain
 climbed horse spake aught
 silently uplifted plain
 upon croup bestowed damsel sweet
 reserved gladder use safer seat

 lxxii
 two miles rode hear
 sweeping woods spread sound
 loud crash trample far near
 forest seemed tremble around
 shortly see steed appear
 housings wrought gold richly bound
 clears bush stream furious force
 whatsoever else impedes course

 lxxiii
 "unless misty air" damsel cries
 "and boughs deceive sight yon noble steed
 sure bayardo us flies
 parts wood impetuous speed
  yes 'tis bayardo's self recognize
 well courser understands need
 two riders ill foundered jade would bear
 hither speeds horse end care"

 lxxiv
 bold circassian lighted applied
 hand seize flowing rein
 swiftly turning heels replied
 like lightning wheeled upon plain
 woe king leaps aside
 smite would lash vain
 bone sinew shock
 good heels split metal rock

 lxxv
 maid goes submissively
 gentle blandishment humble mood
 dog greets lord frolic glee
 short season past viewed
 good bayardo memory
 albracca hands prepared food
 time damsel loved rinaldo bold
 rinaldo ungrateful stern cold

 lxxvi
 left hand takes bit
 pats sides chest
 good steed marvellous wit
 lamblike obeyed damsel caressed
 meantime king sees moment fit
 leapt knees courser pressed
 palfrey eased half weight
 lady left croup gained seat

 lxxvii
 hazard directs sight
 sounding arms man foot espies
 glows sudden anger despite
 son aymon eyes
 life esteems youthful knight
 like crane falcon flies
 time lady sighed passion slighted
 'tis rinaldo loves ill requited

 lxxviii
 effect two different fountains wrought
 whose wonderous waters different moods inspire
 spring arden rare virtue fraught
 fills heart amorous desire
 taste fountain untaught
 love change ice former fire
 rinaldo drank first vainly sighs
 angelica last hates flies

 lxxix
 mixed secret bane waters glide
 amorous care convert sudden hate
 maid sooner rinaldo spied
 laughing eyes deep darkness sate
 sad mien trembling voice cried
 sacripant prayed wait
 near approach detested knight
 wood pursue flight

 lxxx
 saracen anger hot
 "is knightly worship sunk low
 thou should'st hold valour cheap
 sufficient make yonder champion flee
 already albracca's fights forgot
 dread night singly stood thee
 night though naked thy shield
 king agrican field"

 lxxxi
 answers knows fear
 'tis rinaldo nigh
 afar furious cavalier
 threats bold saracen angry cry
 soon known steed damsel dear
 whose charms flame kindled meet eye
 ensued haughty pair
 another canto shall declare


 canto 2

 argument
 hermit parts means hollow sprite
 two redoubted rivals' dangerous play
 rinaldo goes love hope invite
 dispatched charles another way
 bradamont seeking devoted knight
 good rogero nigh becomes prey
 pinabel drops damsel brave
 dungeon living grave



 injurious love still mar accord
 desires thy favourite feat
 please thee perfidious lord
 two hearts different measure beat
 thou wilt let take certain ford
 dragging stream deep fleet
 abandon love desires
 hates respect love inspires

 ii
 thou rinaldo show'st damsel fair
 seems hideous gentle dame
 lady's pride care
 paid back deepest hate amorous flame
 pines victim despair
 scorned turn reward
 changed damsel sort abhorred
 would choose death hated lord

 iii
 pagan cries "forego thy theft
 false felon pilfer'd steed
 wont let reft
 seeks dearly pays deed
  shall take thee yon lovely weft
 leave thee prize foul misdeed
 horse maid whose worth outstrips belief
 ill methinks relinquished thief"

 iv
 "thou liest" haughty saracen retorts
 proud burning fierce flame
 "a thief thyself fame truth reports
 let good deeds decide dubious claim
 steed damsel fair assorts
 best proved valiant deeds though dame
 nothing precious thee
 search wide world throughout may well agree"

 v
 two fierce dogs somtimes stand gaze
 hate springs strife inspire
 grind teeth foe surveys
 sidelong glance eyes red fire
 either falls bites hoarsely bays
 stiff bristles stand end ire
 reproach menace sword
 pass sacripant clermont's angry lord

 vi
 thus kindling wrath knights engage
 one foot horse
 small gain inexperienced page
 would better rein charger course
 baiardo's sense wage
 war master put force
 voice hand manage stir
 rebellious rein goading spur

 vii
 king would urge takes rest
 curbs runs giddy rings
 drops head beneath spreading chest
 plays spine runs anend flings
 furious saracen distressed
 sees 'tis time tame beast springs
 one hand pummel ground
 clear restless courser bound

 viii
 soon sacripant welltimed leap
 fury bayardo freed
 may believe battle sleep
 champions matched heart deed
 sounding blades changeful measure keep
 hammerstrokes vulcan less speed
 descend dim cavern heats
 jove's red thunders anvil beats

 ix
 sometimes lunge feign thrust parry
 deep masters desperate game play
 rise upon furious stroke carry
 swords aloft stoop stand bay
 close exhausted tarry
 hide show give way
 one knight inch ground granted
 foeman's foot upon inch planted

 x
 lo rinaldo impatient grown
 strikes full sacripant lifted blade
 puts forth buckler made bone
 well strong stubborn steel inlaid
 though passing thick fusberta cleaves groan
 greenwood covert close sunny glade
 paynim's arm rings senseless blow
 steel bone like ice shivers go

 xi
 fair damsel saw timid eye
 ruin follow faulchion's sway
 like criminal whose doom nigh
 changed fair countenance sore dismay
 deemed little time left fly
 would rinaldo's prey
 rinaldo loathed much
 doats scornful damsel miserably

 xii
 turned horse gloomy chase
 drove rough path tangled ally
 oftentimes bent back bloodless face
 saw rinaldo thicket sally
 flying long urged frantic race
 met hermit valley
 devotion aspect expressed
 long beard descended breast

 xiii
 wasted much fasts age
 ass mounted slow sure
 visage warranted never sage
 conscience precise passing pure
 though arteries time stilled rage
 blood spake feeble demure
 sight delighted damsel
 inly stirred charity

 xiv
 lady prayed kindly friar
 would straight conduct near
 land france might flee
 never loathed rinaldo hear
 hermit skilled sorcery
 ceased soothe gentle damsel's fear
 promise deliverance shook
 pocket drew forth secret book

 xv
 opened quick mighty marvel wrought
 leaf finished sage
 spirit bidding brought
 waits command likeness page
 magic writ constrained taught
 hastes warriors face face engage
 cool shade  cool disport 
 steps stops battle short

 xvi
 "in courtesy" cried "let either show
 foe's death either avail
 guerdon conquest bestow
 battle shall prevail
 roland though struck blow
 snapt fight single link mail
 paristown conveys damsel gay
 engaged bitter fray

 xvii
 "within easy mile saw peer
 pricking paris lady bright
 riding merry mood laugh jeer
 mocking fierce fruitless fight
 sure better yet near
 follow peer damsel flight
 paris place prize
 lady never shall meet eyes"

 xviii
 might seen angry cavaliers
 change demon's tale rage shame
 curse wanting eyes ears
 let rival cheat dame
 towards horse good rinaldo steers
 breathing forth piteous sighs seem flame
 joins orlando  ere part 
 swears fury heart

 xix
 passing prompt bayardo stood
 leaps back leaves swift wind
 without farewell rival wood
 much less invites seat behind
 goaded charger heat blood
 forces whate'er eager course confined
 ditch river tangled thorn marble block
 swims river clears rock

 xx
 let sir sound strangely ear
 rinaldo took steed thus readily
 long vainly followed far near
 endued reasoning faculty
 vice lured following peer
 fled cherished lord
 might guide whither went gentle dame
 heard nursed flame

 xxi
 angelica random dread
 pavilion winged rapid flight
 bayardo marked damsel fled
 saddle lightened mount alban's knight
 foot equal combat sped
 matched baron meaner might
 chased maid woods floods strands
 hopes place warrior's hands

 xxii
 desire bring maid
 gallopped still rampant play
 would let master mount afraid
 might make take another way
 luring rinaldo shade
 twice brought unexpected prey
 twice foiled endeavour bold
 ferrau sacripant lately told

 xxiii
 good bayardo believed tiding
 fair damsel produced accord
 devil's cunning tale confiding
 renewed wonted service lord
 behold rinaldo fury riding
 pushing still courser parisward
 though fly fast champion's wishes go
 faster wind seemed slow

 xxiv
 night rinaldo rests steed pain
 meet anglante's lord burned sore
 lent credit tidings vain
 false courier wizard hoar
 day next flowing rein
 rode till royal city rose
 eyes charlemagne taken post
 sad remnant broken host

 xxv
 fears afric king's pursuit
 sap siege upon vassals calls
 gather fresh victual recruit
 cleanse ditches repair walls
 may best annoy foes suit
 safety without delay forestalls
 plans embassy england thence
 gather fresher forces defence

 xxvi
 bent try fate
 arms tented field though lately shamed
 send rinaldo neighbouring state
 britain england named
 ill liked paladin cross strait
 people land blamed
 king charles sudden day
 would grant valiant envoy delay

 xxvii
 rinaldo never executed thing
 less willingly prevented quest
 fair visage following
 whose charms heart ravished breast
 yet obediance christian king
 prepared royal hest
 calais good envoy wends speed
 day embarks steed

 xxviii
 scorn cautious pilot's skill
 impatience regain home
 launched doubtful sea boded ill
 rolled heavy billows white foam
 wind enraged opposed
 stirred waves 'mid gathering gloom
 loud storm tempest's fury grew
 topmasthigh flashing waters flew

 xxix
 watchful mariners wary sort
 haul mainsail attempt wear
 would put back panic port
 whence ill hour loosed little care
  "not so" exclaims wind stops short
 "so poor penance pay dare"
 fain would veer fiercer roar
 pelts back reeling prow blusters

 xxx
 starboard larboard bears fitful gale
 never thought ire assuages
 strained vessel drives humble sail
 billows tempest rages
 still pursue varying tale
 must leave awhile paladin wages
 weary warfare wind flood
 follow fair virgin blood

 xxxi
 speak famed damsel whose spear
 o'erthrown king sacripant earth flung
 worthy sister valiant peer
 beatrix good duke aymon sprung
 daring deeds puissance less dear
 charlemagne france since proved among
 first prowess tried many test
 equal good rinaldo's shone confessed

 xxxii
 cavalier suitor dame
 afric passed agramant
 rogero valiant father's name
 mother child agolant
 bear lion came
 disdained child love plant
 though cruel fortune ill wishes meeting
 granted pair single greeting

 xxxiii
 alone thenceforth sought lover
 named owed birth
 roved safe company
 thousands trusting single worth
 made king circassy
 salute visage old mother earth
 traversed wood wood past mountain
 stopt length beside lovely fountain

 xxxiv
 delicious mead fountainrill
 ancient trees o'ershaded glides away
 whose ear pleasing murmurs fill
 invites drink banks stay
 left side cultivated hill
 excludes fervors middle day
 first damsel thither turns eyes
 youthful cavalier seated spies

 xxxv
 cavalier underneath shade
 seems lost melancholy dream
 bank gaudy flowers displayed
 reposing overhangs crystal stream
 horse beneath spreading beech laid
 bough shield helmet gleam
 moist eyes sad downcast air
 speak broken victim despair

 xxxvi
 urged passion lodged every breast
 restless curiosity know
 others' cares gentle maid addressed
 knight sought occasion woe
 secret grief confessed
 gentle speech courteous show
 gallant bearing sight
 prepared saw nimble knight

 xxxvii
 "fair sir band horse foot" said
 "i brought charlemagne thither pressed
 ambush marsilius spread
 descending pyrenean crest
 company damsel led
 whose charms fervid love fired breast
 journey rhone's current
 rider winged courser spy

 xxxviii
 "the robber whether man shade
 goblin damned everlasting woe
 soon beheld dearloved maid
 like falcon descending aims blow
 sank thought rose soaring laid
 hands prize snatched
 quick rape appeared dream
 heard air damsel's scream

 xxxix
 "the ravening kite swoops plunders
 hovering shelterd yard spies
 helpless chicken near unwatchful hen
 vainly dins thief cries
 cannot reach mountainrobber's den
 compassed cliffs follow one flies
 besides wayfoundered weary steed
 'mid rocks wasted wind speed

 xl
 "but like one bleeding side
 would liefer far seen heart outtorn
 left good squadrons masterless ride
 along cliffs passes least forlorn
 took way love served guide
 appeared ruthless thief born
 ascending den lovely prey
 time snatched hope peace away

 xli
 "six days rode morn setting sun
 horrid cliff bottom dark drear
 giddy precipice path none
 sign vestiges man near
 last dark barren vale
 caverned mountains rude cliffs appear
 middle rose rugged block
 fair castle planted rock

 xlii
 "from far shone like flame seemed dight
 marble brick eye
 wonderful work fair sight
 walls appeared approached nigh
 learned built sprite
 potent fumes raised sorcery
 rock towers steel fix
 casehardened stream fire styx

 xliii
 "each polished turret shines ray
 defies mouldering rust rain
 robber scours country night day
 harbours sure domain
 nothing safe would bear away
 pursued curses threats vain
 fruitless every hope foil art
 felon keeps love oh say heart

 xliv
 "alas left eye
 prison cliff's aerial crest
 like shefox hears offspring cry
 standing beneath ravening eagle's nest
 since wings rise fly
 runs round rugged rock hopeless quest
 inaccessible wild dominion
 whatsoever plume pinion

 xlv
 "while lingered rocks aspire
 saw dwarf guide two goodly strain
 whose coming added hope desire
 alas desire hope alike vain
 barons bold fearful ire
 one gradasso king sericane
 next youthful vigour knight
 prized moorish court rogero hight

 xlvi
 "the dwarf exclaimed `these champions assay
 force dwells yonder steep
 strange unattempted way
 spurs winged courser mountainkeep'
 approaching warriors say
 `pity fair sirs cruel loss weep
 trust yon daring spoiler slain
 give lost lady arms again'

 xlvii
 "then love ravished make known
 vouching bitter tears deep distress
 proffer aid path stone
 winds craggy mountain press
 upon summit left alone
 look pray god success
 beneath wily wizard's castle strong
 extends little plain two bowshots long

 xlviii
 "arrived beneath craggy keep two
 contend warrior shall begin fight
 whether first lot gradasso drew
 young rogero held honor light
 king sericane bugle blew
 rock rang fortress height
 lo apparelled fearful course
 cavalier upon winged horse

 xlix
 "upwards little little springs
 winged courser pilgrim crane
 finds first balance wings
 running scarcely rising plain
 flock launched scattered flings
 pinions wind soars amain
 straight necromancer's upward flight
 eagle scarce attempts bold height

 l
 "when seems fit wheels courser round
 shuts wings falling sky
 shoots like well trained falcon ground
 sees quarry duck pigeon fly
 parting air whizzing sound
 rested lance darted high
 gradasso scarcely marks foe
 hears swooping near feels blow

 li
 "the wizard gradasso breaks spear
 wounds empty air fury vain
 feathered monster breeds fear
 distance shifts swoops
 encounter made alfana rear
 thrown back upon haunches plain
 alfana indian monarch rode
 fairest ever man bestrode

 lii
 "up starry sphere swift ascent
 wizard soars pounces sky
 strikes young rogero intent
 upon gradasso deems danger nigh
 beneath wizard's blow warrior bent
 made deal generous courser ply
 smite shifting foe turned
 sky reach discerned

 liii
 "his blows rogero gradasso bruise
 forehead bosom back flanks
 warrior's empty blows eschews
 shifting quickly scarce seen
 wizard seems choose
 monster makes spacious rings clean
 enchanter deceives knights
 view know whence smites

 liv
 "between two earth o' sky
 hour warfare lasted
 spreading wide veil dusky dye
 throughout world discolours things fair
 beheld say add
 tittle tale yet scarcely dare
 tell stood saw
 strange seems passing nature's law

 lv
 "well covered goodly silken case
 celestial warrior bore shield
 delayed mantle displace
 know lucid orb concealed
 since sooner blazes face
 foe tumbles dazzled field
 like lifeless body lies
 becomes necromancer's helpless prize

 lvi
 "like carbuncle magic buckler blazed
 glare ever seen shone bright
 could warriors choose fall amazed
 blinded clear dazzling light
 distant mountain gazed
 fell senseless regained sight
 long time saw neither knights page
 aught beside dark empty stage

 lvii
 "this fell enchanter supposed
 dragged warriors prisoncell
 strange virtue shield disclosed
 hope freedom fell
 thus turrets enclosed
 heart departing bade last farewell
 sum griefs say love combine
 distress grief match mine"

 lviii
 knight relapsed first disease
 melancholy tale done
 count pinabel maganzese
 anselmo d'altaripa's faithless son
 blood ran foul degrees
 disdained virtuous one
 played simple part among base
 passing vice villains race

 lix
 aspect changing still beauteous dame
 hears mournful maganzese narrates
 first mention rogero's name
 radiant face eager joy dilates
 full pity kindles flame
 pinabel cruel durance states
 finds though twice told story stale
 makes oft repeat piece tale

 lx
 deemed clear
 cried knight "repose upon say
 thee may arrival well dear
 thou fortunate account day
 straight wend keep sir cavalier
 holds jewel rich ray
 shalt thou grudge thy labour thy care
 envious fortune play fair"

 lxi
 knight replied "then nought remains
 yonder mountainpasses show
 sure 'tis little loss lose pains
 every thing lost prize
 would climb yon cliffs gains
 find prisonhouse
 whate'er betide blame alone
 go forewarned meet fate foreshown"

 lxii
 said cavalier remounts horse

 raised standard castile
 acquamorta siding moor

 protect straightened shore
 citizens demand
 counsel comfort captain's hand

 lxiv
 goodly town many miles plain
 lie 'twixt var rhone upon sea
 given royal charlemagne
 trust placed fidelity
 still wont wonder tented plain
 prowess valiant maid see
 panting courier said
 rode marseilles ask lady's aid

 lxv
 whether call obey
 youthful damsel doubts little space
 strong one balance fame duty weigh
 softer thoughts fame duty chase
 length resolved emprize assay
 free rogero enchanted place
 valour adventure fail
 would cherished lover share jail

 lxvi
 excuse post appay
 contented wait
 turned bridle resume way
 pinabel seemed whit elate
 since line knows damsel gay
 held open secret hate
 future trouble foresees
 detected maganzese

 lxvii
 'twixt maganza's old clermont's line
 ancient deadly feud
 oft blows rival houses came
 oft civil blood hands embrued
 hence treason gentle dame
 foul heart wicked county brewed
 first occasion served would stray
 road leave way

 lxviii
 traitor's troubled fancy rack
 fear doubt native rancorous mood
 unawares issued track
 found within gloomy wood

 whose stony peak forest stood
 daughter dodona's duke behind
 dogging footsteps thicket blind

 lxix
 saw within brake
 thought abandon unweeting foe
 dame  " 'twere better make
 shelter ere gathering darkness grow
 yonder mountain past save mistake

 expect peak
 measure remembered place seek"

 lxx
 said pushed courser height
 lone mountain evil mind
 revolving went scheme sleight
 rid gentle dame behind
 lo rocky cavern met sight
 amid precipices dark blind
 sides descended thirty yards
 worked smooth bottom door

 lxxi
 void bottom wide
 portal conducted inner room
 thence light shone every side
 torch illumining gloom
 fair bradamant pursued faithless guide
 suspended pondering doom
 came upon felon stood
 fearing lest might lose wood

 lxxii
 approach county's first intent
 made vain wily traitor sought mend
 toils new stratagem invent
 rid thence bring end
 meet approaching lady went
 showed cave prayed ascend
 said bottom seen
 gentle damsel bewitching mien

 lxxiii
 lovely semblance rich vest
 appeared lady mean degree
 melancholy weeping distressed
 one pined captivity
 towards entrance pressed
 learn unhappy maid might
 one melancholy damsel flew
 within inner cavern drew

 lxxiv
 beauteous bradamant bold
 wary gave ready ear bent
 help maid imprisoned hold

 lopt long branch shaped sword

 lxxv
 severed end count commended

 lxxvi
 pinabel
 cruel lot fair bradamant assayed
 striking bottom cell
 stout elmbough long weight upstayed
 though split splintered fell
 broked fall saved gentle maid
 astounded lady lay
 ensuing canto display


 canto 3

 argument
 restored sense beauteous bradamant
 finds sage melissa vaulted tomb
 hears many famous plant
 warrior shall issue womb
 next release rogero haunt
 old atlantes learns groom
 brunello hight virtuous ring take
 thus knight's others' fetters break



 vouchsafe voice shall ascend
 high would raise noble theme
 afford befitting words lend
 wings verse soar pitch scheme
 since fiercer fire illustrious end
 wont may well song beseem
 fair portion lord due
 sings sires lineage grew

 ii
 whose fair line 'mid heavenly grace
 chosen minister earth
 see phoebus daily race
 one peace war doth fairer show
 lineage hath longer kept place
 still shall keep lights glow
 within aright inspire soul
 blue heaven shall turn pole

 iii
 seek full worth blaze
 mine needful noble lyre
 sounded touch thunderer's praise
 time giants sank penal fire
 yet instruments fit raise
 votive work bestow desire
 labour thought combine
 shape shadow forth great design

 iv
 till chisel may suffice scale
 stone give lines right direction
 haply future study may avail
 bring stubborn labour perfection
 return mail
 hawberk shield helm small protection
 speak pinabel maganzeze
 hopes damsel's death whose fall sees

 v
 wily traitor thought damsel sweet
 perished darksome cavern's floor
 pale visages hurried retreat
 contaminated door
 thence returning clomb seat
 like one wicked spirit bore
 add another sin evil deed
 bore warlike virgin's steed

 vi
 leave sometime wretch layed
 snares another wrought proper doom
 turn damsel betrayed
 nigh found death tomb
 rising rock dismayed
 shrewd fall gazing gloom
 beheld passed inner door gave
 entrance spacious cave

 vii
 first cavern second ended
 fashioned form church large square
 roof cunning architect extended
 shafts alabaster rich rare
 flame clearburning lamp ascended
 central altar glare
 illuminating space
 shone gate lit cave without

 viii
 touched sanctifying thoughts wait
 worthy spirit holy place
 prays eager lips heart elate
 disposer earthly grace
 kneeling hears secret wicket grate
 opposing wall whence face face
 woman issuing forth maid addresses
 barefoot ungirt dishevelled tresses

 ix
 "o generous bradamant" matron cried
 "know thine arrival hallowed hold
 unauthorized heavenly guide
 prophetic ghost merlin told
 thou cave shouldst come path untried
 covers renowned magician's mould
 long time awaited thee
 tell heavens' pronounced decree

 x
 "this ancient memorable cave
 merlin enchanter sage make
 thou may'st heard magician brave
 cheated lady lake
 beneath cavern grave
 holds bones lady's sake
 limbs wizard spread
 living laid lies dead

 xi
 "yet lives spirit immortal strain
 lodged enchanter's corpse till skies
 trumpet call endless pain
 dove raven's wing shall rise
 yet lives voice thou shalt hear plain
 sepulchral case marble cries
 since still past future taught
 every wight counsel sought

 xii
 "long days passed since distant land
 course cemetery steer
 solemn mysteries scanned
 merlin truth better clear
 compassed design planned
 month beyond thee tarried
 since merlin still certain knowledge summing
 events prefixed moment thy coming"

 xiii
 daughter duke aymon stood aghast
 silent listened speech
 knew sore marvelling passed
 'twere dream reality
 length modest brow eyes cast
 replied like one modesty
 "and wrought merit
 worthy workings prophetic spirit"

 xiv
 full joy adventure strange pursues
 moving ready haste behind dame
 brings sepulchre mews
 bones spirit erst merlin's name
 tomb hardest stone masons use
 shone smooth lucid red flame
 although sunbeam pierced gloom
 splendour lit subterraneous room

 xv
 whether native operation
 certain stones shine like torch i' dark
 whether force spell fumigation
 guess seems come near mark
 sign made mystic constellation
 blaze came sepulchral ark
 discovered sculpture colour gems gilding
 whatsoever else adorned building

 xvi
 scarcely bradamant sill
 lifter foot trod secret cave
 live spirit clear tones thrill
 addressed martial virgin grave
 "may fortune chaste noble maid fulfil
 thine every wish" exclaimed wizard brave
 "since thy womb princely race shall spring
 whose name italy earth shall ring

 xvii
 "the noble blood derived ancient troy
 mingling thee two glorious streams
 shall ornament flower joy
 every lineage phoebus beams
 genial stars lend warmth cold annoy
 indus tagus nile danube gleams
 thy progeny long drawn line
 shall marquises counts dukes caesers shine

 xviii
 "captains cavaliers shall spring thee
 knightly lance prudent lore
 shall widowed italy
 ancient praise fame arms restore
 realms lords shall seated
 numa augustus yore
 government benign sage
 shall recreate earth golden age

 xix
 "then heaven duly brought
 fair end thee fitting date
 first bless thy love wrought
 destined young rogero thy mate
 let nothing interpose break thought
 boldly tread path perscribed fate
 let aught stay thee till thief thrown
 thy good lance keeps thee thine own"

 xx
 merlin ceased solemn feat
 melissa might prepare fitting spell
 show bold bradamant aspect meet
 heirs illustrious race swell
 hence many sprites chose seat
 evoked know called hell
 gathered one place bade dame
 various garb guise shadows came

 xxi
 done church called maid
 drawn magic ring wide
 might contain damsel prostrate laid
 full measure palm beside
 head lest spirit invade
 pentacle assurance tied
 bade hold peace stand look
 read schooled demons book

 xxii
 lo forth first cave countless swarm
 presses upon circle's sacred round
 would magic rampart storm
 finds way barred fosse mound
 back rabble turns various form
 thrice bending march wound
 circle troops cave
 stands beauteous urn wizard's grave

 xxiii
 "to tell large puissant acts worth
 name figured sprite
 present eyes birth"
 said sage melissa damsel bright
 "to tell deeds shall act earth
 labour finish night
 hence shall call worthies thy line
 time fair occasion shall combine

 xxiv
 "see yonder firstborn thy noble breed
 well reflects thy fair joyous face
 first thine rogero's seed
 shall plant italy thy generous race
 behold shall distain mead
 good sword blood pontier base
 mighty wrong chastised traitor's guilt
 princely father's blood spilt

 xxv
 "by king desiderius shall pressed
 valiant leader lombard horde
 fiefs calaon este
 imperial charles shall make lord
 hubert thy grandson comes behind best
 italy arms belted sword
 shall defend church barbarous foes
 assure safe repose

 xxvi
 "alberto next unconquered captain see
 whose trophies shall many fanes array
 hugh bold son sire
 shall conquer milan snakes display
 azo next approaching form shall
 good brother dead insubri sway
 lo albertazo whose rede undone
 see berengarius banished son

 xxvii
 "with shall imperial otho join
 wedlock worthily daughter fair
 lo another hugh noble line
 sire succeeded equal heir
 thwarting cause ill design
 shall thrash romans' pride overbear
 shall hands sovereign pontiff take
 third otho leaguer break

 xxviii
 "see fulke brother convey
 italian birthright command
 take mighty dukedom far away
 fair home almayn's northern land
 house saxony shall stay
 prop ruin saving hand
 mother's right shall possess
 progeny maintain bless

 xxix
 "more famed courtesy warlike deed
 azo second next repairs
 bertoldo albertazo seed
 lo father walkes heirs
 parma's walls see germans bleed
 second henry quelled trophy bears
 one renowned story's future page
 next shall wed matilda chaste sage

 xxx
 "his virtues shall deserve fair flower
 age wot common grace
 hold half italy dower
 descendent first henry's race
 rinaldo shall succeed power
 pledge bertoldo's wedded love chase
 fierce frederick barbarossa's hireling bands
 saving church rapacious hands

 xxxi
 "another azo rules verona's town
 fair fields two great chiefs
 one wears papal one imperial crown
 baron marquis ancona style
 show rear gonfalon
 consistory amid file
 task long long tell deed
 achieved rome thy devoted seed

 xxxii
 "see fulke obyson azos hughs
 henrys  mark father boy
 two guelphs first fair umbria's land subdues
 shall spoleto's ducal crown enjoy
 behold princely phantom ensues
 shall turn fair italy's long grief joy
 speak fifth azo thy strain
 shall ezelin quelled slain

 xxxiii
 "fierce ezelin inhuman lord
 shall deemed men child hell
 work evil thinning sword
 ausonia's wasted cities dwell
 rome shall anthony record
 marius sylla nero cajus fell
 fifth azo shall scathe shame
 put frederick second caeser name

 xxxiv
 "he better sceptre well contented
 shall rule city seated streams
 phoebus plaintive lyre lamented
 son illtrusted father's beams
 cygnus spread pinions scented
 amber wept fabling poet dreams
 honour shall church decree
 fit guerdon works valour's fee

 xxxv
 "but laurel brother twine
 aldobrandino carry cheer
 rome otho ghibelline
 troubled capital strikes fear
 make umbri piceni sign
 shame sack cities far near
 hopeless relieve sacred hold
 sue neighbouring florentine gold

 xxxvi
 "and trust noble brother hands
 boasting dearer pledge pact bind
 next victorious o'er german bands
 give triumphant ensigns wind
 afflicted church restore lands
 take due vengeance celano's kind
 die cut manhood's early flower
 beneath banners papal power

 xxxvii
 "he dying leaves brother azo heir
 pesaro fair ancona's reign
 cities 'twixt tronto
 green isauro's stream mount main
 heritage rich rare
 greatness mind faith without strain
 else fortune's mortal state
 virtue soars beyond love hate

 xxxviii
 "in good rinaldo equal worth shall shine
 promise early fire
 hope thine exalted line
 dark fate fortune wreck ire
 alas naples distant shrine
 naples hostage sire
 dirge heard stripling thy race
 young obyson shall fill grandsire's place

 xxxix
 "this lord dominion shall unite
 gay reggio joined modena's bold land
 redoubted valour lend light
 willing people call command
 sixth name azo rears upright
 church's banner noble hand
 fair adria's fief dower shall bring
 child second charles sicilia's king

 xl
 "behold yonder friendly group agreed
 many fair princes illustrious name
 obyson albert famed pious deed
 aldobrandino nicholas lame
 may pass better speed
 faenza conquered feats fame
 adria better held surer gain
 gives title neighbouring main

 xli
 "and fair town whose produce rose
 rose gives name grecian speech
 fishy marshes round enclose
 po's two currents threat double breach
 whose townsmen loath lazy calm's repose
 pray stormy waves may lash beach
 pass mid towns towers countless store
 argenta lugo thousand

 xlii
 "see nicholas tender age
 willing people shall elect lord
 shall laugh scorn civil rage
 rebellious tideus horde
 whose infantine delight shall wage
 mimic fight sweat spear sword
 discipline nurture yields
 shall flourish flower martial fields

 xliii
 "by rebellious plans overthrown
 turned upon rash contriver's head
 stratagem warfare blown
 vainly shall cunning toils spread
 third otho late known
 parma pleasant reggio dread
 shall spoiled sudden strife
 possessions wretched life

 xliv
 "and still fair dominion shall increase
 without wrong spreading bounds augment
 glad subjects violate peace
 unless provoked outrage resent
 hence wealth welfare shall cease
 divine disposer content
 let flourish heavenly love
 celestial spheres revolve

 xlv
 "lo lionel lo borse great kind
 first duke thy fair race realm's delight
 reigns secure shall triumphs find
 peace warlike princes win fight
 struggling fury's hands shall tie behind
 back prison mars removed sight
 fair endeavours bent bless stay
 people sovereign rule obey

 xlvi
 "lo hercules may reproach neighbour
 foot half burnt halting gait slow
 budrio protecting sabre
 saved troops fatal overthrow
 guerdon glorious labour
 distress vex foe
 chased barco hard say
 shine peace martial fray

 xlvii
 "lucania puglia calabria's strand
 shall rumour prowess ring
 shall strive duel hand hand
 gain praise catalonia's king
 wisest captains land
 worth shall class fame actions bring
 fief shall win like valiant knight
 thirty years right

 xlviii
 "to grateful city owes debt
 greatest subjects lord owe
 moves marsh set
 stones ceres' fruitful treasures grow
 shall enlarge bounds yet
 shall fence walls foe
 theatre dome repairs
 beautifies streets goodly squares

 xlix
 "not keeps lordship well defended
 winged lions' claws fierce attacks
 gallic ravage extended
 invader italia sacks
 happy state alone unoffended
 unharassed ungalled toll tax
 blessings recount
 grateful realm shall hercules adore

 l
 "so much shall spring pair
 brothers leagued less love blood
 shall leda's children
 alphonso hippolite good
 twin resigned vital air
 fellow redeem stygian flood
 would gladly spend breath
 brother brave perpetual death

 li
 "in two princes' excellent affection
 happy lieges assurance feel
 noble town protection
 girded twice vulcan's works steel

 justice knowledge love shall deal
 astrea shall appear returned heaven
 low earth varying seasons given

 lii
 "well wisdom shines bright
 good sire's valour less
 since usurping venice arms fight
 full troops scanty numbers press
 know justly hight
 mother stepmother brings new distress
 mother scarce mild
 progue medea child

 liii
 "this chief time soever shall go
 forth faithful crew night day

 santern po zaniolus' flood

 liv
 "this shall spaniard know dismay
 'mid bounds papal gold shall gain
 shall bastia win slay
 cruel rage hapless castellain

 since rescued city groom
 left alive bear news rome

 lv
 " 'tis counsel lance
 shall win honours romagna's plain

 paunchdeep human blood shall steeds advance

 greek italian frank spaniard die

 lvi
 "lo priestly vesture clad crowned
 purple hat conferred hallowed dome
 'tis wise liberal renowned
 hippolitus great cardinal rome
 whose actions shall every region sound
 where'er honoured muse shall find home
 whose glad era indulgent heaven
 augustus' maro given

 lvii
 "his deeds adorn race car
 glorious sun illumes subject earth
 silver moon lesser star
 far others transcends worth
 see captain ill bested war
 go forth afflicted return mirth
 backed foot fewer cavaliers
 homeward barks fifteen gallies steers

 lviii
 "two sigismonds first second see
 alphonso's five good sons succeed
 whose glories spread o'er seas land shall
 first shall wed maid france's seed
 second hercules
 may know every name deed
 hippolitus light shall shine
 wise uncle gilding line

 lix
 "francis third comes next two
 alphonsos  yet say
 thy line branches pursue
 fair virgin would long protract thy stay
 phoebus many times mortal view
 would quench light lamp day
 thy leave 'tis time pageant cease
 dismiss shades hold peace"

 lx
 lady's leave volume closed
 whose precepts spirits bent
 merlin's ancient bones reposed
 first cavern disappearing went
 bradamant eager lips unclosed
 since divine enchantress gave consent
 "and who" cried "that pair sorrowing mien
 alphonso hippolitus

 lxi
 "sighing youths advanced amid show
 brows shame sorrow overcast
 downward look gait subdued slow
 saw brothers shun passed"
 melissa heard dame signs woe
 thus streaming eyes exclaim'd last
 "ah luckless youths vain illusions fed
 whither wicked men's bad counsel led

 lxii
 "o worthy seed hercules good
 let guilt beyond thy love prevail
 alas wretched pair thy blood
 many prevailing pity turn scale"
 sad softer tone pursued
 "i press painful tale
 chew fair fancy's food deem unmeet
 bitter chase sweet

 lxiii
 "soon tomorrow's sun shall gild skies
 first light way show
 wizard knight rogero sties
 built polished steel ramparts glow
 long deep woods thy journey lies
 till sea arrived shall bestow
 new instructions future way
 thou shalt need melissa's stay"

 lxiv
 night maid reposes cave
 best part talk merlin spends
 persuasive voice wizard grave
 rogero's honest love commends
 till vault goes forth virgin brave
 sky rising sun ascends
 path long space obscure either side
 weird woman still faithful guide

 lxv
 gain hidden glen heights inclose
 mountains inaccessible man
 day toil without repose
 precipices frowned torrents ran
 may diversion interpose
 sweet subjects discourse together scan
 conference best might make appear
 rugged road less dismal severe

 lxvi
 greater portion served guide
 wise woman's scope warlike dame
 teach device might untied
 rogero's gyves stedfast flame
 "if thou wert mars pallas" cried
 sage melissa "though thee came
 king charles agramant command
 wizard foe thou could'st stand

 lxvii
 "besides walled steel
 inexpugnable tower high
 besides swift horse taught wheel
 caracol gallop mid sky
 bears mortal shield power seal
 soon 'tis exposed dazzled eye
 invades sense splendour shed
 sees blaze remains dead

 lxviii
 "and lest shut thine eyes thou should'st suppose
 might serve contending wizard knight
 would'st thou know combat close
 strikes home eschews fight
 escape blaze blinds foes
 render vain necromantic sleight
 speedy mean cannot miss
 world afford way

 lxix
 "king agramant africa ring
 thieved indian queen subtle guiles
 baron following
 consigned precedes us miles
 brunello wears gift shall bring
 nought sorceries magic wiles
 thefts cheats brunello well
 instructed sage charm spell

 lxx
 "brunello practised sly
 tell thee king sent
 aid mother wit may try
 ring well proved like event
 take rogero castle high
 boasted wizard pent
 lord promise impart
 rogero's presence heart

 lxxi
 "that escape thee alone may owe
 king youthful cavalier
 release rogero foe
 enchanted cage prepare hear
 three days along shingle shalt thou go
 beside sea whose waves soon appear
 thee third day shall hostel bring
 shall come bears virtuous ring

 lxxii
 "that thou may'st recognise man height
 less six palms observe one inn
 black curly hair dwarfish wight
 beard overgrown cheek chin
 shaggy brow swoln eyes cloudy sight
 nose close flattened sallow skin
 may make sketch complete
 succinctly clad like courier goes cheat

 lxxiii
 "thy conversation man shall turn
 upon enchantment spell mystic pact
 thou shalt thy talk appear yearn
 prove wizard's strength fact
 lady let thy knowledge learn
 good ring mars magic act
 shall propose bring thee guide
 tall castle whither thou would'st ride

 lxxiv
 "follow close viewing sign
 near fortress enchanter hoar
 let false pity thy mind incline

 lxxv
 discoursing thus came upon sea
 garonne near fair bordeaux meets tide
 fellow travellers
 natural tears drop divide
 duke aymon's child slumbers till
 release knight holds till eventide
 'twas damsel hostel rested
 sir brunello already guested

 lxxvi

 image mind impressed

 replies lies pressed

 changes sex sect name land

 might undetected make prize

 well knowing condition guise

 canto 4

 argument
 old atlantes suffers fatal wreck
 foiled ring young rogero freed
 soars air till appears speck
 mounted upon wizard's winged steed
 obediant royal charles's beck
 followed love's imperious lead
 rinaldo disembarks british land
 saves genevra doomed stake brand



 though ill mind appear simulation
 quality offends
 'tis plain many situation
 found beneficial ends
 save blame danger vexation
 since converse always friends
 less clear clouded mortal life
 beset snares full envious strife

 ii
 painful proof scarcely find
 real friend various chances sought
 may communicate mind
 keeping watch upon wandering thought
 young rogero's lady kind
 brunello sincere fraught
 treasons manifold false tainted
 good enchantress truly painted

 iii
 feigns well deceitful scout
 fitting father lies
 watches thievish hands fear doubt
 follows every motion eyes
 lo mighty noise heard without
 "o mighty mother king heaven" cries
 "what thing hear" quickly springs
 towards place whence larum rings

 iv
 sees host family
 one door one window slips
 eyes upturned gazing sky
 witness comet eclipse
 lady views wondering eye
 scarce believed other's lips
 feathered courser sailing rack
 bore armed knight upon back

 v
 broad pinions various hue
 seated knight saddle pressed
 clad steel arms wide radiance threw
 wonderous course directed west
 dropt among mountains lost view
 host informed guest
 true tale sorcerer made
 farther near frequent raid

 vi
 "he sometimes towering soars skies
 seems descending skim ground
 beauteous women makes prize
 mischief parts found
 hence whether other's eyes
 esteemed fair wretched damsels round
 fact felon plunders hine
 fearing sun descried

 vii
 "a castle pyrenean height
 necromancer keeps work spell"
 host relates "of steel fair bright
 nature cannot match wonderous shell
 many cavaliers prove might
 gone none returned tale tell
 doubt fair sir thief enthralls
 slays whoever encounter falls"

 viii
 watchful maid attends every thing
 glad heart trusting complete
 shall compass virtuous ring
 downfall enchanter seat
 host  "a guide pray thee bring
 better knows thief's retreat
 burns heart choose go
 strive battle wizard foe"

 ix
 "it shall need" exclaimed dwarfish moor
 "for serve guide
 road set lore
 shall rejoice ride"
 meant ring hint forbore
 lest dearly avowed abide
  "your guidance gives pleasure"
 meaning hoped win treasure

 x
 useful say said
 might hurt saracen concealed
 well suited ends host got
 palfrey fitting road field
 bought steed aurora shot
 rosy rays rode forth spear shield
 maid courier valley wind
 brunello behind

 xi
 wood wood mount mountain hoar
 clomb summit cloudless sky
 discovers france spain either shore
 peak apennine eye
 may tuscan sclavonian sea explore
 whence journey camaldoli

 thence lowly vale descended

 xii
 rock deep valley's centre springs
 bright walls steel summit go
 high airy summit flings
 leaves neighbouring cliffs
 may scale height wings
 vainly would painful toil bestow
 "lo prisoners" sir brunello cries
 "ladies cavaliers enchanter sties"

 xiii
 scarped smooth upon four parts mountain bare
 seemed fashioned plumb builder's skill
 upon side path stair
 furnished man means climb hill
 castle seemed nest lair
 animal supplied plume quill
 damsel knows 'tis time slay
 wily dwarf take ring away

 xiv
 deems foul blood man stain
 unarmed base sort brand
 well without death may obtain
 costly ring suspends hand
 brunello guard little pain
 seized strongly bound girding band
 lofty fir made fast string
 finger first withdrew ring

 xv
 neither tears groans sound woe
 move stedfast maid dwarf power
 rugged hill descended slow
 reached plain beneath tower
 gave bugle breath keep
 call castled wizard stower
 sound finished threatening cried
 called combat defied

 xvi
 long within gate enchanter stayed
 heard voice bugle ring
 foe seemed man arrayed
 arms horse wing
 appearance well consoled maid
 small cause fear beheld bring
 mace rested lance bitting sword
 wherewith corselet might bruised gored

 xvii
 left arm alone shield took
 covered o'er silk crimson hue
 righthand held open book
 whence enchanter read strange wonder grew
 often times sight lance shook
 flinching eyelids could hide view
 tuck mace seemed smite foe
 sate aloof struck blow

 xviii
 empty fiction wrought magic lore
 natural steed wizard pressed
 filly griffin bore
 hight hippogryph wings beak crest
 formed like sire feet
 like mare dam rest
 riphaean hills though rarely found
 bred beyond frozen ocean's bound

 xix
 drawn enchantment distant lair
 wizard thought tame foal
 month instructed bear
 saddle bit gallop goal
 execute earth mid air
 shifts manege course caracole
 labour wrought real
 rest hollow ideal

 xx
 truth fictions combined
 whose sleight passed red yellow black white
 vain enchantments could blind
 maid whose virtuous ring assured sight
 yet blows discharges wind
 spurring prolongs fight
 drove wheeled steed smote nought
 practised taught

 xxi
 sometime fought upon horse
 courser feet descends
 compass freely put force
 enchantress schooled wily ends
 wizard display last resource
 unweeting defence towards wends
 bares shield secure blind foe
 magic light astonished throw

 xxii
 shield might shown first
 needed keep cavaliers bay
 loved masterstroke see
 achieved lance sword single fray
 captive mouse sportive glee
 wily cat sometimes seen play
 till waxing wroth weary prize
 bites snap prisoner dies

 xxiii
 cat mouse battles fought
 liken magician foes
 comparison holds good
 ring maid goes
 firm attentive still watching sore
 lest upon wizard impose
 sees bare wondrous shield
 closes eyes falls upon field

 xxiv
 shining metal could offend
 wont others cover freed
 damsel make descend

 ought defeated end
 sooner grassy mead
 laid head wheeling widely round
 flying courser pitched upon ground

 xxv

 magician sadle bow
 lights seeks like wolf among
 bushes couched thicket waits roe
 without delay ambush sprung
 drew near grappled fast foe
 wretched man volume whose aid
 battles fought earth laid

 xxvi
 ran bind chain
 girt round purpose wore
 deemed less
 mastered bound subdued
 hath dame already flung
 excused reason strove
 fearful odds bold
 puissant maid warrior weak old

 xxvii

 sees prowess laid low
 venerable sire sorrowing face
 whose hair wrinkles speak guess
 years six score ten little less

 xxxii

 thine hand knot life untie"

 knights met

 beast pass beset

 l
 hippogryph height
 lessened point bends

 forced wind spacious ocean

 oft echoes champion's sturdy stroke

 lii
 roves many famous cavalier
 renowned feat arms british strain
 throng distant land country near
 french norse german knights numerous train
 let none save valiant venture
 seeking glory death may gain
 arthur galahalt gauvaine fought
 well sir launcelot tristram wrought

 liii
 worthies table round
 either table whether old new
 whose trophies yet remain upon ground
 proof valiant feats rinaldo true
 forthwith armour bayardo found
 landed woody coast crew
 bade haste might repair
 berwick's neighbouring port wait

 liv
 without guide company went
 wide forest choosing way
 might present
 hope adventurous quest hard assay
 ere first day's circling sun spent

 spends much wealth harbouring claim
 shelter warlike knight wandering dame

 lv
 monks abbot mount alban's peer
 goodly welcome house accord
 asked savoury cheer
 amply wearied strength restored
 tract errant cavalier
 often adventurous quest might explored
 man might prove dangerous deed
 blame glory fitting meed

 lvi
 answered woods might sure
 many strange adventures would found
 deeds wrought like place obscure
 greater part bruited round

 works buried underground
 glorious act achieved due
 fame may peril pain pursue

 lvii

 prepare worthiest enterprize hear
 e'er times old present day
 undertaken cavalier

 sore bested puissant peer

 would bereave life fame

 lviii

 perchance yet hatred right
 vouches gallery updrew
 lover seen dead night
 hence death fire damsel's due
 law unless champion fight
 behalf ere month go
 nigh spent upon accuser prove lie

 lix
 "our impious scottish law severe dread
 wills woman whether low high
 state takes man bed
 except husband offence shall die
 hope ransom head
 unless defence warrior hie
 champion true spear shield
 maintain guiltless listed field

 lx
 "the king sore grieving geneura bright
 unhappy daughter's name
 proclaims town city knight
 shall deliver death shame
 royal damsel unite
 dower well suited royal dame
 valiant warrior stood
 defence come gentle blood

 lxi
 "but within month knight appear
 coming conquer damsel dies
 like emrpize worthier spear
 wandering woods lowly guise

 deed shall gain glorious prize
 sweetest flower ladies fair
 betwixt ind atlas' pillars

 lxii

 evermore may live content
 king's grace means see
 honour raised anew wellnigh spent
 besides laws chivalry
 bound venge damsel foully shent
 whose life treason sought
 chaste spotless common thought"

 lxiii
 rinaldo mused awhile replied
 "and must gentle damsel die fire
 lover's wish complied
 quenched within arms fond desire
 cursed law dame tried
 cursed would permit doom dire
 perish fate cruel proves
 life bestows loves

 lxiv
 "or true false geneura's tale shame
 lover blessed little heed
 praise lady well might claim
 manifest gentle deed
 every thought turned aid dame
 grant one guide steps lead
 quickly foul accuser stands
 trust god loose geneura's bands

 lxv
 "i vouch guiltless thought
 fear warrant false
 boldly maintain act nought
 damsel deserve die
 ween unjust else wit distraught
 statutes framed severity
 iniquitous effaced
 new better code replaced

 lxvi
 "if like desire equal flame
 move one sex warmly press
 soft end love goal
 witless crowd seems rank excess
 say shall woman  merit scathe blame
 though lovers one may caress
 man sin free
 meets praise mere impunity

 lxvii
 "by injurious law unequal still
 woman inflicted open wrong
 demonstrate grievous ill
 trust god borne long"
 good rinaldo's sentence one
 deeming sires unjust assents throng
 sires outrageous statute penned
 king might amend

 though fait countenance dismayed

 another canto postpone


 canto 5

 argument
 lurcanio false report abused
 deemed geneura's fault brother dead
 weening faithless duke refused
 taken damsel bed
 king peers accused
 session ariodantes led
 strives brother disguise season
 rinaldo comes venge secret treason



 among animals prey
 earth unite friendly wise
 whether mix peace moody fray
 male offends mate safety hies
 bear matched forest gray
 lioness beside lion lies
 wolves male female live loving cheer
 gentle heifer dreads wilful steer

 ii
 fury abominable pest
 poison human heart shed
 still 'twixt man wife rage possessed
 injurious words foul reproach said
 blows outrage hase peace molest
 bitter tears still wash genial bed
 watered tearful flood
 often bathed senseless ire blood

 iii
 simply rank sinner appears
 outrage nature god dare
 foul hand woman rears
 head would harm single hair
 drug burning entrail sears
 would knife noose prepare
 man appears though sight
 seem rather infernal sprite

 iv
 ruffians two
 good rinaldo damsel scared
 conducted valleys view
 none might wot foully snared
 ended damsel fair hue
 tell occasion scathe prepared
 good paladin brought release
 conclusion thus story piece

 v
 "of direr deed ever yet done"
 gentle dame began "sir cavalier
 thebes mycene argos upon
 savage soil prepare hear
 believe circling sun
 scottish shores approach less near
 land 'tis would eschew
 foul ferocious race shocks view

 vi
 "all times shown man still pursued
 hair every clime natural foe
 deal death seek good
 ill foul nature flow
 truth better understood
 shall first last occasion show
 tender years right
 caitiffs would dome foul despite

 vii
 " 'tis fitting know spring
 life palace made resort
 served long time daughter king
 grew growth well placed court
 cruel love fortune envying
 willed follower sport
 made beyond scottish lord knight
 albany's duke find favour sight

 viii
 "and seemed cherish
 mean love love ardent bred
 hear indeed see prove
 man's faith bosom's purpose read
 believing still yielding love
 ceased till took bed
 chambers evil hour
 marked geneura's priviest bower

 ix
 "where hoarded careful privacy
 preserved whatever esteemed rare
 many times slept gallery
 thence projected open air
 oft made lover climb
 mount hempen stair
 longing arms would call
 projecting balcony let fall

 x
 "for passion often fed
 good geneura's absence made bold
 varying season changed bed
 shun burning heat pinching cold
 albany unseen safely sped
 fronting dismantled street old
 built portion palace bright
 went way day night

 xi
 "so many days months maintained
 us secrecy amorous game
 still grew love new vigour gained
 inmost bosom felt flame
 little loved deeply feigned
 weened blinded shame
 though thousand certain signs betrayed
 faithless knight base deceit bewrayed

 xii
 "after days fair geneura
 suitor showed cannot say
 began sighed
 love made assay
 judge alas supremacy
 ruled heart absolute sway
 since owned thought shame move
 assist second love

 xiii
 "unlike bore said indeed
 true displayed
 pretending love hoped speed
 celebrate due spousals maid
 royal sire might well succeed
 consenting boon prayed
 good king wealth birth
 realm none equal worth

 xiv
 "me persuades ministry
 king's soninlaw elected
 must know next king would
 advanced high subject could repair
 merit mine ever
 great benefit mind would bear
 would cherish bride
 every dame beside

 xv
 "i please entirely bent
 never could would gainsay
 upon days alone enjoy content
 find means wishes fulfil
 snatch occasions present
 mode praise merits instil
 lover labour strain
 industry geneura's love gain

 xvi
 "with heart furtherance suit
 wrought could done god truly knows
 geneura produced friut
 grace duke could dispose
 another love taken root
 whose every fond affection flows
 towards gentle knight courteous lore
 sought scotland distant shore

 xvii
 "and brother right young stay
 king's court came italy
 knightly arms made assay
 none britain approved
 prized king ignoble pay
 rewarding like nobility
 bestowed upon youth liberal hand
 burghs baronies castles woods land

 xviii
 "dear monarch daughter still
 lord dearer ariodantes hight
 affection might valour fill
 knowledge love brought delight
 old vesuvius sicilia's hill
 troytown ever blaze bright
 flamed heart damsel learned
 love young ariodantes burned

 xix
 "the passion bore lord preferred
 loved perfect truth heart
 occassion still unheard
 hopeful answer would e'er impart
 still lover's suit stirred
 obtain guerdon strove art
 would censure still ever
 strengthened hate nursed

 xx
 "my wayward lover often excite
 vain bootless emprize quit
 idly hope turn stedfast sprite
 deeply another passion smit
 make apparent scottish knight
 ariodantes flame lit
 young damsel's breast seas flood
 would cooled one whit boiling blood

 xxi
 "this polinesso many times heard
 scottish baron's name
 well warranted sight well word
 ill love cherished dame
 see another preferred
 quenched haughty warrior's flame
 fond love bosom burned
 despiteful rage hatred turned

 xxii
 "between geneura faithful knight
 discord ill schemed shed
 put betwixt pair foul despite
 time heal quarrel bred
 bringing scandal damsel bright
 stain cleave alive dead
 bent wreck fatal shelf
 counselled

 xxiii
 " `dalinda mine' said project brewed
 dalinda name `you needs must know
 root although trunk hewed
 successive suckers many times grow
 thus unhappy passion renewed
 tenacious still life buds although
 cut ill success new increase
 till compass desire cease

 xxiv
 " `nor hope pleasure much wrought
 compass design would please
 effect least thought
 thrive would interpose little ease
 every time bower sought
 bed geneura slumbers seize
 puts still care
 dress daily wear

 xxv
 " `dispose locks deck
 goes decked cunning heed
 imitate gallery
 furnished corded stair shall speed
 shall ascend phantasy
 wear weed
 hope putting cheat
 short time shall quench amorous heat'

 xxvi
 "so said knight distraught
 beside aware
 design help besought
 manifestly foul snare
 geneura's clothes disguised taught
 let oft used corded stair
 traitor's foul deceit perceived
 deadly mischief achieved

 xxvii
 "the duke ariodantes' ears
 words like addressed
 leagued friendship cavaliers
 till rivals pursued common quest
 "i marvel since peers
 must honoured caressed
 held high regard cherished still
 benefits repay ill

 xxviii
 " `i assured comprehend know
 mine geneura's love old accord
 legitimate espousal
 claim lord
 disturb suit bestow
 heart offers reward
 heaven respect claim place
 condition mine mine case'

 xxix
 " `and i' cried ariodantes `marvel more'
 answer scottish lord `at
 since enamoured
 gentle damsel ever met view
 know assured evermore
 two loved  never love true 
 certain alone would share lot
 well assured loves

 xxx
 " `why respect
 friendship past would pretend
 bear effect
 hope stood fair gain end
 less wed expect
 fortunes wealth transcend
 favoured king
 happy daughter's love'

 xxxi
 " `of strange mistake' replied
 duke `your foolish passion root
 think beloved side
 believe try fruit
 proceeding nothing hide
 tell secrets suit
 let man proves least favoured yield
 provide elsewhere quit field

 xxxii
 " `i prepared wish swear
 nothing told reveal
 assure share
 shall recount well conceal'
 uniting pact rival pair
 solemn vows upon bible seal
 mutual promise plighted
 ariodantes first tale recited

 xxxiii
 "then plainly simple facts averred
 geneura stood suit avows
 engaged writing word
 swore would another's spouse
 scottish king demurred
 virgin austerity ever vows
 bridal bond aye eschewed
 pass days barren solitude

 xxxiv
 "then added hoped worth
 avouched knightly brand
 yet might vouch prosperity
 honour king land
 please well monarch
 accounted worthy hand
 fair child espoused consent
 since wishes would content

 xxxv
 "then concludes  `i stand upon ground
 intruder fear encroaching nigh
 seek 'tis hopes bound
 striving geneura's love would
 seek surer sign found
 god allowed wedlock's lawful tie
 suit hopeless sure
 excellent passing pure'

 xxxvi
 "when ariodantes honest mind
 told reward hoped quit pain
 false polinesso designed
 make geneura hateful swain
 began  `alas yet far behind
 hopes shall confess vain
 say root shall manifest
 good fortune alone blest

 xxxvii
 " `with geneura feigns pays prizes
 passion hopes words fed
 foolish love despises
 damsel oft said
 assured surmises
 vain worthless words idle promise bred
 fact trust reveal
 though better faith conceal

 xxxviii
 " `there passes month space
 three nights four six often ten fair
 receives joy embrace
 seems second warmth share
 may witness shall judge case
 empty hopes bliss compare
 since happier fortune
 wishes yield seek another love'

 xxxix
 " `this believe' answer cried
 ariodantes `well assured lie
 string falsehoods tied
 scare dear emprize try
 charge passing foul shall abide
 vouch said arms
 tale place reliance
 traitor hurl defiance'

 xl
 "to rejoined duke 'i ween 'twere ill
 take battle upon either part
 since surer mean purpose may fulfill
 please proof impart'
 ariodantes trembled chill
 went inmost bones sick heart
 full believed rival's boast
 would spot yielded ghost

 xli
 "with wounded heart faltering voice pale face
 mouth gall answered 'when see
 proofs thy rare adventure grace
 fair geneura honours thee
 promise forego fruitless chase
 one thee kind cold
 think thy story shall avail
 unless eyes confirm tale'

 xlii
 " `to warn due time shall care'
 said polinesso went way
 two nights scarecly passed ere repair
 known bower fixed assay
 ready spring secret snare
 sought rival appointed day
 hide night ensuing prayed
 i' street none habitation made

 xliii
 "and youth station overright
 balcony clambered shows
 ariodantes weened knight
 would seek hidden place dispose
 one well suited fell despite
 bent take life ambush chose

 xl
 "fortune remains thou

 canto 10

 argument
 another love assails bireno's breast
 leaves one night olympia shore
 logistilla's holy realm addressed
