 whence good rinaldo's levy sees
 next angelica beholds frees



 loves fidelity
 yet proved constant hearts true
 lovers felicity
 sorrow faithful found famous crew
 olympia would give first degree
 rather second due
 well may say tale told
 truer love present times old

 ii
 many proofs clear
 made apparent zealand lord
 woman's faith certain could appear
 man though open heart explored
 fair truth spirits endear
 mutual love deserve reward
 bireno nay

 nevermore deceive

 made europe wide asia grieve

 rather quit light leave

 v

 vi

 turned shouted "whence you"

 xxxix
 "turn back take another road save
 truth covet slain
 chase woo lady dear
 let think bear company"
  "what could say sir cavalier"
 orlando cried sacripant "if
 known two basest whores pull
 reel spindlestaff matted wool"

 xl
 turning ferrau "but thine head
 thou brutish sot behold bare
 thy late words ill wisely said
 thou should'st perceive fare"
 ferrau "for breeds dread
 should'st thou take sovereign care
 said unhelmed prove true
 single you"

 xli
 "oh" circassia's king cried roland dread
 "thy morion man let entreat
 till driven folly head
 never like madness meet"
  "who would fool" monarch said
 "but indeed deem suit discreet
 lend thine shall less fit
 haply thee school lack wit"

 xlii
  "fools you" fierce ferrau replied
 "as wear helm delight
 would without casques pride
 already reft despite
 know thus much vow tied
 wear helm thus promise quite
 roaming without till fine casque win
 worn orlando charles's paladin"

 xliii
  "then" smiling spaniard said count
 "with naked head thou thinkest repeat
 roland aspramont
 agolant's bold son shouldst thou meet
 warrior thou seekest front front
 warrant thou wouldst quake head feet
 wouldst forego casque give
 knight thine arms let thee live"

 xliv
  "so oft roland hip
 oft" exclaimed boaster "heretofore
 easy task strip
 arms beside helm wore
 still let occasion slip
  sometimes think things unwished
 wish hope
 compass easily present scope"

 xlv
 good orlando could forbear
 cried "foul miscreant liar marched
 say caitiff country
 boast obtained victory
 paladin o'er dare
 vaunt distant deemed see
 take helm might
 take arms despite

 xlvi
 "nor o'er smallest vantage wou'd"
 ended temples disarrayed
 beech hung helmet good
 nigh quickly bared trenchant blade
 ferrau stands close attitude
 courage chanced dismayed
 covered lifted shield naked sword
 might best shelter head afford

 xlvii
 'twas thus warriors two faulchions bare
 turning ready steeds began wheel
 armour thinnest
 meeting plates joined probed steel steel
 world another pair
 fitted matched fierce appeal
 equal daring equal might
 safe alike wound either knight

 xlviii
 fair sir already presume
 fierce ferrau charmed understood
 save child enclosed within womb
 full mother takes early food
 hence ever till squalid tomb
 covered manly face wore harness good
 wont doubtful part guard
 seven good plates metal tempered hard

 xlix

 safe every except single part

 rest diamond dug mountain hoar
 hard unless report truth depart

 less necessity ornament

 l
 waxing fierce fell combat rages

 li
 king circassy
 deemed angelica far

 lii

 fond novelty helm untied
 designs take desirous espy
 would perceived wrong
 without thought keep plunder long

 liii
 give orlando bent

 ere either two marked feat
 blinded angry heat

 liv

 knight

 lxii

 lxv

 lxxvi

 champaign's flat hurrying swine

 lxxviii

 lxxix

 undertaken hard emprize vain

 fatal durindana's blade descends

 lxxx
 safety cotton vest cloths supply
 thousand folds temples spread

 lxxxii

 lxxxiii

 xc

 canto 13

 argument
 count orlando damsel bland
 loves zerbino hears piteous woes
 next puts death felons hand
 pent duke aymon's daughter goes
 seeking rogero large band
 old atlantes' magic walls enclose
 impounds deceived fictions new
 agramant ranks army review



 ancient cavaliers right happy
 born age gloomy wood
 valley cave wherein bear
 serpent lion hid savage brood
 could find palace rare
 hardly found judges proved good
 women wit freshest days
 beauty worthily deserve praise

 ii
 told gentle maid
 orlando discovered ground
 asked thither conveyed
 pursuing tale tell drowned
 grief speech many sob delayed
 damsel fair sweet softest sound
 summing brevity might
 ills recounted anglantes' knight

 iii
 "though sure" said "o cavalier
 suffer punishment say
 know pens
 woman quickly fact display
 would thou shouldst story hear
  let wretched life forfeit pay

 gaoler one day death decree

 iv
 "lo isabel styled
 daughter gallicia's hapless king
 said aright child
 longer care suffering
 fault love beguiled
 alone charge bring
 sweetly first wish applauds
 weaves secret deceit frauds

 v
 "whilom lived content fortune's smile
 rich blameless fair young sad reverse
 condemned wretched poor vile
 worse case yet worse
 fitting thee
 first root troubles rehearse
 soothe though thee borrow
 help thou compassionate sorrow

 vi
 "my father city bayonne
 today twelve months tourney dight
 hence led spreading rumour town
 joust different lands came many knight
 mid manifest renown
 love deceived sight
 praise eyes alone zerbino
 mighty king scotland's son

 vii
 "when field espied
 performing wondrous feats chivalry
 surprised love ere descried
 freedom love rash guide
 lay unction phantasy
 unseemly place heart possest
 fixed worthiest world best

 viii
 "in beauty valour's boast
 lords scottish prince stood high
 showed think bore love
 left less ardent flame
 lacked one us move
 speak common wishes frequently
 could still heart mind unite
 although disjoined one another's sight

 ix
 "hence concluded festal show
 home zerbino returned
 thou know'st love thou well may'st know
 night day warrior yearned
 assured less prey
 flame constant bosom burned
 save way nought
 solace restless passion sought

 x
 "for different faith forbade side
 saracen christian
 ask father bride
 stealth purposed elope
 amid green fields wealthy town beside
 garden seated sea
 upon pleasant shore whence eye
 might ocean hills descry

 xi
 "a fitting place effect different creed
 law forbade us esteemed site
 showed order taken deed
 make future life's delight
 near santa martha need
 bark arm'd men ambush dight
 sir odoric biscay's command
 leader approved sea land

 xii
 "unable person
 father forced wend
 succour king france lieu
 odoric purpose would send
 chosen faithful friends true
 faithful truest friend
 benefits could bind
 goodly deeds friendship mankind

 xiii
 "at time fixed bear thence away
 chief would anchor destined ground
  thus arrived wished day
 garden found
 sir odoric night fair array
 valiant men land sea renowned
 near river bark descends
 thence silence garden wends

 xiv
 "to pitched bark party sped
 city knew hand
 house disarmed naked fled
 slain helpless band
 another part captive led
 severed native land
 hoping brief zerbino possess
 cannot tell thee happiness

 xv
 "scarcely mongia galley doubled
 ere squall took us larboard side
 round clear horizon troubled
 stirred tost heavenhigh foaming tide
 smote northwest wind next ocean bubbled
 beam vessel plied
 evermore increases force
 starboard larboard boots course

 xvi
 "it steads strike sail lash mast
 lowered gangboard castles fell
 bark despite hurried fast
 towards pointed rocks rochelle
 save assist us last
 cruel storm us ashore impel
 driven thither ill wind mightier speed
 ever bowstring gave whistling reed

 xvii
 "our peril well biscayan note
 tries often evil end
 lowers galley's skiff afloat
 descends makes descend
 two follow troop would throng boat
 first prevent defend
 entrance naked faulchions
 sever rope forthwith put sea

 xviii
 "driven landward shore safely light
 skiff embarked band
 rest split vessel sink outright
 goods seaswallowed upon strand
 eternal love goodness infinite
 offer thanks outstretched hand
 doomed 'mid watery roar
 perish behold zerbino

 xix
 "though left shipboard matters rare
 precious nature gem vest
 might hope zerbino's lot share
 content sea rest
 dwelling beach appears
 pathway seen footsteps pressed
 hill whose woody top beat
 ceaseless winds waters bathe feet

 xx
 "here fell tyrant love aye prompt range
 faithless every promise still
 watches ever may derange
 mar every reasonable
 converts woeful disastrous change
 comfort despair good ill
 zerbino put trust
 cooled loyal faith burned lust

 xxi
 "whether desire nursed sea
 dared exhibit
 sprung opportunity
 suggested solitary shore
 without pause lone desert
 would sate greedy passion forbore
 till one could rid twain
 boat us scaped main

 xxii
 "a man scotland almonio hight
 zerbino seemed great faith bear
 perfect warrior knight
 praised odoric given trust share
 spaniard said slight
 unto rochelle afoot fare
 prayed would thither speed
 forward thence hackney need

 "almonio suspects ill

 finally wicked
 sir odoric took courage display
 well could rid thence
 great confidence

 xxiv
 "he remained us said
 corebo bilbao hight
 roof bred

 deemed thought harboured head
 could impart safety knight
 would prefer neglected trust
 pleasure friend

 xxv

 sign whereof naked brands rear
 sight drawn swords panic
 turn shortly gloomy wood fly

 xxvi
 "sir odoric war well taught bred
 gained blows vantage fray
 left corebo field dead
 following steps pursued way
 love lent unless misled
 pinions might overtake prey
 many prayer glozing flattery taught
 wherewith compliance might wrought

 xxvii
 "but vain fixed bent
 rather sate ill desire die
 menace vainly spent
 every prayer every flattery
 would open force content
 boots aught entreaties try 
 lord's faith wretch remind
 hands resigned

 xxviii
 "when perceived fruitless prayer
 could hope aid
 assailed like famished bear
 hands feet fierce resistance made
 brutal waxed plucked hair
 teeth nails visage flayed

 clamour echoes starry skies

 xxix
 "were chance conducted shriek
 might well heard league around
 wont shore seek

 saw crowd appear upon peak

 biscayan say sight
 abandoned design turned flight

 xxx
 "this rabble sir treacherous man
 comes aid guise
 homely saw falling pan
 fire beneath verify
 'tis true lost clan
 accursed minds iniquity
 violate person sought
 though nothing good virtuous wrought

 xxxi
 "but knew preserved maid
 yet higher price might crave
 eight months past ninth arrived since stayed
 alive languish grave
 hope lost zerbino's aid
 speech gather slave
 bartered merchant gold
 sultan shall sold"

 xxxii
 gentle damsel tale pursues
 sobs sighs oft interposing break
 soft angelic voice might infuse
 compassion asp venomed snake
 time piteous grief renews
 haply bitter anguish slake
 twenty men gloomy cavern fill
 armed huntingspear bill

 xxxiii
 squinting look dark one eye
 leader troop brutish cheer
 foremost company

 turned said "lo net
 another bird set"

 xxxiv
 county cried "i never knew
 man opportune wants stead
 know whether one
 perchance may announced pressing need
 fair arms  conjectured true 
 well goodly sable weed
 verily arrived season
 needs pursued losel repair"

 xxxv
 bitter smile upstarting feet
 orlando ruffian made reply
 "thou price chapman treat
 unmarked merchant's books arms shalt buy"
 snatched brand full heat
 smoke smouldering chimney nigh
 threw smote chance knave half blind
 nose meeting brows confined

 xxxvi
 brand discharged hit either brow
 severely left smite
 ill feature perished blow
 thief's sole minister light
 stroke content blind foe
 unsated save register sprite
 among damned souls charon keeps
 companions plunged boiling deeps

 xxxvii
 spacious table mid cavern stood
 two palms thickness figure square
 propt one huge ill fashioned food rude
 held thief harboured
 even freedom dart wood
 mark nimble spaniard launch air

 crowded close together stood crew

 xxxviii
 one belly crushed one breast
 another head arm leg thigh
 whence slain outright maimed rest

 'tis sometimes heavy stone oppressed

 battered heads loins winter done

 xxxix
 could say mischiefs offend

 safe grass drags slimy trail

 since good orlando's arm achieved deed

 xl
 board little maimed nought
 turpin says seven craven wise

 convenient purpose found

 xli

 old servicetree shadow throws

 xlii
 ancient woman assassin's friend
 escapes perceives dead
 threading green labyrinth without end

 stranger champion delay

 xliii

 xliv
 without encountering aught might appear

 xlv

 scower fruitful languedoc provence gay
 true duty executes aright
 sage leader valiant knight

 xlvi
 time long past lying place
 hoped rogero would appear
 beholding space
 many evil chances lived fear
 one day mid others woeful case
 lady wept alone drew near
 dame healing ring made sound
 bosom rankling alcina's wound

 xlvii
 saw without love returned
 time elapsed mission incomplete
 sore trembling faint pale heart yearned
 scarce strength stand upon feet
 enchantress kind discerned
 fear advanced smiles maid meet
 console glad visage wore
 messenger joyful tidings bore

 xlviii
 "fear thy rogero well
 safe cried ever worships thee
 wonted thy foe wizard fell
 yet deprives liberty
 behoves thee climb sell
 would'st thou posses follow
 thou wendest lead
 whither thee rogero shall freed"

 xlix
 next pursued relating
 frauds magic atlantes hoar
 wearing fair face seemed thrall

 gold enticed enchanted hall

 told dames cavaliers cheats
 thither make resort like deceits

 l
 seeing sage think see squire
 companion ladylove absent friend
 whatever several wight's desire
 since scope wishes never tend
 hence searching every tire
 labour sore frustrate end
 cannot desire hope deceive
 without missing good palace leave

 li
 "as soon thou pursued dame art near
 place built magic seat
 resembling thy rogero cheer
 every look atlantes thee shall meet
 make ill art appear
 suffering stronger arm defeat
 thou may'st aid peril feigned
 thus among others detained

 lii
 "to end thou may'st escape ambush
 many many thus betrayed
 fallen though rogero seem beware
 lend faith demand thine aid
 sage presents forbear
 take worthless life lifted blade
 think slay rogero blow
 works thee still cruel woe

 liii
 "hard seem slay full well know
 wight rogero descry
 truth lying show
 trust sight magic blears eye
 fix ere forest go
 change traitorous foe nigh
 never shall rogero wive
 weakly wizard leave alive"

 liv
 valorous maid intent slay
 false enchanter plan decides
 snatches arms follows way
 melissa sage confides
 thus fruitful field forest gray
 forced journeys enchantress guides
 studies beguile weary course
 ever best may sweet discourse

 lv
 fairest topic
 might grateful damsel's ear
 future offspring rogero's chose
 race demigods prince peer
 melissa secrets knows
 eternal gods rule sphere
 good enchantress discover
 many ages hence befall

 lvi
 "oh best guide" exclaimed damsel bold
 weirdwoman aid came
 "as thou hast many years foretold
 men shall glorify race name
 pray thee lady unfold
 praise virtues noble dame
 lineage shall rise"
 melissa courteously replies

 lvii
 "chaste dames thee descended survey
 mothers wear imperial crown
 mighty kings column stay
 glorious realms houses renown
 thy sons shine arms
 less fame deserve female gown
 piety sovereign prudence graced
 noble hearts incomparably chaste

 lviii
 "and length relate thee
 praise thy root ascend
 long tale would hold see
 could pass fame pretend
 thousand two three
 choose tale may end
 cave thy wish made known
 shadows might well shown

 lix
 "to hear one thy famed race prepare
 liberal studies good works engage
 know well fair
 may entitled chaste sage
 nobleminded isabel
 stands mincius' bank age
 shall gild town ocnus' mother hight
 glorious rays day night

 lx
 "where worthiest consort strain
 honoured splendid rivalry
 best shall prize virtues' goodly train
 widest ope gates courtesy
 taro naples' reign
 'tis said gauls delivered italy
 'twill replied penelope chaste
 beneath ulysses placed

 lxi
 "great things many thus sum
 brave dame others leave behind
 vulgar herd withdrew
 sage merlin hollow stone divined
 leave old typhis view
 sea launched wind
 finish prophetic strain
  blessings head skies rain

 lxii
 "with shall sister beatrice
 whose fortunes well shall name accord
 lives shall miss
 good heavens afford
 make partaker bliss
 first among wealthy dukes cherished lord
 shall hence receives call
 lowest depth misery fall

 lxiii
 "viscontis' serpents held dread
 moro sforza dame shall
 hyperborean snows billows red
 ind hills double sea
 afford passage lady dead
 sore mischief italy
 insubri slavery fall
 men shall sovereign wisdom fortune call

 lxiv
 "other illustrious name bear
 flourish many years
 pannonia's garland one shall wear
 another matron ausonian shore
 shall released earthly care
 men among blessed saints adore
 incense approach dame divine
 hang votive images shrine

 lxv
 "the others shall pass silence
 'twere much said sound
 fame though might well deserve high
 heroic trump praise wound
 hence biancas lucretias
 constances reserve found
 else repair upon italian land
 illustrious houses supporting hand

 lxvi
 "thy race shall else excel
 rare fortune women thrives
 daughters' honour tell
 lofty virtue wives
 thou may'st take note well
 merlin said thy descendents' lives
 haply story might narrate
 little covet relate

 lxvii
 "of good richarda first shall strain
 mirror chastity fortitude
 young remains widow disdain
 fortune oft awaits good
 exiles cheated father's reign
 shall behold children blood
 wandering clutches foe
 yet find last quittance woe

 lxviii
 "nor sprung ancient root aragon
 gorgeous queen silent
 prudent chaste none
 renowned greek latin history
 fortunate course run
 divine election
 shall goodly race princes swell
 alphonso hyppolite isabel

 lxix
 "the prudent eleanour spray
 grafted thy happy tree
 fruitful stepchild shall say
 succession next see
 lucretia borgia day day
 shall wax beauty virtue chastity
 fortune like youthful plant shoot
 yielding soil struck root

 lxx

 canto 14

 argument

 good princes bold barons lost

 ii
 bloody price victory
 small ground left triumphs prepare
 unconquered duke alphonso
 may modern things ancient deeds compare

 well worthily assigned wear

 iii

 iv

 follow far gorgeous oak

 fabricius preserved rome

 v
 rome's mighty column valiant hand
 taken kept entire praise shed
 predatory band

 masterless without banner fled
 arragon castile navarre

 vi
 dearbought victory brought relief
 joy event much outweighed

 dead fatal field surveyed
 swallowed one storm grief

 safeguard neighbouring lands
 poured frozen alps friendly bands

 vii
 present safety life held fear
 see assured us victory
 saved us wintry tempest drear
 would whelmed us jove's angry sky
 ill rejoice yet tear
 standing full many widow's eye

 viii

 ix

 lxx

 lxxii

 lxxiii

 lxxxviii

 way search silence pursue

 lxxxix

 extinguished former stay
 good habits used
 passed evil ones began stray

 xc

 harbour obscure close repair
 oft changes home company

 yet hope point thee
 sleep's house thou wilt midnight fare
 wilt thou surely find repose
 night ever harbour goes"

 xci

 like simple truth appears say
 angel yields tale belief flies
 forth monastery without delay
 tempers speed schemes withal wise
 finish appointed time way
 house sleep mansion blind
 full well knew silence may find

 xcii
 blest arabia lies pleasant vale
 removed village city's reach
 two fair hills o'ershadowed dale
 full ancient fir sturdy beech
 thither circling sun without avail
 conveys cheerful daylight breach
 rays make boughs spread thickly round
 cave runs ground

 xciii
 beneath shadow forest deep
 rock runs grotto wide
 widely wandering ivysuckers creep
 cavern's entrance multiplied
 harboured within grot lies heavy sleep
 ease corpulent gross upon side
 upon sloth earth made seat
 cannot go hardly keeps feet

 xciv

 lets none enter agnizes none
 message hears bears ground
 without distinction chases every one
 silence plays scout walks round
 equipt shoes felt mantle brown

 circuit dim retreat

 xcv

 brought sovereign's aid paris steer

 saracen cry shall hear

 ere fame arrival know"

 xcvi
 silence otherwise replied
 signing head obeyed
 took post behind heavenly guide
 one flight picardy conveyed
 angel moved bands valour tried
 short tedious distance made
 paris safe transports none
 conscious miracle done

 xcvii
 silence advancing troop kept skirting round
 front flank rear array

 impeding fog shrilling sound

 next hostile paynims went find
 know made deaf blind

 xcviii

 silence moved nought said
 heard upon paynim side

 throughout fair paris' suburbs beside

 make upon place worst assay

 xcix
 moorish monarch's force would tell
 charlemagne day meet

 time troubled waters highest swell
 mauritanian atlas' feet

 furtive works lovers heaven espies

 c
 larumbells loudsounding air
 stricken frequent blows town affray
 crowded temples every
 movement lips hands upraised pray
 seen treasure seemed god fair
 foolish thoughts upon day
 holy consistory bid mould
 every statue upon earth gold

 ci
 lamenting may heard aged
 reserved woe
 calling happy sacred dust
 buried many many year ago
 bold youths valiant robust
 small thought upon approaching ills bestow
 scorning elders' counsel
 hurrying fury walls repair

 cii
 might paladin baron ken
 king duke marquis count chivalry
 soldier foreigner citizen
 ready honour christ die
 eager assail saracen
 charlemagne lower bridges cry
 witnesses joy martial beat
 permit sally deems meet

 ciii
 ordered convenient post
 advance barbarians impede
 would ill suffice numerous host
 content speed
 worked machines wildfire tost
 ranged according separate need
 charles never one place restless care
 provides defence succour every

 civ
 paris seated spacious plain
 i' midst  heart france justly say
 stream flows forth
 first passing waters stray
 island form secure main
 better part dividing way
 two three separate quarters note
 within river girds without moat

 cv
 town whose walls miles circuit run
 might well attacked many side
 yet would assail one
 willingly scattered troops divide
 westward beyond stream troyano's son
 retired thence assailing bands guide
 neither city plain
 behind far spain

 cvi
 where'er walls paris wound
 large ammunition king charles purveyed
 strengthening dyke quarter held doubt
 within trench drain casemate made
 river entered went
 thickest chains across channel laid
 prudent cares appear
 greatest cause present fear

 cvii
 eyes argus pepin's valiant son
 agramant bent storm foresaw
 every thing forestalled ere yet begun
 bold followers mahound's law
 isolier grandonio falsiron
 serpentin balugantes ferrau
 beside spain led
 marsilius arms valiant head

 cviii
 old sobrino left seine
 pulian dardinel d'almontes meet
 oran's giant king swell train
 six cubits prince head feet
 move pen greater pain
 men move arms heat
 king rodomont exclaims blaspheming sore
 contain furious spirit

 cix
 swarming assail pastoral bowl
 sound stridulous wing summer sky
 relics feast luscious dole
 repair ready numbers fly
 starlings vineyard's crimsoning pole
 ripe clusters charged  heaven's concave high
 filling advanced noise shout
 fast hurried storm moorish rout

 cx
 upon walls christians array
 lance sword axe wildfire tost
 assaulted city guard without dismay
 little reck proud barbarian's boast
 death snatches away
 one fear refuse post
 fosse paynim foes
 return amid storm strokes blows

 cxi
 iron plied alone
 mighty masses whole bulwarks fall
 top tower huge piece bastion
 much toil disrupted solid wall
 streams boiling water pouring
 insufferably advancing paynims gall
 illresisted rain despite
 helmet makes way blinds sight

 cxii
 iron spear offended
 much mist limedust fine
 emptied vessel burning sore
 nitre sulphur pitch turpentine
 idle lie fiery hoops store

 foemen scaled upon hands
 form cruel garlands paynim bands

 cxiii

 fierce sarza's king driven accompanied

 seems setta's valiant monarch hide
 morocco's king cosco go
 men martial worth may know

 cxiv

 vermeil field lion shows

 submissive lion feigns

 curbs bit string
 doralice daughter grenada's king

 cxv

 related wise
 even sarza's monarch
 loved realm  beyond eyes

   first  story known
 even day would done

 cxvi

 two mannered round second rear
 urged first third second gored
 one mounts wall valour one fear
 attempt perforce dangerous ford
 cruel rodomont argier slays
 smites wretched laggard delays

 cxvii
 'tis thus 'mid fire ruin assay
 mount wall others assure
 safer passage seek
 least pain peril endure
 rodomont scorns way
 wend except least secure
 desperate case others made
 offerings cursed god prayed

 cxviii
 cuirass hard strong drest
 dragonskin scaly quilt
 erst secured manly back breast
 bold ancestor babel built
 hoped rule heaven god wrest
 would golden dome split
 perfect end alone made
 helmet shield well trenchant blade

 cxix

 proud untamed would forbear
 scale lofty firmament till night
 could wide world descry stair

 cxx

 'mid fire stone arbalests bows

 makes large daylight wheresoe'er speeds
 parting sedge breast tusk nose

 scorns wall alone braves sky

 cxxi

 wooden bartizan stands
 within city walls bridge bore
 roomy large king charles's christian bands
 many scull riven men take
 monkish tonsure warrior's hands

 runs streaming wall crimson blood

 cxxii

 wielding sword duke arnulph offends
 came whence briny bay
 water rapid rhine descends
 better sulphur keeps away
 advancing flame wretch life defends
 last shudder gives tumbles dead
 cleft downwards full palm neck head

 cxxiii
 one backstroke sir spineloccio true
 anselmo prando oldrado fell

 make widecircling blow fully tell
 first half flemings residue

 cxxiv

 cast ditch priest first

 like viper's blood venom immersed

 others unmentioned fall

 cxxvi

 find first defense small avail
 full well know danger dread
 within awaits foemen assail

 cxxvii

 war like valiant men stout

 interior summit stand rout
 gall lances whistling flight
 darts mighty multitude without
 many ween post would shun
 royal ulien's son

 cxxviii
 still heartened chid rest
 forced forward sore alarm
 one paynim's head cleft other's breast
 turned fly swarm

 cxxix

 cxxx

 lighting louder noise heard

 though pewter iron beat
 rather soft rind arms
 matchless force sword keen

 cxxxi
 idle laid
 snares inner moat wellcharged mine
 broom thick fascines paid
 swarthy pitch plenty intertwine
 though bank bank hollow line
 filling bottom wellnigh brink
 countless vessels defenders sink

 cxxxii
 charged saltpetre oil sulphur pale
 one like gear
 intent paynims assail

 inner bulwark's platform hear

 set fit points wildfire blaze

 cxxxiii

 scattered flames united one
 mounted height wellnigh dried

 dimmed every glimpse light hid sun

 like long peal thunder shook ground

 cxxxiv

 canto 15

 argument
 round paris every spread
 assailing hosts africa spain
 astolpho home logistilla sped
 binds first caligorantes chain
 next orrilo's trunk divides head
 sir aquilant warred vain
 gryphon bold next sansonet discerns
 ill tidings lady gryphon learns



 though conquest fruit skill fortune
 conquer always glorious thing
 'tis true indeed bloody victory
 chief less honour wont bring
 fair field famed eternally
 wins merits worshipping
 saving harm without
 loss followers puts foe rout

 ii
 sir earned worthy praise o'erbore
 lion might sea
 guarded either shore
 francolino mouth po
 though yet heard roar
 present fear forego
 fields fitly made plain
 rescued foemen slain

 iii
 paynim little skilled
 daring proper loss
 moat impelled meiny
 one perished burning fosse
 mighty gulf contained crew
 devouring sought cross
 dust flame reduced room
 might within crowded tomb

 iv
 twenty thousand warriors thither sent
 died nineteen thousand fiery pit
 fosse descended ill content
 leader willed little wit
 extinguished amid blaze spent
 devouring flame christians lit
 rodomont occasion woes
 exempted mighty mischief goes

 v
 inner bank foes possest
 across ditch vaulted wonderously
 within among rest
 sure last assault eye
 turns wildfires infest
 infernal vale sees ascend high
 hears people's moan dying screams
 imprecations dread heaven blasphemes

 vi
 band king agramant brought
 make fierce assault upon gate
 cruel battle fought
 wherein many sufferers met fate
 haply unprovided thought
 fitting guard upon monarch wait
 king bambirago 'mid knights price
 baliverso sink every vice

 vii
 corineus mulga prusion
 wealthy monarch blessed isles
 malabuferzo fills throne
 fez perpetual summer smiles
 noble lords many one
 wellarmed tried others 'mid files
 naked base whose hearts martial fields
 found shelter thousand shields

 viii
 things counter hopes ensue

 person girded gallant crew

 bavaria's duke ganelon

 ix
 inferior count withal horde
 lombards french germans without end
 every one presence lord
 rank among valiantest contend
 another place record
 mighty duke perforce attend
 signs far prays
 omit history

 x
 'tis time measure back way
 thither astolpho left yore
 long exile loathing stay
 burnt desire tread native shore
 hopes given sober fay
 quelled alcina better lore
 care would send warrior back
 securest freest track

 xi
 thus barque fitted
  better galley never ploughed sea
 logistilla wills aye doubt
 hinderance alcina's treachery

 chaste sophrosina shall
 till arabian sea beneath care
 persian gulf safe repair

 xii
 scyth indian prefers peer
 coast nabataean reign
 content round veer

 angry winds aye vex rude domain
 ill seasons favoured sun
 months together light none

 xiii
 next readiness espied
 license depart prudent fay
 accorded duke first fortified
 counsel things long say
 might charms stayed
 place whence could wend way
 useful book fair purveyed
 ever love wear prayed

 xiv
 man guard magic cheats

 end beginning treats
 index appendix showed

 hear clang betake flight

 xv

 wheresoe'er 'tis heard fly fear
 world one heart sound

 wind thunder shock rives ground

 gift fairy took leave

 xvi

 odoriferous ind vessels turn
 opening thousand isles either hand
 scattered sea till discern
 land thomas pilot veers
 ready tiller northward steers

 xvii

 marks coasts wealthy land ease

 nigh skirting golden chersonese

 frith chafes double shore
 makes distant cochin favouring wind
 issues beyond boundaries ind

 xviii

 faithful secure cavalier

  could wight loosed indian strand

 xix
 andronica england's duke replies
 "know earth girt seas
 one another yield supplies
 whether circling waters boil freeze
 since aethiops' land us lies
 extending southward many long degrees
 across waters one supposed
 barrier neptune interposed

 xx
 "hence bark levant ind none
 weighs shape course europe's shore
 navigates europe one
 oriental regions explore
 fain retrace alike course begun
 mid land extending wide
 weening limits length appear
 must join another hemisphere

 xxi
 "but course circling years view
 farthest lands catch western ray
 new argonauts put forth tiphys new
 opening till undiscovered way
 others see coast afric pursue
 far negroes' burning shore
 pass far sign whence return
 sun moves hither leaving capricorn

 xxii
 "and find limit length land
 makes single sea appear two
 scouring frigates every strand
 pass ind arab isles persian
 others see leave either hand
 banks stout alcides cleft two
 manner circling sun
 seek new lands new creations run

 xxiii
 "the imperial flags holy cross know
 fixed verdant shore see upon
 shattered barks keep guard others go
 afield new countries
 ten chase thousand flying foe

 see wheresoe'er warriors wend
 fifth charles' triumphant captains bend

 xxiv
 "that way hidden god's
 old ere 'twas known long time run
 suffer discovery till
 sixth seventh century done
 delays purpose fulfil
 would subject world one
 justest fraught prudent lore
 emperors since augustus

 xxv

 left bank rhine monarch bred
 sovereign famed history
 whose goodly deeds heard read
 astraea reinthroned 
 rather restored life long seeming dead
 virtues exile sent
 shall recalled banishment

 xxvi

 designs imperial garland bear 
 augustus' trajan's mark's severus' crown
 every farthest land wear
 extends yet unknown

 wills time christ's scattered sheep
 one flock beneath one shepherd's keep

 writ skies eternity

 ere outlet could arrive

 xlii

 xliii

 pursued hermit bloody seat

 memphis' tombs already near 
 memphis renowned pyramids sight
 marks populous cairo opposite

 lxii

 see drag unmeasured wight along

 "that one weak could master one strong"
 scarce astolpho put press aside

 lxxii

 lxxiii

 lxxiv

 lxxvi

 discern ready supper duly laid
 fast refreshing fountain played

 lxxvii
 bid bind giant green
 fasttethered strong weighty chain
 tough oak whose ancient trunk ween
 may well proof single strain
 ten good serjeants overseen
 lest night get loose train

 lxxviii
 abundant sumptuous board
 costly viands least pleasure fraught
 longest topic discourse afford

 lxxix

 prescribed remedy spell
 one hair deprived pest
 could battle hope quell
 plucked sheared breast

 lxxx

 lxxxii

 piecemeal shares maims felon round

 though hundred fragments hewed

 lxxxiii

 one stroke shoulders
 chin lopt away helm head

 upstream along nile's margin hies

 lxxxiv
 fool marked warrior's feat
 searching dust find head
 heard charger retreat
 forest plunder fled

 duke borne mouth away

 lxxxv
 yet pleased astolpho like guise
 borne heels pursues flowing rein

 distances mighty length plain

 poll front eyebrows twain

 makes orrilo's immortality

 lxxxvi
 amid innumerable locks hair
 straiter crisper rest seen
 good astolpho care
 slay thief many choose
 "to cut said better were"
 since scissors lacked razor keen
 wanting resorted glaive
 cut well might said shave

 lxxxvii
 holding nose severed head
 closesheared behind eke
 found among rest fatal thread
 pale became visage changing sore
 turned eyes signals sore dread
 last agony nature wore
 headless body seated sell
 shuddered last courser fell

 lxxxviii
 duke returns champions two
 dames left trophy hand
 manifests death tokens true
 shows distant body sand
 know pleasure view
 though welcome demeanour bland
 intercepted victory might pain
 perchance inflict upon envying twain

 lxxxix

 pleasure could battle's issue see
 since kind dames would delay
 doleful fate shortly
 france brethren's lot fray
 fierce orrilo matched warriors free
 occupy pair cast
 till sad influence skies past

 xc
 castellan certified
 damietta thief dead
 loosed carrier pigeon tied

 usage egypt
 hours joyful tidings flew

 xci
 brought adventure end

 though way wishes tend
 whet purpose need spur

 rights charles roman emperor
 would cease war upon eastern strand
 would seek honour native land

 xcii
 gryphon aquilant thus bid adieu
 one lady fair
 though sorely troubled ill knew
 resist wishes pair
 duke together warlike two
 turns right resolved worship
 god erst incarnate dwelt holy places
 ere cherished france way retraces

 xciii
 warriors lefthand might incline
 plainer full pleasant cheer
 still along sea extends line
 take righthand path abrupt drear
 since chief city palestine
 six days' journey near
 water along rugged track
 grass needful matters lack

 xciv
 enter road
 needful collect lay
 upon giant's back bulky load
 could tower upon neck convey
 holy land mountainsummit showed
 finishing rough salvage way
 heavenly love willing offering stood
 washed away errors blood

 xcv
 entrance city view
 gentle stripling three
 agnize sir sansonet mecca
 youth's flower sovereign chivalry
 sovereign goodness famed country
 wise beyond years paganry
 converted orlando truth
 hands baptized youth

 xcvi
 designing fortilage front
 egypt's caliph warrior found
 wall two miles length mount
 calvary intending surround
 received countenance wont
 inward love surest ground
 conducted royal home
 comfort harboured dome

 xcvii
 deputy sainted land swayed
 conferred charlemagne trust
 english duke present made
 sturdy unmeasured beast
 ten draught horse burdens conveyed
 monstrous giant next gave
 net took unwieldy slave

 xcviii
 quittance sansonet sword bear
 gave rich girdle astolpho bold
 spurs either heel costly pair
 bucklers rowels made gold
 'twas believed warrior's relicts
 freed damsel dragon old
 spoils sir sansonet many
 joppa took city bore

 xcix
 cleansed errors monastery
 whence odour good works upwent
 christ's passion every mystery
 contemplating churches went
 eternal infamy

 europe rings arms martial deeds
 war everywhere needs

 c
 grace warlike three devoutly sought
 intent pardon pious lore

 ci
 misfortune one lovely feature
 sir gryphon worshipped origilla hight
 fairer visage better stature
 one among thousand meets sight
 faithless evil nature
 thou mightst town city search outright
 continent island far near
 yet never think wouldst find peer

 cii
 constantine's imperial city burned
 fierce fever left fair
 hoped find place returned
 lovelier ever enjoy
 antioch warrior learned
 another leman made repair
 thinking fresh youth yet
 'twere thing brook  sleep alone

 ciii
 sir gryphon time heard news
 evermore bemoaned day night
 whatever pleasure wight pursues
 seems vex troubled sprite
 let reflect mischief woos
 keenly tempered love's darts might
 heavier ills torment fell
 ashamed grief tell

 civ
 aquilant oft
 reproved passion nursed
 sought banish heart's core
  bad women worst

 mostly selfconceit sense abuses

 cv

 far antioch bear away

 shall aye told next tell
 effected befell


 canto 16

 argument
 gryphon finds traitorous origilla nigh
 damascus city martano vile

 never exprest wiss



 love's penalties manifold dread
 endured greater part
 cost well read
 speak 'twere art
 hence say ever said
 speech living page thoughts impart
 "one ill grievous another light"
 yield belief deem judgment right

 ii
 say said live say
 "he fettered worthy chain
 though desire lady gainsay
 every way averse suit disdain
 though love deprive praised pay
 long time trouble spent vain
 heart placed well worthily
 needs lament though waste die"

 iii
 let lament plays slavish part
 two bright eyes lovely tresses please
 beneath beauties lurks wanton heart
 little pure much lees
 wretch would fly bears dart
 like wounded stag whichever way flees
 dares confess yet cannot quench flame
 worthless love shame

 iv
 youthful gryphon finds case
 sees error cannot right
 sees vilely heart place
 faithless origille vain delight
 yet evil use doth sovereign reason chase
 free subdued appetite
 though foul mind lady's actions speak
 wheresoe'er must gryphon seek

 v
 resuming fair history say
 city secret rode
 brother would plan bewray
 oft vain reproof bestowed
 left t'wards ramah shaped way
 level easy road
 six days' journey damascus brought
 whence setting anew antioch sought

 vi
 nigh damascus met lover
 perfidious origilla's heart possest
 matched evil customs two
 like stalk flower either's breast
 lodged fickle heart dame untrue
 traitor loved best
 lovers hid nature base
 others' cost beneath courteous face

 vii
 relate cavalier
 came huge courser trapped mickle pride
 faithless origille gorgeous gear
 gold embroidered azure dyed

 one fair pomp semblance went
 towards damascus tournament

 viii
 damascus' king splendid festival
 days bid solemnly proclaim
 pomp could upon call
 thither shining arms champions came
 gryphon's sight harlot's spirits fall

 knows lover force breath
 save sir gryphon threatening death

 ix
 like cunning audacious quean
 although quakes head foot fear

 face signs dread appear

 xi

 thou wast journeying plenar court
 cheer  left fever sore infected

 nigh right hand transfixt breast

 xii

 guards thou convey
 sent brother goes
 honour safe protecting stay
 encounter thee bestows
 blessings weigh
 good time hadst thou longer stayed
 lord died hope delayed"

 xiii
 wicked woman full subtlety
 worse fox crafty hardihood
 pursues well shapes history
 wholly throws blame gryphon good
 makes believe
 kin alone flesh blood

 knight less credits luke john

 forbore reproach pay

 lover lady gay
 deemed excuse sufficient
 turning portion blame away
 real brother profest

 returned sir gryphon made report

 within place would hold splendid court
 baptized infidel appear

 wrong time feast endures

 shall steadfastly pursue lore
 famed one single perfidy
 thousands thousands betrayed

 ill appears furious hate slake

 canto 17

 argument
 charles goes king rodomont
 gryphon norandino's tournament
 mighty deeds martano turns front
 showing recreant natural bent
 next gryphon bring affront
 stole knight arms went
 hence kindly monarch much esteemed
 gryphon scorned martano deemed



 god outraged rank iniquity
 whenever crimes past remission's bound
 mercy may justice mingled
 monstrous destructive tyrants crowned
 gifted force subtlety
 sinful world punish confound
 marius sylla end nursed
 rome two neros caius cursed

 ii
 domitian latter antonine
 lifted lowest rabble's lees
 imperial place puissance maximine
 hence thebes cruel creon bent knees
 mezentius ruled subject agiline
 fattening fields blood pests like
 italy given later day
 lombard goth hun bleeding prey

 iii
 shall fierce attila say
 wicked ezzeline hundreds
 men still trod crooked way
 god sent pain torment sore
 made clear assay
 well lived days yore
 consigned ravening wolves ordained keep
 us illnurturing unuseful sheep

 iv
 served fill
 hungry maw invite foreign wood
 beyond mountain wolves greedier
 partakers food
 bones thrasymene trebbia fill
 cannae seem strewed
 fattened field bank way
 adda mella ronco tarro stray

 v
 god permits feel spite
 people haply worse
 errors multiplied infinite
 foul pestilent iniquity
 time come may ill requite
 upon shores shall better
 transgressions ever prove
 long endurance aeternal love

 vi
 christian people god's placid front
 must disturbed excesses sore
 since slaughter rape rapine hunt
 quarters plundering turk moor
 unsparing rage rodomont
 proves worse ills endured
 said charlemagne made repair
 search towards city square

 vii
 charles way people's butchery
 beholds  burnt palaces ruined fanes 
 sees large portion city lie
 unexampled wreck  "ye coward trains
 whither heartless panic would ye fly
 none loss contemplate remains
  place refuge say left
 shamefully reft

 viii
 "then shall one man alone prisoned foe
 cannot scale walls round spread
 unscathed unquestioned city go
 vengeful arm laid dead"
 thus charlemagne whose veins anger glow
 shame strong brook fury said
 spacious square made good way
 beheld foe people slay

 ix
 thither large portion populace
 climbing palace roof made resort
 strongly walled furnished place
 ammunition long support
 rodomont mad pride chace
 scared burghers singly cleared court
 one daring hand scorned world
 brandished sword  wildfire hurled

 x
 smote thundered 'mid fearful shower
 sublime royal house's gate
 life's peril crumbling roof tower
 tost summit wait
 fears ruin hall bower
 wood stone endure one common fate
 marbled column slab gilded beam
 sire grandsire held high esteem

 xi
 rodomont stands portal bright
 steel head bust secured mail
 like serpent issued light
 cast slough diseased stale
 ever joying might
 renewed youth proud polished scale
 darts three tongues fire flashing eyes
 every frighted beast flies

 xii
 bulwark stone arbalest bow
 upon paynim smote beside
 sufficed arrest sanguinary foe
 broke hewed shook portal wide
 fury let daylight
 'twas easy espy  might spied 
 visages o'ercast deathlike sort
 full people palace court

 xiii
 fair chambers echoed shouts dread
 feminine lament dame distrest
 grieving house pale women fled
 wept afflicted sore beat breast
 hugged doorpost genial bed
 soon stranger lords possest
 matter state peril hung
 thither came king peers among

 xiv
 charles turned round vigorous hand
 found former peril true
 "are erst stand
 'gainst agolant aspramont
 vigour spent said band
 troyano almontes slew
 hundreds fear face
 one blood race

 xv
 "why contest foe
 less strength behold might
 upon hound pursued monarch show
 hound preys man  generous sprite
 thought death  approach fast slow 
 dies well holds cheap light
 doubt fortune ill
 succour conquered still"

 xvi
 said spurred courser couched spear
 charged paynim life less free
 sir ogier joined king career
 namus oliver three
 avino avolio otho berlinghier
 one without rest never see
 bosom flanks front
 smote together king rodomont

 xvii
 let us sir love heaven forego
 anger death noisome lore
 deemed said enow
 saracen
 cruel strong 'tis time trace go
 gryphon left origille
 damascus' gate came
 adulterer brother dame

 xviii
 cities eastern skies
 wealthy populous fairly dight
 'tis said damascus distant lies
 salem seven days' journey fair site
 fertile plain abundant fruits supplies
 winter summer sojourn delight
 shading city dawning day
 mountain intercepts early ray

 xix
 two crystal streams wealthy city scower
 whose currents parted many rill
 infinite gardens never bare flower
 stript leaf grateful murmur fill
 'tis said perfumed waters power
 plenteously swell turn mill
 whoever wander streets
 scent issuing home cloud sweets

 xx
 highstreet gay signs triumph wore
 covered showy cloths different dye
 deck walls sylvan leaves store
 scented herbs upon pavement lie
 adorned every window every door
 carpeting finest drapery
 ladies fair richly drest
 costly jewels gorgeous vest

 xxi
 within city gates frolic sport
 many seen ply festive dance
 burghers better sort
 upon gay welltrapt coursers prance
 fairer show remains sumptuous court
 barons bold vassals advance
 garnished could procured ore
 pearl ind erythraean shore

 xxii
 forward sir gryphon pricked array
 surveying whole ease
 knight arrested way
 wont natural courtesies
 obliged beneath palaceroof stay
 let nought wanting might please
 chearfully guests bath restored
 next welcomed costly supperboard

 xxiii
 told norandino hight
 damascus syria's kingdom swayed
 native foreigner bade invite
 sword knighthood laid
 fair joust morrow's light
 ensuing square made
 might show without faring
 valour equal bearing

 xxiv

 accepts challenge cavalier

 evil use make worth appear
 questioned solemnity
  'twere wonted feast held every year
 new emprise martial course

 xxv
 "the gorgeous feast monarch display
 fourth succeeding moon" baron said
 "this first survey
 none held beside cause bred
 solemn usage day
 king sovereign peril saved head
 four months consumed doleful wise
 'mid tears groans death eyes

 xxvi
 "our monarch named king norandine
 fully matter recite
 many many year pine
 damsels fair bright
 king cyprus' daughter fine
 espoused bride dame knight
 wait upon home fair array
 towards syrian realm shaped way

 xxvii
 "but scoured fell carpathian sea
 flowing sheet distance shore
 storm assailed us cruelty
 tempest even scared pilot hoar
 drifting three days nights random
 devious course 'mid threatening waves explore
 wet weary land 'mid verdant hills
 wellshaded refreshing rills

 xxviii
 "we pavilions pitch 'mid groves
 joyfully strain awnings overhead

 seeking red deer goat fallowbuck doe

 chace expect lord's return
 approaching us along shore astound
 orc fearful monster discern
 god grant fair sir never may confound
 eyesight semblance foul stern
 better fame hear
 behold approaching near

 xxx
 "to calculate griesly monster's height
 measureless exceeds skill
 fungushue place orbs sight
 sockets two small bones like berries fill

 guise brach enters trail

 eyesight winds plunder gale

 xxxii

 flying swifter pest
 south wind forty ten pain

 canto 18

 argument
 gryphon venged sir mandricardo goes
 search argier's king charles wins fight
 marphisa norandino's men o'erthrows
 due pains martano's cowardice requite
 favouring wind marphisa's gallery blows

 find monarch dardinello dead



 high minded lord actions evermore
 reason lauded still laud
 though style inapt rustic lore
 large portion praise defraud
 many virtues one
 others heart tongue applaud
  man gracious audience finds
 easy faith equal judgment blinds

 ii
 often shield absent one blame
 hear thing adduce
 let least audience claim
 still one ear open excuse
 dooming men scaith shame
 see hear ever use
 ere judge another many day
 month year sentence delay

 iii

 v

 vi

 moulders iron life short
  marsh cause  nature certainly
 wrongs famagosta poisoning sort

 cxl

 cxlii

 canto 19

 argument

 beloved one know
 top fortune's wheel seated
 since true faithless friends show
 equal faith glad estate greeted

 even death performs faithful part

 ii
 heart seen outward cheer
 court held sovereign grace
 lord little dear
 parts reversed would fill other's place
 humble man greater would appear
 first hindmost race
 medoro's faithful story said
 youth loved lord alive dead

 iii
 closest path amid forest gray
 save pursued youth forlorn
 schemes marred delay
 sore weight upon shoulders born
 place knew mistook way
 hid sheltering thorn
 secure distant mate
 greenwood shade lighter shoulders flew

 iv
 far cloridan advanced
 heard boy longer wind
 marked absence medore
 seemed heart left behind
 "ah negligent" moor
 exclaimed "so far beside blind
 medoro without thee fare
 know deserted thee where"

 v
 saying wood disappears
 plunging maze hurried pace
 thither whence lately issued steers
 desperate death returns trace
 cries tread steeds hears
 word tread foemen chase
 lastly medoro voice known

 vi

 zerbino leads bids followers seize

 keeps among trees

 vii

 viii

 ind learned chirurgery

 xlv

 xlvi

 among shoals"  reckoning nigh

 whose coast makes many patrons weep sigh"

 l

 full four days helpless plight

 li

 lii

 sable mouth fiercely blew
 bore swift stream strong
 vext waters hurried
 tumbling waves shattered bark along
 faster gentle falcon ever flew

 would transport bark wreck sink

 liii

 bids cast spars veer away

 twothirds furious course delay

 whose lights upon gunwale play

 liv
 driven syria laiazzo's bay

 pale turns patron's visage dismay
 perceives neighbouring land
 port shelter hie
 yet keep open sea fly

 lv
 cannot fly yet keep sea
 mast yards gone stroke
 huge billows beating frequently
 loosened plank beam timber broke
 certain death make port would
 doomed perpetual yoke
 made slave sentenced dead
 thither evil chance error led

 lvi
 sore dangerous 'twas doubt lest hostile band
 sally puissant town sight
 armed barks upon lay hand
 evil case sea worse fight
 time patron knows command
 give inquires english knight
 kept mind suspended sort
 first made port

 lvii
 relates patron crew
 murderous women tenanted shore
 ancient law enslave slew

 could eschew

 lviii
 brings end former feat

  first second labour meet 
 liberty band achieves
 must stay wed
 ten wives selected bed

 lix
 strange custom neighbouring strand
 without laugh astolpho cannot hear
 sansonet marphisa near hand
 next aquilant brother dear
 arrive patron land
 aye keeps aloof explains cause fear
 cries "i liefer sea would choke
 servitude endure yoke"

 lx
 sailors patron's rede abide
 passengers affrighted sore
 save marphisa took side
 deemed safer shore
 sea raging round far wide
 hundred thousand swords dismayed
 little place alarms
 power wield arms

 lxi
 warriors impatient land
 boldest english peer
 knowing soon horn clear strand
 scared foe pealing sound shall hear
 put neighbouring port band
 desires strife fear
 strongest sort
 compel patron makes port

 lxii
 already bark first espied
 sea within cruel city's view
 observed galley well supplied
 practised mariners numerous crew
 uncertain counsels divide
 make wretched ship billows
 lofty prow short stern low
 lash port vessel tow

 lxiii
 thitherward worked warp oar
 rather assistance sail
 since lay starboard course larboard
 means left cruel gale
 rugged rhind champions wore
 girding faithful falchion mail
 unceasing hope comfort fed
 master mariners opprest dread

 lxiv
 like halfmoon projected beach
 four miles city's port
 six hundred paces deep crowning
 horn circling fort
 every side secure storm breach
 save south safe resort
 guise theatre town extended
 hill behind ascended

 lxv
 sooner harboured ship seen
 news spread already land
 thitherward martial garb mien
 six thousand women trooped bow hand
 remove hope flight
 one castle drew band
 strong chains barks port enclosed
 ever use kept disposed

 lxvi
 dame cumean sybil gray
 hector's ancient mother renown
 made call patron bade say
 lives willing lay
 content beneath yoke stay
 according custom town
  one two evils must choose  slain
 captives one must remain

 lxvii
 " 'tis true one bold might
 found amid crew" matron said
 "that ten men engage fight
 cruel battle lay dead
 ten women one night
 suffice play husband's part bed

 canto 20

 argument

 great fears women antiquity

 worthy works memory

 ii
 women reached pinnacle glory
 every art professed well seen
 whosoever turns leaf story
 finds record neither dim mean
 evil influence transitory
 long deprived world
 envious men never knew
 worth haply hid honours due

 plainly seems age
 women celebrity
 may furnish matter page
 whence dispersed future years shall
 ye evil tongues foully rage

 shall much marphisa's worth outgo

 refused disclose martial name

 since pleases cause unfold

 "i escape confident withal

 lxxviii
 "i wot woman known

 gladly entertained classed one

 unshared hither came

 remain leave rest slavery"

 lxxix
 speeches marphisa made
 showed restrained arm
 respect safety bore
 companions wrath might harm
 alone withheld form taking sore
 signal vengeance female swarm
 hence left guido's care shape
 seemed fittest means escape

 lxxx
 sir guido speaks night alery
 faithful wives hight
 needs long prayer make dame agree

 takes ship arms bark sea
 stowed richest chattels flight
 feigning design soon dawn ensues
 sail companions cruise

 lxxxi
 guido's palace
 bid sword spear shield cuirass bear
 intent furnish store
 merchants sailors half naked
 watch repose upon floor
 rest guard among share
 oft marking still harness backs
 ruddy yet light orient wax

 lxxxii
 yet earth's hard visage sun
 lifted veil dim dingy dye
 scarcely lycaon's child furrow done
 turned ploughshare sky
 theatre women run
 would fearful battle's end espy
 swarming bees upon threshold cluster
 bent change realm springtide muster

 lxxxiii
 warlike trumpet drum sound horn
 people make land welkin roar
 summoning thus chieftain return
 end unfinished warfare covered o'er
 arms stand aquilant gryphon stern
 redoubted duke england's shore
 marphisa dudo sansonet
 knights footmen harboured hall

 lxxxiv
 hence descend towards sea port
 way across place combat lies
 passage long short
 sir guido companions cries
 ceased comrades exhort
 best set forth silent wise
 place appeared amid throng
 head squad hundred strong

 lxxxv
 toward gate sir guido went
 hurrying band gathered far nigh
 mighty multitude aye intent
 smite clad arms descry
 comrades leads perceive bent
 truly deem fly
 thought betake bows
 portal part knight oppose

 lxxxvi
 sir guido cavaliers go
 beneath champion's guidance
 others bold marphisa slow
 strike laboured hard force door

 dealing sides death wounding sore
 rained fury troop forlorn
 feared last encounter skaith scorn

 lxxxvii
 proof corslet warrior wore
 without would worse fear
 sansonnet's horse slain bore

 canto 21

 argument
 zerbino gabrina heart
 asp appears bear contends o'erthrown

 ii

 one thousand men united

 lxii
 "in condition think sir remained

 lxiii

 clutches partridge eat

 o'ertaken defrauded meat
 ill gain intent leech lieu

 hear thus sovereign wickedness dare
 like fate greedy miscreant's share

 lxiv

 counteract pest bore

 might use secret cunning lore
 wicked dame would concede
 forbidding issue thence
 patient's stomach juice digest
 restoring power manifest

 lxv
 "no prayer move offered price buy

 sure follow quickly changed part
 told story standersby
 could cover art

 goodly doctor done

 lxvi
 "and follows soul brother true
 hence already freed gone
 assistants matter knew

 took abominable monster
 cruel beast forest hoar
 prisoned darksome place reserved

 said hermonides pursued
 tale told prison fled
 suffered wound pang shrewd

 could thence borne way

 lxviii

 else preserved honour clear

 men utmost might

 lxix
 might thing beside

  wish cavalier replied

 loved rogero's fond embrace
 time never mind efface

 could go one stead
 send vallombrosa devised

 next concerned would intend
 might bridal bring happy end

 xxvi
 purposed messenger bear
 well rogero good steed

 xxxiii

 streight ill declivity

 canto 24

 argument
 odorico's gabrina's guilt repaid
 youthful zerbino sets large train
 defence good orlando's blade
 afterwards mandricardo slain
 isabel weeps rodomont made
 war tartar king truce
 succour agramant array
 lilies wellnigh prey



 let make haste feet disengage
 lime wings love made prize
 love fine nought phrensied rage
 universal suffrage wise
 albeit may show sage
 roland sin guise
 proves folly shelf
 thus another destroy oneself

 ii
 various love's effects one source
 issue though lead different way
 'twere forest parforce
 enter recess go astray
 pursue devious course
 sum conclusion say
 grows old love besides pain
 waits passion well deserves chain

 iii
 one may well reproach "brother thou
 seest thy faults thou dost others fit"
  answer see mine plain enow
 lucid interval wit
 strive hope withal shall forego
 dance folly yet cannot quit
 quickly would faults
 disease reached bone

 iv
 canto said
 orlando furious insensate wight
 torn arms vest wore
 cast away faulchion bright
 uptorn trees made forest hoar
 hollow cave resound rocky height
 towards noise shepherds side
 heavy sins evil planets guide

 v
 viewing madman's wonderous feats near
 frighted band rustics turned fled
 disorder knew
 happens oftentimes sudden dread
 madman thought rear
 seizes shepherd plucks head
 easily one might take
 apple tree blossom brake

 vi
 one leg heavy trunk air
 upheaved made mace rest bray
 astounded upon earth stretched one pair
 haply may awake last day
 rest well awake last day
 rest well advised nimble
 desert field scour away
 madman pursuit deferred
 turned already herd

 vii
 examples warned rustic crew
 abandoned fields pick scythe plough
 roof house temple flew
 ill secure elm willow's bough
 hence maniac's horrid rage view
 dealing kick bite scratch blow
 horses oxen slew helpless prey
 well courser ran 'scaped day

 viii
 already might'st thou hear loudly ring
 hubbub din neighbouring farms
 outcry horn rustic trumpeting
 faster sound bells various arms
 thousands spontoon bow spit sling
 lo hills rough militia swarms
 many peasants vale
 make rude war upon madman go

 ix
 beats wave upon saltsea shore
 sportive first southern wind stirred
 next bigger went
 bigger second breaks third
 vext water waxes evermore
 louder beach surf heard
 crowd increasing count assail
 drop mountain ascend dale

 x
 twice ten peasants slaughtered mood
 charging disarray slain
 experiment right clearly showed
 stand aloof safest train
 none body could draw blood
 iron smote impassive skin vain
 heaven's king preserved count scathe
 make guardian holy faith

 xi
 would peril day
 made vulnerable mould
 might learned 'twas cast away
 sword weaponless play bold
 rustic troop retreated fray
 seeing stroke upon madman told
 since enemy attends
 orlando neighbouring township wends

 xii
 since every one left place dread
 wight found within small great
 homely food plenty spread
 victual well sorting pastoral state

 xiii

 canto 27

 argument
 good rogero paynims three
 defeated charlemagne paris flies
 already throughout chivalry
 mad spite hatred jars arise
 strife means still enmity
 sovereign unable devise
 departs monarch argier
 rejected lady dear



 woman part reasons best
 upon sudden motion untaught
 special grace sex blest
 'mid many gifts wherewith 'tis fraught
 man less nimble wit possest
 ill counsel save sober thought
 ruminates thereon content spend
 care time trouble mature end

 ii
 seemed good counsel ill indeed
 malagigi's said
 albeit rescued need
 cousin richardet odds o'erlaid
 paynim monarchs freed
 ready demon hest obeyed
 sure never deemed borne
 would work christian army scorn

 iii

 yet brought christian host foes

 vii

 xxii

 xxxii

 xxxiii

 xxxiv

 faithful english french german train
 whose slaughtered bodies overspread plain

 xxxv

 rather eyes marked event
 appeared throughout thwart high intent

 xxxvi

 vii

 hear said every one

 ix

 x

 xi
 "faustus set forth days' ride
 reached rome paternal mansion gained
 entreaties brother plied

 wrought well though difficult guide
 silent even young jocundo's wife remained
 showing good would thence ensue
 besides gratitude would due

 xii
 "jocundo names time wend way
 servingmen meanwhile purveys steeds

 beside night day
 aye weeping lord lady reads
 knows ever sustain
 long absence die pain

 xiii
 "for mere thought produced misery
 seemed ravished heart's core
  `alas love jocundo cried let
 thy sorrows'  weeping evermore 
 `so may journey prosper thee
 return ere yet two months o'er
 day o'erpass term prescribed
 though king half kingdom bribed'

 xiv
 "this brought troubled consort small content
 period distant said
 'twould mighty wonderment
 return found dead
 grief day night bosom rent
 lady neither slept fed
 pity oft youth repented
 brother's wishes consented

 xv
 "she neck unloosed costly chain
 gemmed cross holy reliques bore
 one pilgrim bohemia's reign
 gathered upon many distant shore
 sire sickness entertain
 returning jerusalem yore
 hence made dying pilgrim's heir
 undoes gives lord wear

 xvi
 "and round neck entreats sake
 chain memory wind
 gift husband well pleased take
 token needs love bind
 neither time absence e'er shake
 whatsoever fortune behind
 memory rooted fast deep
 still kept death keep

 xvii

 fixt journey sore dismay
 husband deemed arms would die
 wife wend way
 slumbered last goodbye
 bade yet lacked hour day
 mounted nag journey sped

 xviii

 jewelled cross recalled mind
 beneath pillow bestowed

 `alas youth bethought mode
 shall excuse omission find
 consort shall deem
 little unbounded love esteem

 little value exprest

 argument

 rehearsed tale often turpin heard
 handed us wondrous word

 lvii
 marvels count bends

 seeking long path length descends
 towards south upon land spain
 way along beach wends
 near arragon beside rumbling main
 ever prompted phrensy rank
 make dwelling bank

 lix

 lxxi

 may follow ease led

 whenever hunger distrest

 canto 30

 argument

 ii
 like sick man sore bested
 suffering patience many many day

 yields rage curses pain give way

 left willful rage rue
 cannot done undo

 canto 31

 argument
 rinaldo dudon fight friendship make
 fitting honour pay
 agramant's host united champions break
 scatter like chaff disarray
 brandimart wages war roland's sake
 rodomont loses fray
 good baiardo pain
 contend rinaldo sericane



 sweeter gladder state could possest
 falls enamoured bosom's share
 happier mode life lot blest
 evermore chains love wear
 lover 'mid joys distrest
 suspicious fear cruel care
 martyrdom racks suffering sprite
 phrensied rage jealousy hight

 ii
 bitters else interpose
 enjoyment choicest sweet
 love augmented perfection grows
 takes finer edge drink eat
 hunger thirst palate dispose
 flavour beverage meat
 feebly wight estimate charms
 peace never knew pain arms

 iii
 heart aye sees though undiscerned
 human eye support peace
 long absent love returned
 longer absence joy's increase
 service may endured though nought earned
 hope guerdon cease
 worthy service end paid
 albeit wages long delaid

 iv
 scorn repulse finally pain
 suffering love every martyrdom
 recollection make us entertain
 delights greater rapture come
 weak mind poisoned bane
 filthy pest conceived stygian home
 though joy ensue festive pleasures
 wretched lover ill comfort measures

 v
 cruel envenomed wound
 neither salve portion soothes smart
 figure made witch murmured sound
 star benign observed friendly part
 aught beside zoroaster found
 inventor magic art
 fell wound every woe
 makes wretched man despair lays low

 vi
 o' cruel wound incapable cure
 inflicted ease lover's breast
 less false suspicion sure
 wound whose pangs wofully molest
 reason better wit obscure
 natural bent judgment wrest
 wound reason didst destroy
 damsel dordona's every joy

 vii
 speak fatal mischief wrought
 hippalca's brother's bitter blow
 speak fell cruel tidings brought
 days former woe
 weighed thing nought
 digression show
 first rinaldo's feats must declare
 troop paris made repair

 viii
 following day met cavalier
 towards evening lady side
 sable shield sable gear
 whose ground bar silver divide
 foremost seeming force peer
 young richardetto joust defend
 prompt battle wheeled courser round
 tourney took sufficient ground

 ix
 knights parley past
 without question charged martial two
 rinaldo friendly troop stood fast
 looked see issue would ensue
 "him saddle quickly cast
 firm footing mine arm prove true"
 within young richardetto cries
 encounter ends wise

 x
 underneath vizor's sight offends
 stranger champion sable weed
 force fell youth extends
 two lances' length beyond steed
 quickly venge knight alardo wends
 falls astounded mead
 sore handled unhorsed stroke
 buckler cruel shock broke

 xi
 lance guichardo levelled spied
 outstretched upon field brethren two
 although "halt halt" renowned rinaldo cried
 "for third course justly due"
 yet helmet tied
 guichardo combat flew
 kept seat better twain
 forthwith like extended plain

 xii
 foremost joust contend
 richardo malagigi viviane
 strife rinaldo puts end
 shows arms train
 saying " 'tis time paris wend
 us long tourney detain
 expect till course run
 ye unseated one one"

 xiii
 spake knight yet spake tone
 o'erheard inly said
 thus foul scorn would rest done
 wheeled fierce encounter made
 career rinaldo thrown
 banded kinsmen much outweighed
 spears like brittle glass pieces went
 inch champions backward bent

 xiv
 chargers rough encounter made
 crupper sank staggering horse
 rinaldo's rose quick might said
 scarcely interrupt rapid course
 stranger's broke spine shoulderblade
 shocked desperate force
 lord sees slain leaves seat
 instant springs upon feet

 xv
 foe wheeled anew
 approached hand unarmed warrior cried
 "sir goodly courser ye slew
 whenas lived pride
 deem ill render honour due
 thus unvenged good arm died
 fall best ye may
 parforce must meet new assay"

 xvi
 rinaldo "if thy horse
 contend fight nought beside
 take comfort ween worse
 thou place shalt supplied"
  "thou errest thou deem'st loss source
 regret" stranger knight replied
 "but since thou divinest speech
 thee meaning plainly teach

 xvii
 "i esteem foul misdeed
 unless proved thee also brand
 thou dance succeed
 better worse would understand
 please afoot thy steed
 attack arms hand
 content vantage afford
 desire try thee sword"

 xviii
 long rinaldo paused cried "i plight
 promise balk thee fray
 deem thou art valiant knight
 lest thou umbrage take mine array
 shall go wight
 beside page hold horse shall stay"
 spake mount alban's lord band
 wend way warrior gave command

 xix
 king paladin praise replied
 stranger peer alighting plain
 rinaldo valet side
 consigned goodly steed baiardo's rein

 widely distant warrior's train
 buckler braced biting faulchion drew
 field defied knight anew

 xx
 fight assail
 never seen feller strife show
 neither believes foeman avail
 long fierce debate blow
 knew well neighed doubtful scale
 fitly matched weal woe
 laid fury pride apart
 vantage practised every art

 xxi
 cruel despiteous blows resound
 reechoing wide time valiant twain
 cantlets shields strew ground
 faulchions sever plate chain
 yet behoves parry wound
 either knight footing would maintain
 first fault fence either made
 eternal mischief appaid

 xxii
 one hour half another stood
 knights battle golden sun
 already beneath tumbling flood
 horizon veiled darkness dun
 yet reposed interlude
 since despiteous fight begun
 'twixt neither ire rancour warms
 simple thirst fame excites arms

 xxiii
 rinaldo revolving weighed
 stranger knight passing stout
 alone bravely gainsaid
 oft endangered deadly bout
 harassed furious blade
 final issue stands doubt
  strife ended would fain
 knightly honour took stain

 xxiv
 stranger knight upon side
 little valiant foeman knew
 lord mount alban's chief descried
 warfare renowned countries

 assured could fight
 experience redoubted wight

 xxv
 gladly would quit emprize
 undertook venge courser's fall
 could without blame mean devise
 would fain withdraw disastrous brawl
 overcast already skies
 cruel strokes well nigh fell harmless
 blindly strike blindly yet lords
 parry stroke scarce discern swords

 xxvi

 xxxii

 amend bid

 part two

 xcvi

 canto 32

 argument
 rogero stay

 recollect bound sing
 promised escaped mind
 suspicion fraught suffering

 caused wound wherewith pined

 pierced breast preyed upon heart

 ii
 bound sing begun
 another song rinaldo crossed way
 deeds savage guido done
 kept employed caused small delay
 subject subject run
 forgot bradamant say
 remember tell ere
 rinaldo gradasso hear

 iii
 behoves ere said
 awhile agramant discourse
 night's raging fire conveyed
 arles remnant scattered force
 since unite troops furnish aid
 victual 'twas place much resource
 seated upon river nigh shore
 spain front africa

 iv

 furnished love fear sea prepares

 v

 vi

  choicest warriors taken chased dead

 vii
 free gift martial fair

 ten days nights swing air

 seeing unhelped force prayer
 one amid paynim throng
 thought foul scorn stain generous hands
 base blood loosed losel's bands

 viii

 ix

 x
 good duke aymon's daughter mourn
 twenty days slowly trail
  term elapsed  rogero return
 received church's pale
 time halts foreign bourne

 pines poor wretch liberty light
 loved land desired gladsome sight

 xi
 aye sick hope deferred expecting maid
 phoebus' steeds foundered one deemed
 wheels frame stayed
 beyond wonted term chariot seemed
 yet longer day faith delayed
 sun righteous hebrew beamed
 night alcides conceived
 every day every night believed

 xii
 oft dormouse badger bear
 heavy slumber would fain partake
 time sleep would waste wear
 prolonged repose desired break
 wished damsel sound hear
 rogero's voice awake
 alone beyond power
 cannot close eyes one single hour

 xiii
 throughout livelong night
 tosses turns ever finds repose
 still impatient dawn light
 time time window goes
 see tithon's spouse lily white
 yet scatters mingled crimson rose
 less desires damsel 'tis morn
 see golden stars heaven adorn

 xiv
 saving four days term ended
 appointed youthful warrior's stay
 full hope messenger attended
 hour hour arrive say
 "behold rogero comes" oft ascended
 turret whose top might survey
 gay champaign wood mid wide expanse
 portion road led france

 xv
 shining arms distance perceives
 thing speaks cavalier
 'tis desired rogero believes
 fair eyes brows seen clear
 footman unarmed maid conceives
 courier youthful peer
 though fallacious every hope feeds
 another another aye succeeds

 xvi

 hill descends plain
 finds montalban's seat
 hopes road way ta'en
 design wherewith moved feet
 thence fort returns vain
 finds meanwhile expired
 period whose approach desired

 xvii
  period prefixt o'erpast one
 two three six eight twenty days 
 seeing spouse tidings none
 receiving youth laments 'gan raise
 snakehaired furies pity
 dark realms rhadamanthus sways
 smote eyes divine bosoms fair
 rent tresses golden hair

 xviii
 "can true"  cried  "shall fain
 follow one strives hide fly
 esteem man disdain
 pray never hears suppliant cry
 suffer hates o'er heart reign
 one lofty virtues holds high
 'twere need heavenborn goddess descend
 realms stubborn heart bend

 xix
 "proud youth knows worship love
 lover slave
 cruel stripling knows pangs prove
 yet aid till grave
 let tell sorrows lest move
 perverse evil wave
 shunning like malignant asp fears
 change mood charmer hears

 xx
 "ah love arrest wight runs free
 outstripping slow feet install
 condition whence thou tookest
 ere thine other's thrall
  alas vain hope thou shouldst
 ever pity moved suppliant call
 sport yea feed live streams rise
 distracted lover's brimming eyes

 xxi
 "but woe alas
 save irrational desire lament
 makes soar pitch passing high
 reach region plumes brent
 unsustained fall headlong sky
 ends woe flight intent
 imp wings soar
 flame fall tormented evermore

 xxii
 "yea rather complain
 desire bared breast
 whereby reason hunted reign
 powers stronger force opprest
 thus borne bad worse without rein
 cannot unbridled beast arrest
 makes see destruction haste
 bitterness death may taste

 xxiii
 "yet ah blame wherein
 ever offended save loving thee
 wonder suddenly
 woman's feeble sense opprest
 fence guard lest bearing high
 wise words beauty rare pleasure
 wretched mortal would shun
 look upon visage sun

 xxiv
 "besides destiny entrained
 words worthy credence moved much drew
 picture rare happiness ordained
 meed fair unless ensue
 persuasive words false feigned
 famous merlin's counsel untrue
 wrath wizard may well profess
 cannot therefore love rogero less

 xxv
 "both merlin melissa need
 blame shall ever blame twain
 exhibit suckers seed
 conjured spirits infernal reign
 empty hope fancy feed
 perpetual bondage detain
 cause suppose
 save grudge safe sweet repose"

 xxvi
 sorrow maid wholly occupies
 room none comfort rest
 yet maugre affliction hope rise
 form lodgement harassed breast
 damsel's memory still supplies
 rogero's parting words addrest
 makes seeming facts' despite
 await hour hour youthful knight

 xxvii
 month's space beyond twenty days
 hope affords fair bradamant content
 hence sorrow heavy weighs
 would else harassed soul shent
 one day along road strays
 oft meet rogero went
 hears tidings hope  last comfort left 
 like every good breast bereft

 xxviii
 bound homeward hostile camp lay
 king agramant met gascon knight
 prisoner paynims day
 fought nigh paris famous fight
 damsel prest knew say
 point covets led knight
 asks rogero theme abides
 listens aught inquires besides

 xxix
 full account afford
 well acquainted court said
 matched mandricardo strove lord
 layed martial king combat dead
 sore wounded tartar's sword
 month stripling kept bed
 stranger closed news
 well might tale missing knight excuse

 xxx
 subjoins gascon cavalier
 moorish camp damsel lies
 name marphisa hight beauteous cheer
 bold skilled arms every guise
 loves rogero dear
 host rarely sundered spies
 every one throughout paynim train
 deems betrothed wedlock twain

 xxxi
 hope healed shall youthful knight
 marriage lovers succeed
 sure pleasure sincere delight
 tidings paynim prince monarch read
 since knowing either's superhuman might
 augur loins spring breed
 little season shall pass worth
 mightiest race ever earth

 xxxii
 rehearsed gascon knight believed
 without cause believed news bore
 rumour universally received
 bruited squadrons moor

 signs kindness witnessed evermore
  good bad  though one mouth flows

 xxxiii

 ne'er seen without cavalier

 xxxiv

  known one haughty hardhearted

 benign humble child alone

 xxxv

 lady suffered tormenting pain

 falling preserved pain
 turned courser round without word
 inflamed jealousy fierce disdain
 hope wretched damsel spurns

 xxxvi
 turned face body bed
 armed th4e grieving damsel throws
 sad lament sorrow bred
 may unheard bites clothes
 repeating stranger said
 pitcher smothered anguish grows

 vents maid parforce piteous pain

 xxxvii
 "who ever trusted woe
 false cruel well may esteemed
 thou rogero false cruel
 pious faithful deemed
 foul felon act treachery
 ever yet tragic poet dreamed
 fall short thine thou wilt set
 sum desert thy debts

 xxxviii
 "wherefore rogero since cavalier
 mates thee beauteous form daring feat
 since thou matchless valour hast peer
 none thee gentleness compete
 cannot 'mid godlike gifts clear
 allow thee truth thy graces complete
 praise spotless truth thee allow
 virtues yield bow

 xxxix
 "knowest thou without worthless
 gentle bearing martial might
 nothing howsoever fair
 seen without aid light
 easily mightest thou maid ensnare
 lord thou idol sight
 thy honied words thou might'st
 deem cold darksome sun

 xl
 "cruel sin trouble thee thou
 do'st murder loved thee repent
 held lightly breach vow 
 beneath burden thy heart bent
 treatment thine adversary know
 one loves like thou torment
 justice none heaven well may say
 heaven vengeance wrongs delay

 xli
 "if human sins deepest dye
 fell ingratitude doomed smart
 fairest angel sky
 banished foul darksome part
 mighty sins mighty vengeance cry
 due atonement cleanses heart
 beware lest thou beneath vengeance groan
 ingrate wouldest thy sin atone

 xlii
 "cruel rogero theft beside
 sins may justly thee arraign
 thou heart ravished form side
  offence complain 
 made mine thou defied
 right took away thy gift
 restore well thou know'st pains requite
 sin keeps another's right

 xliii
 "thou hast left rogero thee leave
 alas neither power possess
 power life reave
 scape o'erwhelming wretchedness
 die strife thee alone grieve
 gods pleased lot bless
 require life loved thee
 never welcome death me"

 xliv
 resolved die 'twas damsel cried
 starting bed passion warmed
 left breast naked sword applied
 recollected wholly armed
 meanwhile better spirit side
 persuasive words fury charmed
 "o lady born illustrious name
 would'st thou conclude thy life foul shame

 xlv
 "were better field go
 aye thy breath glory may spent

 reason thou should'st slain
 dooms thee living passing pain

 xlvi
 "haply marphisa
 thou die thou yet may deadly vengeance take
 dishonest love treacherous lore

 seemed please mournful lady
 first thought forthwith bade make
 mantle arms imply

 l
  cadurci cahors city left behind

 li

 squires maids numerous company

 lii
 "some lost isle iceland call reign
 whereof royal lady fills throne
 whose charms charms beauties wane

 pact purpose plainly shown
 confer knight whose worth
 judgment fairest upon earth

 liii

 fairest womankind

  held worthiest world's accord

 liv

 surpast martial praise none

 lv

 yet least distant lie lost isle

 heaven shall circle wonted round

 deems else excell

 lxxxiii

 c

 cii

 canto 33

 argument
 bradamant sees picture future fight
 gained admission spear

 timagoras parrhasius polygnote
 protogenes renowned apollodore
 timanthes apelles first note
 zeuxis others famed heretofore
 whose memory stream time float
 wreck labours lost deplore
 whose fame flourish still fate's despite
 grammercy authors men read write

 ii
 yet living earlier day
 mantegna leonardo gian belline
 dossi skilled carve pourtray
 michael less man angel divine
 bastiano raphael titian
 urbino venice makes cadoro shine
 whose works resemble hear
 credit spirits famed whilere

 iii
 painters seen others
 thousands years ago honour stood
 things matchless pencil drew
 working upon wall wood
 never amid masters old new
 ye pictures heard pictures viewed
 things come yet pourtrayed
 deeds done displayed

 iv
 yet let artist whether new old
 boast skill wondrous works make
 leave feat spell wherewith controlled
 spirits infernal bottom quake
 hall whereof strain told
 volume sacred avernus' lake
 norsine grot throught subject demons' might
 made merlin single night

 v
 art whereby ancient erst pourtrayed
 wonders extinguished day
 troop surveyed

 squire attendant signal made
 bore thither lighted torches whose ray
 scattered hall shades night
 open day shown bright

 vi
 thus castle's lord addressed crew
 "know adventures chamber wrought
 days yet witnessed

 whate'er italy host befalls

 vii
 "the wars wherein french armies appear
 beyond alps foul event fair

 time shall displayed

 viii

 ix

 without ripe advice merlin sage

 x
 "to sage merlin shows well nigh
 monarchs france reign

 xi

 resolved turn arms elsewhere

 xii

  might comprehend say read doom
