 said leads listening ladies

 thither ambra ticino flow

 xiv
 "where clovis tread mountain way
 hundred thousand warriors trace
 see benevento's duke monarch stay
 whose thinner files hostile army face
 lo feign retreat ambush lay
 lo danger havoc disgrace

 yet shall baffled clovis boast

 ten unharmed returns one"

 xvi
 shows king pepin shows king charlemagne

 xix

 xx

   different cities dwell

 xxi
 shows next interval
 'twould seem many many age years

 xxii
 french host decoyed cunning wise
 thither surrounding toils spread

 xxiii

 one hight marca anjouites three
 "marsi daunians salentines" said
 "and bruci shall oft molest see
 yet frank latian's friendly aid
 shall one delivered destruction
 lo realm oft attack
 alphonso gonsalvo beat back

 xxiv
 "you see eighth charles amid martial train
 flower france alpine pass pressed

 yet draws sword lays lance rest
 save rock  typheus' endless pain

 xxv
 warder castle makes clear
 beauteous bradamant history
 says shown ischia's island "ere
 lead things see
 i'll tell greatgrandfather whilere
  child  wont tell

 well father whilome read

 xxvi
 "and sire grandsire heard recite
 son sire even baron
 heard related wight
 fair pictures without pencil drew
 see painted azure red white
 pharamond
 shown castle rocky mount
 heard relate things recount

 xxvii
 "heard relate fortilage
 good knight spring 'twould appear
 guards well scorns fires rage
 even pharo flaming far near
 within short space age
 named week day well year
 noble warrior unexcelled worth
 yet appeared earth

 xxviii
 "nereus less fair achilles less strong
 less ulysses famed daring feat
 nestor knew much lived long
 less prudent nimble ladas less fleet
 less liberal less prompt pardon wrong
 caesar whose praises ancient tales repeat
 compared ischia born
 might appear vaunted virtues shorn

 xxix
 "and illustrious crete rejoiced old
 giving birth coelus' godlike heir
 thebes hercules bacchus bold
 delos boasted heavenly pair
 nought well happy isle withhold
 lifting high glorious head air
 great marquis shall born
 every grace shall heaven adorn

 xxx
 "sage merlin said  oft renewed say 
 reserved flourish age
 opprest roman empire lay
 might free holy heritage
 deeds must display
 hereafter presage
 spake wizard renewed story
 told charlemagne's predestined glory

 xxxi
 "lewis learned merlin said woe
 brought italy king charlemagne
 called harass o'erthrow
 ancient rival goodly reign
 return declares foe
 leagued venice would king detain
 behold valiant monarch couch spear
 foes' despite passage clear

 xxxii
 "but new kingdom leaving band
 far destiny awaits throng
 mantuan's friendly succour manned
 gonsalvo war returns strong
 leaves months sea land
 one living head slaughtered troops among
 one treason spent
 appears joy triumph shent"

 xxxiii
 saying guests cavalier
 alphonso pescara hight displayed
 "who thousand feats shine clear
 resplendent carbuncle" said
 "behold deceived faithless treaty
 mid snares malignant aethiop laid
 transfixt deadly dart warrior lies
 age's worthiest champion dies"

 xxxiv
 italian escort next see
 twelfth lewis o'er hills gone
 roots uptorn mulberry
 viscontis' land lilies sown
 "treading charles's steps shall
 bridges athwart garigliano thrown
 yet shall mourn army's slaughter
 dispersed drowning fatal water"

 xxxv
 lord pursues "with less overthrow
 broken puglia see gallic train
 twice entraps routed foe
 gonslavo behold pride spain
 fortune lewis fair face shall show
 late troubled mien upon plain
 even vext adria pours tides
 po alp apennine divides"

 xxxvi
 host reproved said
 pieced tale left untold
 things first order next displayed
 royal castle warder sold
 prisoner faithless switzer made
 shows lord hired gold
 double treason without couching lance
 given victory king france

 xxxvii
 warder shows caesar borgia grown
 puissant italy king's grace
 rome's peerage lords
 sway exile seems chase
 shows king saw take
 papal acorns bologna place
 genoa's burghers monarch broke
 rebel city stooping yoke

 xxxviii
 "you see" pursued warder "how dead
 covered ghiaradada's green champaign
 seems city opes gates dread
 venice scarce freedom maintain
 see suffers church's head
 passing narrow confines romagne
 modena ferrara's duke reave
 would prince remnant leave

 xxxix
 "nay bologna rescues sway
 whither bentivogli betake
 next see lewis siege brescia lay
 closestraitened city storm take
 felsina almost time stay
 succour papal army break
 next 'twoud seem either hostile band
 lies tented upon chassis' level strand

 xl
 "on side france upon spain
 extend files battle rages high
 fast fall men arms either train
 green earth tinged crimson dye
 flooded human gore seems every drain
 mars doubts give victory
 alphonso's worth spaniards yield
 victorious franks maintain field

 xli
 "and ravenna sacked ravaged lies
 roman pastor bites lips woe
 called hills tempest's guise
 swoop fierce germans fields
 seems frenchman unresisting flies
 chased bands beyond mountain snow
 set mulberry's thriving shoot
 whence plucked golden lily's root

 xlii
 "behold frank returns behold
 broken faithless swiss betrayed
 royal father seized sold
 whose succour dearly youth paid
 false fortune's wheel rolled
 erewhile beneath another king arraid
 behold preparing efface
 vengeful deed novara's late disgrace

 xliii
 "and see better auspices return
 valiant francis foremost train
 shall break haughty switzer's horn
 little short spent bands remain
 shall nevermore style adorn
 usurped foul troop churlish vein
 scourge princes faith's defence
 rustics rude shall make pretence

 xliv
 "lo takes milan league's despite
 lo youthful sforza makes accord
 lo bourbon fair city keeps right
 francis furious german horde
 lo high emprize fight
 elsewhere occupied royal lord
 knows pride license host
 city shall anew lost

 xlv
 "lo french grandsire's vein
 inherits generous name alone
 church's favour regain
  gaul expelled  land
 france returns keeps tighter rein
 italy wont flown
 mantua's noble duke foe shall stay
 ticino's passage bar way

 xlvi
 "though cheek youth's blossoms scarce appear
 worthy immortal glory frederick shines
 well praise deserves since spear
 care skill pavia's lines
 french defends cavalier
 frustrates sealion's bold designs
 see two marquises italia's boast
 alike terror host

 xlvii
 "both one blood one nest
 foremost bold alphonso's seed
 led false black snare
 late beheld purple torrent bleed
 see defeated counsel ware
 oft franks italy recede
 next visage benign bright
 lord guasto alphonso hight

 xlviii
 "this goodly knight whose praise heard
 rugged ischia's island displayed
 sage merlin prophetic word
 pharamond mighty matters said
 whose birth season deferred
 ever champion's aid
 barbarous enemy's attack
 vext italy church empire lack

 xlix
 "he cousin pescara's rear
  prosper colonna chief emprize 
 makes rude switzer pay bicocca dear
 paid frenchman yet dearer wise
 behold france prepares fresh career
 repair many losses tries
 behold one host lombardy descend
 behold naples wend

 l
 "bust moves us like dust flies
 restless wind whirls round
 lifts aloft awhile skies
 blows back anew rising cloud ground
 hundred thousand swells francis' eyes
 soldiers pavia's walls surround
 monarch sees commands
 marks wax waste leaguering bands

 li
 " `tis thus greedy servant's sin
 easy sovereign's goodness side
 files beneath banners muster thin
 midnight camp `to arms' cried
 wary spaniards charged within
 ramparts foes guide
 avalo's fair lineage would assay
 make heaven hell desperate way

 lii
 "you see best nobility
 fair france extinguished field
 many swords many lances see
 spaniards round valiant monarch wield
 behold horse falls yet
 neither subdued yield
 though assault sides run
 wrathful bands succour none

 liii
 "the monarch well defends foe
 bathed blood hostile vein
 valour stoops last numbers lo
 king taken conveyed spain
 upon pescara's lord bestow
 inseparable twain 
 guasto hight  praise prime renown
 great king captived host o'erthrown

 liv
 "this host o'erthrown upon pavia's plains
 bound naples halts upon way
 illnourished lamp taper wanes
 want wax oil flickering ray
 lo king leaves sons spanish chains
 home returns domain sway
 lo italy leads band
 another wars upon native land

 lv
 "in every part see rome woe
 mid ruthless rapine murder fire rape
 see wasting rack ruin go
 nothing human divine escape
 league's men hear shrieks behold glow
 hostile fires lo backward shape
 course hurry way
 leave pontiff foes prey

 lvi
 "lautrec monarch sends bands
 yet anew war lombardy
 deliver rapacious hands
 church's head limbs already free
 slowly performs king's commands
 next overrun kingdom see
 strong arms city turned
 wherein syren's body lies inurned

 lvii
 "lo imperial squadrons thither steer
 aid leaguered city convey
 lo burnt sunk destroyed disappear
 encountered doria midway
 behold fortune light shift veer
 friendly frenchman till day
 slays host fever lance
 thousand one returns france

 lviii
 histories pictures shew
 tell would ask long strain
 beauteous colours different hue
 since hall could well contain
 painting twice thrice guests review
 leave knows lingering train
 'twould seem perusing oft behold
 inscribed beauteous work gold

 lix
 pictures sight fed
 talked long  ladies rest 
 chambers lord led
 wont much worship every worthy guest
 already sleeping bed
 last duke aymon's beauteous daughter prest
 restless body throws
 right left vainly seeks repose

 lx
 yet slumber toward dawn dream
 form rogero seems view
 vision cries "why vex deem
 things real hollow untrue
 backwards shall sooner flow mountainstream
 turn thought
 love unloved
 heart apples mine eyes

 lxi
 "hither repaired seemed said
 baptized professed
 lingered delaid
 wound love opprest"
 vanished martial maid
 vision broken rest
 new floods tears awakened damsel shed
 sad fashion said

 lxii
 "what pleased dream alas sheer
 reality waking bane
 joy dream prompt disappear
 dream cruel tormenting pain
 ah wherefore seemed see hear
 cannot waking see hear
 ails ye wretched eyes closed ye show
 unreal good open woe

 lxiii
 "sweet sleep promised peace soul buoy
 bitter warfare wake anew
 sweet sleep brought fallacious joy
  sure bitter  waking ills ensue
 falsehood delight truth annoy
 never may see hear what's true
 sleeping brings weal watching woe
 pains waking may never know

 lxiv
 "blest animals sleep half year
 ope heavy eyelids night day
 tedious sleep like death appear
 watching like life say
 since  lot beyond wont severe 
 death watching life sleep assay
 oh death sleep resemble death
 even pray three stop fleeting breath"

 lxv
 clouds gone horizon overspread
 glowing crimson newborn sun
 signs unlike past read
 better promise day begun
 bradamant upstarted bed
 armed journey done
 thanks first rendered courteous lord
 kind cheer hospitable board

 lxvi
 found lady messenger maid
 squire issued castled hold
 afield arrival stayed
 three good warriors damsel bold
 eve champaign laid
 cast horses lance gold
 suffered mighty pain
 night freezing wind pattering rain

 lxvii
 add ill hungering sore food
 horses livelong night
 trampling mire chattering teeth stood
 wellnigh engendered despite
  say well nigh  moved warrior's mood
 knew damsel would recite
 unhorsed hostile lance
 first course run france

 lxviii
  resolved die else name
 forthwith new encounter retrieve 
 ulany messagebearing dame
 whose style longer unmentioned leave
 fairer notion knightly fame
 heretofore might haply conceive
 bold bradamant anew fight defied
 drawbridge clear descried

 lxix
 thinking howsoe'er maid
 look act maid confest
 duke aymon's daughter loth delaid
 refuses traveller pressed
 often sorely prayed
 could ill refuse kings' request
 lance levels three strokes extends
 three earth thus warfare ends

 lxx
 bradamant courser wheeled
 turned back upon foes o'erthrown
 intent gain golden shield
 sought land distant
 rising sullen silence field
 speech hardihood gone
 appeared stupefied surprise
 ulania dared lift eyes

 lxxi
 thither course addrest
 vaunted maid boasting vein
 paladin knight lance rest
 worst saddle could maintain
 make vail yet haughty crest
 look upon world less disdain
 tells paladin peer
 unhorsed woman's spear

 lxxii
 "now roland's rinaldo's might
 without reason held renown
 ought think said thus fight
 ye female hand overthrown
 say buckler one requite
  better woman ye done
 ye redoubted warriors
 think haply think

 lxxiii
 "this may suffice need none
 clearer proof prowess display
 desires rashly one
 desires valour assay
 would add scathe shame made
 today yesterday
 unless perchance thinks praise gain
 illustrious warriors slain"

 lxxiv
 ulany certified
 woman's hand caused overthrow
 deeper black pitch dyed
 honour heretofore fair show
 ten story testified
 one sufficed  o'erwhelming woe
 possest fury burned
 well nigh weapons turned

 lxxv
 arms upon unbound
 cast strung rage fury sore
 moat girt castle round
 even kept faulchions wore
 since woman cast ground
 o'erwhelmed rage shame warriors swore
 crying shame clear
 without bearing arms would pass year

 lxxvi
 evermore afoot would fare
 hill mountain plain
 year ended would wear
 knightly mail climb steed
 save force bear
 battle steeds chain
 without arms punish misdeeds
 wend afoot others steeds

 lxxvii
 lodged township fall night
 duke aymon's daughter journeying parisward
 hears king agramant foiled fight
 good harbourage withal bed board
 hostel found small delight
 comforts else afford
 sad damsel meat sleep foregoes
 finds resting place far less repose

 lxxviii
 story dwell
 seek anew valiant twain
 consent beside lonely well
 tied goodly coursers rein
 war somedeal tell
 war waged empire domain
 best buckle side
 good durindana baiardo ride

 lxxix
 signal trumpet attend
 blow lists master
 teach foin fend
 wake sleeping wrath swords drew
 one boldly wend
 lifted blades quick dextrous two
 already 'gan champions' fury heat
 fast hard swords heard beat

 lxxx
 none e'er proof two faulchions chose
 sound solid able endure
 three strokes alone conflicting foes
 passing means measure pure
 perfect temper blows
 repeated trial secure
 thousand strokes might clash high
  nay yet solid metal fly

 lxxxi
 mickle industry mighty pain
 art rinaldo shifting
 avoids deadly dint durindane
 well knowing 'tis wont cleave tear
 gradasso struck greater might main
 well nigh strokes spent air
 sometimes smote smote part
 durindana wrought less harm smart

 lxxxii
 rinaldo skill blade inclined
 stunned arm sericana's lord
 oft reached casque coat confined
 often raked haunches sword
 adamantine corslet's rind
 link restless faulchion broke bored
 impassive paynim's scale
 know charmed magic stubborn mail

 lxxxiii
 without reposing long time
 upon deadly battle intent
 save one another's troubled mien
 angry eyes warriors bent
 despiteous war deadly spleen
 diverted another strife spent
 hearing mighty noise champions turn
 good baiardo sore bested discern

 lxxxiv
 good baiardo monster view
  bird bigger courser  prest
 three yards length appeared view
 monster's beak bat rest
 equipt feathers black ink hue
 piercing talons winged pest
 eye fire cruel look
 like shipsails two spreading pinions shook

 lxxxv
 perhaps bird
 another bird resembling seen
 know
 except turpin heard
 hence fiend upper air
 evoked depths nether hell ween
 malagigi raised magic sleight
 might disturb champions' fight

 lxxxvi
 deemed rinaldo contest sore
 'twixt malagigi hence begun
 would confess charge nay swore
 even light lights glorious sun
 might clear blame bore
 imputed done
 whether fiend fowl pest descends
 good baiardo talons rends

 lxxxvii
 quickly steed possessed mickle might
 breaks loose fury despair
 monster strives kick bite
 swiftly retires soars air
 thence returning prompt wheel smite
 circles beats courser
 wholly unskilled fence sore bested
 baiardo swiftly monster fled

 lxxxviii
 baiardo neighbouring forest flies
 seeking closest shade thickest spray
 feathered monster flaps eyes
 intent mark widest way
 good horse greenwood threads lies
 last within grot concealed day
 winged beast lost baiardo's traces
 soars aloft quarry chases

 lxxxix
 rinaldo gradasso descried
 baiardo's flight conqueror's destined meed
 battle suspend either side
 till regained goodly horse agreed
 saved fowl chased far wide
 conditioning whichever found steed
 anew fountain wend
 beside whose brim battle end

 xc
 quitting fount follow view
 new prints upon forest greensward made
 much baiardo distances two
 whose tardy feet wishes ill obeyed
 king alfana threw
 near hand tethered glade
 leaving foe behind evil plight
  never malcontent vext sprite

 xci
 rinaldo ceased little time spy
 baiardo's traces strange course run
 made thorny thicket wet dry
 tree rock river design shun
 cruel claws pouncing sky
 outrage scathe done
 rinaldo labour vain sore
 await fount returned

 xcii
 case erst concerted twain
 king thither steed resort
 sought little gain
 fared camp afoot piteous port
 return sericane
 sped withal sort
 judgement guided prey
 rare fortune heard baiardo neigh

 xciii
 found shrowded caverned lair
 sore moreover fright opprest
 feared issue open air
 thus horse king possest
 well remembered conditions
 bring fount little pressed
 knight keep promise made
 thus within secret said

 xciv
 "win war strife
 desire peace make steed
 world's side yore
 wend hitherward end alone
 courser mistakes sore
 thinks prize foregone
 would rinaldo conquer let fare
 ind france made repair

 xcv
 "for less secure sericane
 twice france" said
 pricked arles along road plain
 found fleet arrayed
 freighted steed durindane
 wellrigged galley harbour weighed
 hereafter  call
 quit rinaldo king france

 xcvi
 astolpho flight pursue
 made hippogryph like palfrey flee
 reins sell quick welkin
 hawk eagle soar course less free
 o'er wide land gaul warrior flew
 pyrenees rhine sea sea
 westward mountains turned aside
 france's fertile land spain divide

 xcvii
 arragon past navarre
  beheld sore wondering sight 
 leaves tarragon behind far
 upon left biscay upon right
 traversed castile gallicia lisbon
 seville cordova rapid flight
 city seashore inland plain
 unexplored throughout realm spain

 xcviii
 beneath cadiz strait spied
 whilom good alcides closed way
 atlantic side
 egypt bent o'er africa stray
 famous balearic isles descried
 ivica passage lay
 toward arzilla turned rein
 sea severs spain

 xcix
 morocco fez oran looking
 hippona argier bugia told
 cities bear away crown
 palm parsley wreath crown gold
 noble biserta next tunistown
 capys alzerba's isle warrior bold
 tripoli berniche ptolomitta viewed
 asia's land nile pursued

 c
 'twixt atlas' shaggy ridges shore
 viewed regions spacious round
 turned back upon carena hoar
 skimmed cyrenaean ground
 passing sandy desert moor
 albajada reached nubian's bound
 left battus' tomb behind plain
 ammon's dilapidated fane

 ci
 tremizen posts bred
 well people mahound's style
 aethiops pinions spread
 face first lie beyond nile
 coallee dobada sped
 bound nubian city's royal pile
 threading two ranged either land
 moslems christians watch arms hand

 cii
 aethiopia's realm senapus reigns
 whose sceptre cross cities brave
 men gold possest broad domains
 red sea's extremest waters lave
 faith well nigh like king maintains
 man primaeval doom may save
 save err rites require
 swarthy people baptized fire

 ciii
 astolpho lighted spacious court
 intending nubian king wait
 less strong sumptuous wealthy fort
 wherein royal aethiop keeps state
 chains serve drawbridge support
 bolts bars hinges gate
 finally whatever behold
 herewrought iron wrought gold

 civ
 high prized withal albeit abound
 best metal lodges built air
 sides wealthy pile surround
 clear colonnades crystal shafts upbear
 green white crimson blue yellow ground
 frieze extends galleries fair
 due intervals rich gems combine
 topaz sapphire emerald ruby shine

 cv
 wall roof pavement scattered
 full many pearl full many costly stone
 thrives balm plants ever rare
 compared jewry grown
 musk possess thence bear
 fine products clime brought
 regions prized sought

 cvi
 soldan king egyptian land
 pays tribute sovereign head
 say since nile command
 may divert stream bed
 hence district upon either hand
 forthwith might cairo lack daily bread
 senapus nubian tribes proclaim
 priest prester john sovereign name

 cvii
 aethiop monarchs beyond measure
 first riches might
 puissance treasure
 alas miserably lost sight
 yet monarch's least displeasure
 vexed direr worse despite
 harassed though richest nubian kings
 perpetual hunger's cruel stings

 cviii
 whene'er eat drink wretched man
 prepared resistless need pursued
 forthwith  infernal avenging clan 
 appeared monstrous harpies' craving brood
 armed beak talons overran
 vessel board preyed upon food
 wombs suffice receive
 foul defiled loathsome monsters leave

 cix
 upborn tide
 full blown honours unripe age
 excelled heart nerve beside
 riches royal heritage
 like lucifer monarch waxed pride
 war upon maker thought wage
 host mountain went
 egypt's mighty river finds vent

 cx
 upon hill wellnigh kissed skies
 piercing clouds king heard recite
 seated terrestrial paradise
 first parents flourished delight
 camels elephants footmen hies
 thither king confiding might
 huge desire peopled land
 bring nations command

 cxi
 god marred rash emprise high
 sent angel whose destroying sword
 hundred thousand chivalry
 slew endless night condemned lord
 emerging next hellish caverns fly
 horrid harpies assault board
 still pollute waste royal meat
 leave monarch aught drink eat

 cxii
 plunged uttermost despair
 one erewhile prophesied
 loathsome harpies daily fare
 leave unpolluted astride
 winged horse arriving air
 armed cavalier descried
 impossible appears thing
 devoid hope remains mournful king

 cxiii
 wonderment followers spy
 english cavalier make way
 o'er every wall o'er every turret high
 swiftly king news convey
 calls mind ancient prophecy
 heedless staff wonted stay
 joy outstretched arms tottering feet
 comes forth flying cavalier meet

 cxiv
 within castle court astolpho flew
 spacious wheels earth descended
 king conducted courtly crew
 warrior knelt arms extended
 cried "thou angel send god thou new
 messiah sore offended
 mercy yet bethink thee 'tis bent
 sin thine pardon repent

 cxv
 "knowing sin ask
  grace dare ask  restored light
 well ween power resides thee
 accepted thy maker's sight
 let suffice longer see
 let perpetual hunger fight
 least expel harpies' loathsome horde
 let pollute ravaged board

 cxvi
 "and build thee royal hold
 holy temple made marble swear
 portals roof gold
 decked within jewels rare
 shall thy mighty miracle told
 sculpture thy name dome shall bear"
 spake sightless king nubia's reign
 sought kiss stranger's feet vain

 cxvii
 "nor angel"  good astolpho made reply 
 "nor new messiah heaven descend
 less mortal sinner
 high grace unworthy pretend
 slay monsters means try
 drive realm offend
 shall prosper thy praises paid
 god alone sent thine aid

 cxviii
 "offer vows god well due
 thy churches build thine altars rear"
 discoursing together wend two
 'mid barons bold king cavalier
 nubian prince commands menial crew
 forthwith bring hospitable cheer
 hopes foul rapacious band
 dare snatch victual hand

 cxix
 forthwith solemn banquet prepare
 within gorgeous palace king
 seated alone guest sovereign
 attendant troop viands bring
 behold whizzing sound heard air
 echoes beat savage wing
 behold band harpies thither flies
 lured scent victual skies

 cxx
 bear female face pallid dye
 seven number horrid band
 emaciated hunger lean dry
 fouler death pinions expand
 ragged huge shapeless eye
 talon crook'd rapacious hand
 fetid large paunch many fold
 like snake's long knotted tails rolled

 cxxi
 fowls heard air swoops amain
 covey well nigh instant rends
 food o'erturns vessels rain
 noisome ordure board descends
 stop nostrils king duke fain
 insufferable stench offends
 greedy birds wrath excites
 astolpho brandished faulchion smites

 cxxii
 croup collar aims blow
 strikes neck pinion
 smote upon bag tow
 strokes without effect languid fall
 dish goblet forego
 void ravening fowls regal hall
 till feasted full left food
 waste polluted rapine rude

 cxxiii
 king firmly hoped cavalier
 would royal seat harpies scare
 hope foregone nought cheer
 laments sighs groans despair
 good horn remembers peer
 whose clangours helpful aye peril
 deems bugle fittest mean
 free monarch birds unclean

 cxxiv
 first fill ears king train
 melted wax astolpho gives command
 every one hears deafening strain
 may panic terror fly land
 takes reins courser backs
 grasps enchanted bugle hand
 sewer next signs board
 anew hospitable victual stored

 cxxv
 meats open galley bears
 banquet spreads ground
 behold wont harpysquad appears
 astolpho quickly lifts bugle's round
 unguarded harassed ears
 harpies proof sound
 terror form royal dome speed
 meat aught beside monsters heed

 cxxvi
 spurs haste valiant peer
 winged courser forth flown
 leaving beneath swift career
 royal castle crowded town
 bugle ever pealing far near
 harpies fly toward torrid zone
 light reach loftiest mountain
 springs anywhere nile's secret fountain

 cxxvii
 almost aerial mountain's feet
 deep earth extends gloomy cell
 surest pass repeat
 would time descend hell
 hither predatory troop retreat
 safe refuge deafening yell
 far farther cocytus' shore
 descending till horn heard

 cxxviii
 dark hellish inlet way
 opens would abandon light
 terrifying bugle ceased bray
  courser furled wings stopt flight
 ere astolpho convey
  depart accustomed rite 
 since sides paper overflows
 shall conclude canto repose


 canto 34

 argument
 infernal pit astolpho hears
 lydia's woe smoke wellnigh opprest
 mounts anew courser bears
 terrestrial paradise addrest
 john advised heaven steers
 lost sense repossest
 orlando's wasted wit well takes
 sees fates spin threads earthward makes



 fierce hungry harpies blind
 erring italy full fed
 scourge ancient sins designed
 haply heaven every board sped
 innocent children pious mothers pined
 hunger die see daily bread
  orphan's widow's scanty food 
 feed single feast filthy brood

 ii
 foul fault unclose
 cave long shut made passage free
 whence greediness filth arose
 italy's infection doomed
 good life extinguished repose
 banished strife poverty
 fear trouble still perplext
 shall many future year vext

 iii
 till sons shaken hair
 lethaean sloth life restored
 exclaiming "will none imitate pair
 zethes calais avenging sword
 rescue claws stench goodly fare
 cleanse glad anew genial board
 king phineus fowls released
 england's peer restored nubian's feast"

 iv
 hunting hideous birds cavalier
 aye scared bugle's horrid sound
 till mountaincave long career
 closed ran monstrous troop ground
 attentive vent held ear
 troubled cavern heard rebound
 weeping wailing eternal yell
 proof certain entrance led hell

 v
 astolpho doubts within shall wend
 see wretched ones expelled day
 central pit earth descend
 infernal gulfs around survey
 "why fear horn depend
 certain succour" warrior say
 "satan pluto confound
 drive threeheaded hound"

 vi
 speedily winged horse forsook
 sapling near hand ties
 cavern entered next first took
 horn whereon knight relies
 far advanced smoke
 obscure foul offends nose eyes
 ranker pitch sulphur stench
 yet thereat good astolpho blench

 vii
 descends lair
 much finds smoke vapour worse
 appears fare
 nay backward must retrace way parforce
 lo something knows air
 espies seems motion like corse
 upon whose wasted form long time beat
 winter's rain summers scorching heat

 viii
 dim cavern little light
  yea wellnigh might said light none 
 nought sees comprehends english knight
 wavers vapour dun
 surer proof stroke two would smite
 good faulchion otho's valiant son
 deemed duke spirit
 seemed strike amid misty gloom

 ix
 melancholy voice addressed
 "ah without harming downward wend
 sore sable fumes molest
 hither form hellish fires ascend"
 thereat duke amazed steps represt
 spirit cried "so may heaven send
 respite vapours exhale
 thou shalt deign tell thy mournful tale

 x
 "and known earth shouldst thou fain
 thee satisfy" sprite
 sweet seems fame
 thus return glorious light
 huge desire favour obtain
 forces words despite
 constraining tell things ye seek
 though 'tis annoyance fatigue speak

 xi
 "lydia child lydia's king
 proud estate princely honours born
 condemned righteous doom god high
 murky smoke eternally mourn
 kindly lover's constancy
 lived repaid spite scorn
 countless others swarm grots
 sin condemned woe

 xii
 "yet lower harsh anaxarete
 suffers worse pain thicker fumes arise
 heaven changed flesh stone
 tormented afflicted spirit sties
 unmoved hung air could see
 lover vest barbarities
 daphne learns rashly done
 given apollo run"

 xiii
 "of hosts ingrate women cell
 confined would tedious recite
 one one upon dwell
 many amount infinite
 'twould tedious men tell
 whose base ingratitude due pains requite
 dismal prison pent
 smoke blinds everlasting fires torment

 xiv
 "since belief soft woman prone
 deceives merits heavier pain
 theseus jason known
 vexed old latian reign
 brother absalon
 erewhile provoked pestilent disdain
 thamar countless horde
 left wife wedded lord

 xv
 "but rather state shew
 sin brought hither  fair
 much haughtier fair hue
 know ever equalled
 excessive two
 pride beauty could thee declare
 though certain pride took rise
 rare loveliness pleased eyes

 xvi
 "there lived thracian knight warlike skill
 prowess upon earth without peer
 voiced many worthy witness still
 praises matchless charms hear
 forethought free
 fixed love cavalier
 weening wife upon part
 valour duly prize heart

 xvii
 "he came lydia faster tie
 fettered sight enrolled
 amid royal father's chivalry
 mickle fame increased baron bold
 feats many sort valour high
 would make tale tedious told
 boundless merit deserved
 grateful master served

 xviii
 "pamphylia caria cilicia's reign
 father brought beneath sway
 never moved afield martial train
 warrior pointed way
 deemed deserved gain
 pressed close lydian king upon day
 craved monarch wife
 meed booty made strife

 xix
 "rejected monarch peer
 resolved child highly wed
 simple cavalier
 saving valour nought bested
 father bent gain gear
 avarice vice fountainhead
 manners merit little pass
 lute's music lumpish ass

 xx
 "alcestes speak hight
 warrior sees suit denied
 repulsed one right
 think gratified
 craves discharge threatens slight

 argument

 ii

 canto 37

 argument
 lament outcry loud mourn
 attract rogero damsels two
 find ulania mantle shorn
 marganor amid moaning crew
 upon felon knight foul scorn
 fierce revenge marphisa takes new
 statute maid town obtain
 marganor ulania slain



 seeking gift gain
 nature without study yieldeth nought
 mighty diligence mickle pain
 illustrious women day night wrought
 good success female train
 fair end homely task brought
  studies wake 
 mortal attributes immortal make

 ii
 sufficient
 praises posterity show
 borrowed authors' aid whose bosoms
 envy hate corroded
 oft hide good might declare
 tell every place ill know
 pitch would mount female name
 haply ne'er reached manly fame

 iii
 furnish mutual aid enow
 many would lend light
 men best womankind show
 whatever faults open sight
 would hinder rising
 sink bottom might
 say ancients glory
 woman dimmed mist sun

 iv
 hands tongue ne'er skill
 voice lettered page thought impart
 though power increase ill
 diminishing good art
 female fame stifle still
 honour sex survives part
 yet reacheth pitch flight
 'tis far natural height

 v
 thomyris harpalice
 brought hector brought turnus aid
 build lybia crost sea
 tyrian sidonian band obeyed
 famed zenobia
 persian indian assyrian frayed
 others merit
 glory eternal fame inherit

 vi
 faithful chaste bold world hath seen
 greece rome where'er
 sun unfolds flowing locks
 hesperides indian hemisphere
 whose gifts praise extinguished
 scarce one amid thousand hear
 days
 chroniclers men envious false bad

 vii
 ye prosper exercise
 goodly labours aye way pursue
 halt women high emprise
 fear receiving honour due
 nought good endures beneath skies
 ill endures hitherto
 unfriendly poet's pen page
 befriend better age

 viii
 erewhile marullo pontante
 declared  sire son  strozzi twain
 capello bembo writer
 fashioned like courtier train
 lewis alamanni two
 beloved mars muses strain
 descended mighty city rule
 mincius parts moats marshy pool

 ix
 one pair besides
 honours courtesies
 makes parnassus high cynthus' hill
 resound praise lift skies
 love faith mind unconquered still
 mid threats ruin stedfast wise
 constant isabel hath shown
 render yet champion

 x
 never wearied
 quickening verse high renown
 another censures
 prompter arm defence none
 knight wide world willingly
 life cause virtue would lay
 matter well other's pen gives
 another's glory lives

 xi
 well merits dame blest
 blest worth earthly round

 x

 xi

 xii

 "unconquered caesar glorious august

  earthly monarchs thou sage

 xiii
 "and avow truth jealous mood

 like cruel foe purposed offend
 chanced one changed friend

 xiv
 "when worst harm scaith thy bands doom
 find leisure show

 till seventh year wizard nourished

 canto 39

 ii

 strove ways rogero o'erthrow

 xi

 xii

 xl

 xli

 bardino monodantes' court

 xlii
 soon landed biserta lies
 besieged good astolpho's band hear
 brandimart emprize

 xliii
 gentle baron less gladly eyed
 faithful beloved consort's face
 prized things beside

 warm wishes would satisfied

 xliv

  wherefore come  would bid say
 prevented sudden flight

 club mad naked wight

 xlv
 time withal astolpho bold
 good orlando plainly knew
 signs whereof ancient saints told
 earthly paradise tokens true
 none others knight behold
 courteous baron madman view
 long selfneglect wild ran

 xlvi
 breast heart transfixed pity cried
 valiant astolpho  bathed many tear 
 turning danish dudon side

 xlvii
 grieve lament greater part
 good warriors eyes o'erflow
 " `tis time" astolpho cried "to find art

 courser sprang bold brandimart
 olivier sansonet dudon
 leap ground together make
 roland warriors fain would take

 xlviii
 seeing circle round grow
 levels club furious paladin
 makes fierce dudon feel  couched
 buckler  madman would break
 grievous staff's descending blow
 olivier orlando's kin
 broke sort force stake accurst
 shield helmet head body burst

 xlix
 burst shield thunder
 broke casque dudon prest shore
 sir sansonet cut clean asunder
 sapling shorn two clothyards
 vigorous warrior's stroke
 bosom brandimart girt roland sore
 sinewy arms body flung
 champion's legs astolpho clung

 l
 orlando shook england's knight
 ten paces reversed upon ground
 yet loosed brandimart might
 better hold clasped madman round
 olivier forward fight
 dealt furious fell wound
 clenched fist pale marquis fell
 purple streams eyes nostrils well

 li
 save morion good
 bold olivier breathed last lies
 battered fall seemed wou'd
 bequeath parting soul paradise
 astolpho dudon upstood
 albeit swoln dudon's face eyes
 sansonet plied well sword
 made together anglantes' lord

 lii
 dudon orlando behind embraced
 foot furious peer would throw
 astolpho others seize arms waste
 strength attempts hold foe
 seen bull mastiffs chased
 gore bleeding ears fury lowe
 dragging dogs bait
 yet tusks unable get clear

 liii
 let imagine orlando drew
 astolpho banded knights along
 meanwhile upstarted oliviero
 fell fistycuff earth flung
 seeing could ill roland
 sought good astolpho throng
 meditates compasses way
 frantic paladin earth lay

 liv
 many hawser made thither bring
 running knots quickly tied
 count's waist arms legs fling
 among ends divide
 conveyed amid ring
 compassing roland upon every side
 warriors thus orlando flung parforce
 farrier throws struggling ox horse

 lv
 soon upon
 hands feet tightly constrain
 shakes plunges
 efforts relief vain
 astolpho bade hence prisoner bear
 would heal said warrior's brain
 shouldered sturdy dudon load
 beach's furthest brink bestowed

 lvi
 seven times astolpho makes wash knight
 seven times plunged beneath brine goes
 cleanse away scurf blight
 stupid limbs visage grows
 done herbs occasion dight
 stop mouth wherewith puffs blows
 save nostrils would astolpho leave
 passage whence count might air receive

 lvii
 valiant astolpho prepared vase
 wherein orlando's senses contained
 nostrils mode conveys
 drawingin breath county drained
 mystic cup withal oh wondrous case
 unsettled mind ancient seat regained
 glorious reasonings yet clear
 lucid waxed wisdom whilere

 lviii
 one seems troubled sleep see
 abominable shapes horrid crew
 monsters cannot
 seems strange unlawful thing
 yet marvels slumber free
 recovered senses play true
 good orlando made sound
 remains yet full wonder astound

 lix
 aldabelle's brother monodantes' son
 brain cure wrought
 wondering marked word spake none
 brought thither thought
 turned restless eyes
 withal imagined aught
 marvelling naked cast
 wherefore tethered neck heels fast

 lx
 said erst silenus said  seen
 taken sleeping cave yore 
 solvite visage serene
 look much less wayward
 bonds delivered clean
 raiment naked warrior bore
 comforting friend grief opprest
 delusion possest

 lxi
 former self recovered
 wiser manlier mind e'er
 love well freed enamoured lord
 gentle deemed fair whilere
 renowned orlando adored
 worthless thing appear
 love lost reacquire
 whole study whole desire

 lxii
 meanwhile bardino told brandimart
 monodantes good sire dead
 brother gigliantes' part
 call kingdom sped
 well isles apart
 lands eastern seas spread
 prince's fair inheritance
 none pleasant populous rich

 lxiii
 said mid many reasons prest
 home sweet  warrior fain
 taste sweet  ever would detest
 wandering life brandimart
 replies war rest
 serving roland king charlemagne
 lives see end
 matters better attend

 lxiv
 upon following day provence steer
 shipping danish dudon's care
 duke retired anglantes' peer
 heard lord warfare's state declare
 prest siege biserta far near
 let good england's knight honour wear
 every vantage astolpho still
 guided orlando's

 lxv
 order taken attack town
 huge biserta side
 first assault walls
 orlando palm divide
 lament shall leave unshown
 since short time lay tale aside
 meanwhile fierce overthrow
 moors received france pleased know

 lxvi
 well nigh abandoned royal lord
 worst peril arles
 gone many paynim horde
 sage sobrino king spain
 deemed land unsafe aboard
 barks sought refuge numerous train
 barons cavaliers served moor
 moved example put shore

 lxvii
 yet royal agramant fight maintains
 longer make stand
 turns combat directly strains
 arles far remote upon strand
 rabican pursues flowing reins
 aymon's daughter drives heel hand
 would slay often crost
 martial maid rogero lost

 lxviii
 marphisa desire stirred
 thoughts tardy vengeance placed
 dead sire fiercely spurred
 made hot courser feel rider's haste
 neither martial maid amid herd
 flying moors well monarch chased
 o'ertake swift retreat
 first arles aboard fleet

 lxix
 two fair generous pards crag
 together dart stretch across plain
 perceive vigorous goat stag
 nimble quarry pursued vain
 ashamed chase lag
 return repentant high disdain
 sigh return damsels two
 paynim king safety view

 lxx
 yet therefore halt fury go
 amid crowd flies possest dread
 feeling every blow
 many never uprear head
 evil pass brought broken foe
 safety even fled
 since agramant sure retreat gain
 bade shut citygate faced plain

 lxxi
 bade rhone break bridges
 unhappy people ever held cheap
  weighed tyrant's want wears crown 
 worthless herd goats silly sheep
 sea river drown
 blood thirsty fallows steep
 franks prisoners made many slew
 ransom battle

 lxxii
 great multitude either train
 christened paynim killed last fight
 though unequal parts slain
 far saracens killed flight
 hands redoubted damsels twain
 signs even day remain sight
 hard arles sleeps lazy rhone
 plain rising sepulchres strown

 lxxiii
 meanwhile heavy ships deepest draught
 king agramant made put forth sea
 leaving barks port  lightest craft 
 would aboard navy flee
 stays two days stragglers waft
 winds wild contrary
 third day sail give command
 trust make return africk's land

 lxxiv
 royal marsilius fatal hour
 fearing costs fall upon spain
 clouds big tempest lower
 end burst upon fields grain
 makes valentia town tower
 begins fortify mickle pain
 war prepares ends
 destruction friends

 lxxv
 king agramant sails africk bent
 barks illarmed almost empty go
 empty men full discontent
 threefourths perished foe
 cruel weak proud shent
 king still happens like woe
 hate privily fear
 fury presence mute appear

 lxxvi
 yet sometimes two three lips unclose
  knot friends relies 
 pent choler rage expose
 yet agramant beneath illusion lies
 love pity overflows
 befalls still espies
 false faces hears voices applaud
 nought adulation lies fraud

 lxxvii
 biserta's port host land
 sage king africa's intent
 sure news shore nubia's band
 held far meant
 steer moorish squadron strand
 steep rugged descent
 would disembark thence would aid
 forthwith people broken dismaid

 lxxviii
 favoured foul destiny
 intention provident wise
 willed fleet leaves greenwood tree
 produced upon beach wondrous guise
 bound france ploughed foaming sea
 meet king night surprise
 dark dismal hour amid crew
 worse panic disorder might ensue

 lxxix
 yet tidings conveyed
 squadrons force billows plow
 would believed said
 hundred barks sprung one small bough
 hence africa king weighed
 fearing encounter hostile prow
 watchmen tops spy
 make report hence descry

 lxxx
 `twas ships england's peer supplied
 dudon manned good armed crew
 see moorish fleet eventide
 strange armament forthwith pursue
 assailed unawares far wide
 among barks grapplingirons threw
 linked chains opponents clung
 known moors foemen tongue

 lxxxi
 bearing impelled winds blow
 propitious danish chief's intent
 weighty ships shocked paynim foe
 many vessels bottom went
 taxing wits hands work woe
 fire sword stones christians shent
 ships wide ruin pour
 like tempest never vext sea

 lxxxii
 bold dudon's men unwonted might
 daring imparted high
 since hour come paynims requite
 one ill deed far nigh
 moors pestilently gall smite
 agramant finds shelter sky
 thick clouds whistling arrows strike
 around gleam hook hatchet sword pike

 lxxxiii
 king hears huge heavy stones descend
 charged machine thundering engine sent
 falling poop prow broadside rend
 opening ravening seas mighty vent
 furious fires offend
 fires quickly kindled slowly spent
 wretched crews would fain danger shun
 ever direr peril run

 lxxxiv
 one headlong plunged pursued fire sword
 perished mid waters one wrought
 faster arms feet passage oared
 barque already overfraught
 repulsed wretch fain would board
 whose hand importunately sought
 clamber grasped side lopt arm
 body stained wave lifeblood warm

 lxxxv
 save life i' waters thought
 worst perish less pain
 since swimming profited caitiff nought
 perceived strength courage drain
 hungry fires refuge sought
 fear drowning hurries back
 grasps burning plank dread
 dying either death sped

 lxxxvi
 vainly sea resorts spear
 hatchet brandished close hand dismay
 stone arrow following rear
 permit craven make little way
 haply yet delights ear
 'twere well wisely done end lay
 rather harp upon theme long
 annoy tedious song


 canto 40

 argument
 fly royal agramant fain
 sees biserta burning far away
 landing finds royal sericane
 faith gives goodly warrant
 defy orlando backed champions twain
 bold gradasso firmly trusts slay
 seven kings' sake fast prisoners foes
 rogero dane exchange rude blows



 diverse chances seafight dread
 rehearse would take weary
 discourse upon head
 great son hercules samos' isle
 carry earthen vessels 'tis said
 athens owls crocodiles nile
 lord vouched
 things saw things made others see

 ii
 faithful people gazed long show
 night day wherein crowded stood
 theatre hemmed po
 twixt fire sword hostile navies viewed
 outcries may heard sounds woe
 rivers may run red human blood
 suchlike combat many mode
 men die saw many showed

 iii
 saw compelled course
 evermore changing nags six days
 rome heat haste helpful force
 mighty pastor implore
 need none foot horse
 lion's beak claws tore
 day unto hear said
 trouble land bread

 iv
 trotto present victory
 afranio moro albert hannibal
 zerbinat bagno ariostos three
 assured mighty feat withal
 certified ensignry
 suspended holy temple's wall
 fifteen galleys riverside
 thousand captive barks spied

 v
 wrecks blazing fires discerned
 sore slaughter different shows
  venging us hall palace burned 
 bark remained raged wide among foes
 might also deem africk's people mourned
 agramant mid diverse deaths woes
 dark night redouted dane
 assaulted mid sea moorish train

 vi
 'twas night gleam anywhere descried
 first fleets furious strife blended
 lit sulphur pitch tar side
 poop prow sky ascended
 destructive wildfire scattered wide
 fed upon ship shallop ill defended
 things descried clear
 night changed day 'twould appear

 vii
 hence agramant dark deceived
 rated high foes' array
 encounter force believed
 would 'twere opposed last give way
 wide darkness cleared perceived
 least weened upon first affray
 twice many ships fought
 moorish barks took thought

 viii
 boat descends
 brigliador precious things flee
 twixt ship ship silence wends
 finds safer sea
 far fiery dudon shends
 reduced sad sore extremity
 steel destroys fires burn waters drown
 mighty slaughter's cause flown

 ix
 agramant flies old sobrine
 agramant grieving believed
 time sage foresaw eye divine
 told woe wherewith aggrieved
 turn valiant paladine
 aid received
 counsels duke biserta destroy
 may christian france annoy

 x
 hence public order said
 camp arms third day stand
 many barks bested
 placed dane's command
 fleet worthy sansonetto led
 good warrior sea land
 mile port overight
 biserta anchored knight

 xi
 orlando duke like christians true
 dare danger without god guide
 fast prayer made army
 ordain proclamation cried
 upon third day view
 signal shall bown far wide
 biserta's royal city attack
 taken doom fire sack

 xii
 devoutly done
 vigil vow holy prayer fast
 kin friends one another known
 together feast glad repast
 wasted bodies refreshed begun
 embrace weep acts speeches past
 upon banquet's close amid crews
 best friends sever use

 xiii
 holy priests within biserta's wall
 pray grieving people tears
 aye beat bosoms succour call
 upon mahomet nothing hears
 vigils offerings gifts withal
 promised silently amid fears
 temples statues images vowed
 memory bitter woes aloud

 xiv
 cadi hath blessing said
 people arms rampart hies
 yet reposing tithon's bed
 aurora dusky skies
 posts several troops head
 sansonetto astolpho flies
 hear orlando's signal blown
 assault furious force biserta's town

 xv
 washed sea upon two quarters
 city walls two stood dry shore
 construction excellent rare
 wherein seen work days yore
 bulwarks town nigh bare
 since branzardo sceptre bore
 masons command little space
 monarch fortify place

 xvi
 nubian king charged england's peer
 sling arrow moors gall
 none upon works shall dare appear
 protected ceaseless fall
 stone dart safety cavalier
 footman may approach wall
 loaded plank rockstone
 beam weightier burden come

 xvii
 thing nubians bore
 degrees filledup channel wide
 whose waters cut day
 many parts ooze spied
 filled ditch haste shore shore
 forms level side
 cheering footmen works mount
 stand olivier astolpho count

 xviii
 nubian upon hope gain intent
 impatient delay heeding
 pressing perils compassed went
 protected sheltering boar sow
 battering ram instrument
 break gate make turret bow
 speedily city wall post
 unprovided find paynim host

 xix
 steel fire roof turret
 guise tempest nubians fell
 plank beam dread engines tear
 made annoyance infidel
 ill beginning dim air
 much injury christened host befell
 sun rich mansion breaks
 fortune faction moor forsakes

 xx
 assault reinforced every side
 count orlando sea land
 fleet sansonetto guide
 entered harbour approached strand
 sorely various engines plied
 arrows slings paynim band
 sent assailants scalingladder spear
 naval stores every needful gear

 xxi
 orlando oliviero brandimart
 air daring heretofore
 fierce furious battle part
 lies furthest inland shore
 leads portion aethiops swart
 ordered equal bands beneath four
 walls gateways elsewhere
 give prowess shining proofs rare

 xxii
 better could seen warrior's claim
 confused combat
 reward worthy shame
 thousand watchful eyes clear
 dragged upon wheels towers wooden frame
 others welltrained elephants uprear
 o'ertop turrets foe
 bulwarks stand mighty space

 xxiii
 brandimart walls ladder brought
 climbed climb withal others cried
 many succeed bold assurance fraught
 none fear beneath good guide
 one marked one thought
 marking weight would abide
 brandimart foes intent
 clambered fought grasped battlement

 xxiv
 clang hand foot daring knight
 sprang embattled wall whirled sword
 showing mickle tokens might
 paynims charged o'erthrew hewed gored
 o'erburthened weight
 ladder breaks beneath assailing horde
 saving brandimart christians
 ditch headlong ruin fall

 xxv
 therefore blenched valiant cavalier
 thought retreat albeit none
 band followed rear
 although mark town
 many prayed warrior would hear
 prayer turn mid foes leapt
 say city took leap
 townwall thirty cubits deep

 xxvi
 without harm hard ground
 feathers straw light
 like cloth shred shorn paynims round
 fury shreds shears valiant knight
 springs vigorous bound
 betake flight
 without seen leap made
 late save deem human aid

 xxvii
 throughout squadrons deep rumour flew
 murmur whisper
 mouth mouth fame motion grew
 told magnified tale fear
 upon many quarters stormed crew
 good orlando olivier
 otho's son flew pinions light
 ever paused upon nimble flight

 xxviii
 warriors orlando
 love prize gentle brandimart
 hearing defy upon call
 would renowned comrade part
 scalingladders plant mount wall
 rivalry shows kingly heart
 carry terror look
 sight foemen shook

 xxix
 loud ocean lashed boisterous gale
 billows rash bark assault still 
 threatening poop threatening prow  assail
 rage fury fain would fill
 pilot sighs groans dismaid pale
  aid heart skill 
 length surge pinnace sweeps swallows
 wave wave long succession follows

 xxx
 thus win wall leave space
 wide beneath conduct go
 safely may follow base
 thousand ladders reared
 meanwhile battering rams many place
 breached wall mighty blow
 bold assailant many part
 bear succour gallant brandimart

 xxxi
 even rage wherewith stream reigns
 king rivers  breaks mound
 makes way mantuan plains 
 greasy furrows glad harvests round
 sheepcotes flock dogs swains
 bears o'erwhelming waters drowned
 elm's high top fishes glide
 fowls erewhile nimble pinions plied

 xxxii
 even rage rushed impetuous band
 many breaches wall wrought
 slay burning torch trenchant brand
 people evil pass brought
 murder rapine violent hand
 dipt deep blood plunder thought
 destroy sumptuous triumphant town
 africk wore royal crown

 xxxiii
 filled dead bodies paynim horde
 blood issued many gaping wound
 fouler fosse formed worse ford
 girdles infernal city round
 house house fire fury poured
 mosque portico palace went ground
 spoiled empty mansions clang
 beaten breast groan outcry rang

 xxxiv
 victors laden mighty prey
 unhappy city's gates gone
 one fair vase one rich array
 silver plate ancient altar
 mother bore child away
 rapes thousand evil things done
 much cannot hinder hear
 renowned orlando fair england's peer

 xxxv
 olivier amid slaughter wide
 fell bucifaro paynim band
  every hope comfort cast aside 
 branzardo slew brand
 pierced three wounds whereof shortly died
 folvo taken astolpho's hand
 monarchs three intrusted whose care
 agramant's african dominions

 xxxvi
 agramant left without guide
 fleet sobrino fled
 wept biserta spied
 fires royal city fed
 nearer king certified
 cruel strife town sped
 thought dying slain
 sobrino's words arm restrain

 xxxvii
 "what victory lord" sobrino cries
 "could better thy death christian cheer
 whence might hope joy quiet wise
 fair africa annoyance clear
 thy yet alive hope denies
 hence shall evermore cause fear
 well foeman knows save thou art gone
 short time fill thine africk throne

 xxxviii
 "thy subjects thy death deprived
 hope good store
 thou thou liv'st trust shalt set us free
 redeem trouble joy restore
 captives ever thou diest
 africk tributary evermore
 although thyself yet give
 liege annoyance thy followers live

 xxxix
 "the soldan thy neighbour
 surely men money thee aid
 evil eye king pepin's son
 strong africa surveyed
 efforts restore thee thy throne
 norandine thy kinsman made
 turk persian armenian arab mede
 prayed assist thee thy need"

 xl
 like words wary art
 hope quickly winning back reign
 sobrino soothed king heart
 thought perchance entertain
 well knows pass evil mart
 lord brought often sighs vain
 whoe'er foregoes sceptre swayed
 barbarians hath recourse aid

 xli
 jugurtha martial hannibal
 ancient times good proof afford
 era lewis hight moor
 delivered lewis' ward
 brother duke alphonso wiser lore
 learned fate  speak lord 
 wont madmen decry
 others rely

 xlii
 therefore aye throughout warfare drear
 waged pontiff fierce disdain
 albeit upon feeble powers peer
 could ill depend though italian plain
 driven friend aided whilere
 foe possessed naples' reign
 menace promise steeled
 ne'er another would dukedom yield

 xliii
 eastward king agramant turned prow
 seaward steered bark africk wide
 land wicked wind 'gan blow
 took reeling vessel one side
 master seated helm brow
 raised towards heaven monarch cried
 "i see fell fierce tempest form
 pinnace cannot face pelting storm

 xliv
 "if lords listen lore
 isle lefthand
 seems well make shore
 till overblown tempest's fury be"
 advice assents royal moor
 makes larboard land peril free
 sailor's weal tempests rise
 'twixt vulcan's lofty forge africk lies

 xlv
 juniper myrtle overgrown
 habitations islet bare
 pleasing solitude alone
 harbour wild stag roebuck deer hare
 save fishermen little known
 oftentimes shorn brambles
 hang moist nets meanwhile untroubled sleep
 scaly fishes quiet deep

 xlvi
 vessel sheltered main
 found tempest tost upon land
 conveyed king sericane
 erewhile arles one hand
 reverent wise worthy twain
 valiant kings embraced upon strand
 friends monarchs late
 walls paris arms together bore

 xlvii
 much displeasure sericana's knight
 heard king agramant griefs displaid
 consoled cause fight
 like courteous king kindly offer made
 brooked nat egypt's people light
 lacking faith resort aid
 "that thither perilous wend
 exiles said warned pompey's end

 xlviii
 "and senapus' aethiopian crew
 come beneath astolpho ye show
 wrest fruitful africa
 burnt laid chiefest city low

 wandering void wit short ago
 fittest cure whereby scape
 trouble meseems shape

 xlix
 "i love undertake quest
 count single combat appear

 wholly made copper steel

  brief easy task  free land

 l
 "i make nubians hold
 another faith divided nile's course

 men herds horse

 reavers shall land remain"

 li
 gradasso's second offer seemed
 opportune king troyano's son
 much blest chances sea
 upon desert isle thrown
 yet would upon pact agree
  nay repossess biserta's town

 deeming sore honour 'twoud offend

 lii

 battle king replies
 prepared let god
 good evil wise"
 "  follow mode another mode new
 comes mind" gradasso cries

 liii

 first last said agramant know
 arms better find thee
 though seek comrade high low
 sobrino cried becomes
 expert old show

 force counsel neighbourhood"

 liv
 stricken years yet vigorous sage
 well proved sword spear
 said found gray old age

 forthwith courier find bid steer

 count orlando part defy

 lv
 equal number armed knights
 matching foes lampedosa's shore
 quarters circumfluent sea

 till found roland biserta
 host beneath eye plunder share

 three monarchs cavalier

 pleasing anglante's valiant peer

 durindane gradasso's hold

 india count resolved go

 lvii

 heard sailed french shore
 nearer place offered

 accept challenge herald bore
 less brigliadoro since knew
 agramant's possession two

 lviii
 chose companions fight
 faithful brandimart olivier
 well proved one other's might
 knows alike passing dear
 good horses good armour seeks knight
 goodly swords lances far near
 meseems known
 none three warriors

 lix
 orlando oft certified
 fury scattered wide far

 river locked high turret
 throughout africa could provide
 well france long war
 king agramant born away best
 africa possest

 lx
 could armour rusted o'er
 brown age orlando bids unite
 meanwhile companions shore

 chanced turning towards sea sight
 full sail approaching descried
 helmless barque nought course guide

 lxi
 without pilot without crew alone
 wind fortune ordered bound
 vessel neared shore sails fullblown
 furrowing waves took ground
 ere three warriors shown
 love wherewith child bound
 story brings back bids record
 past 'twixt clermont's warlike lord

 lxii
 spake good pair warriors
 retreated martial fray
 beholding pact treaty broken
 every troop band disarray
 leader oath first untrue
 occasion evil
 study learn passing train
 king agramant emperor charlemagne

  faithful expert wary wight

 lxiv

 compact montalban's knight

 evil sect would forego

 demands make arles
 first broke faith king agramant charles

 lxv
 hears repeated far near
 agramant broke promise plight
 loves king side veer
 believes would error light
 moors broke scattered whilere
 rehearsed giddy height
 revolving wheel downward hurled
 pleasure rolls nether world

 lxvi

 rather sovereign lord attend
 love lady fits rein
 bit lets africk wend
 wheels counter course
 spurs threats restive mood shend
 save maintains treaty troth
 pledged paladin solemn oath

 lxvii
 wakeful stinging care side
 scourges goads less cavalier
 lest agramant divide
 taxed baseness fear
 many deem well abide
 many many would ill appear
 many would say oaths unbinding
 'tis unlawful unjust swear

 lxviii
 day ensuing night
 remains alone following day
 forever sifting doubtful sprite
 better depart stay
 lastly agramant decides knight
 africk wend way
 moved love liegelady sore
 moved honour duty

 lxix
 made arles yet hoped would ride
 fleet africa might bear
 port offing ships espied

 along seabeat shore toward marseilles

 lxx
 upon boat hoped lay hand
 love force thence convey
 already ogier's son made land
 barbarians' fleet captive prey
 could cast grain sand
 vessels moored closely lay
 mighty squadrons harbour brought
 conquerors prisoners fraught

 lxxi
 vessels moor made
 food fire water night
 saving fled conveyed
 safe marseilles victorious knight
 seven kings moorish sceptres swayed
 seen squadron put flight
 seven ships yielded foe
 stood mute weeping overwhelmed woe

 lxxii
 dudon issued forth upon dry land
 bent find charlemagne day
 moorish spoil captive band
 made triumphal pomp long display
 prisoners ranged upon strand
 round stood nubian victors gay
 shouting praise loud acclaim
 made region ring dudon's name

 lxxiii
 rogero far ships spied
 believed fleet agramant
 know pricked courser's side
 nearer mid knights mickle vaunt
 nasamon's king prisoner desired
 agricalt bambirago farurant
 balastro manilardo rimedont
 stood weeping eyes drooping front

 lxxiv
 unhappy state leave crew
 child loved monarchs cannot bear
 useless empty hand knew
 force little profits prayer
 couched lance keeper overthrew
 proved wonted might faulchion bare
 moment stretched upon strand
 hundred nubian band

 lxxv
 noise sir dudon hears slaughter spies
 knows stranger cavalier
 marks put rout people flies
 anguish lament mighty fear
 quickly courser shield helmet cries
 bosom arms thighs mailed whilere
 leaps horse  seized lance 
 forgets paladin france

 lxxvi
 called every one stand aside
 galling spur courser prest
 meanwhile hundred foes died
 filled hope every prisoner's breast
 rogero holy dudon spied
 approach horseback footmen rest
 esteeming head charged knight
 impelled huge desire prove might

 lxxvii
 already part moved dane
 saw child without spear
 flang far disdain
 take vantage cavalier
 admiring sir dudon's courteous vein
 "belie cannot" said peer
 "and perfect warriors must one
 paladins france known

 lxxviii
 "if compass shall shew
 name ere deed done"
 made demand stranger knew
 dudon danish ogier's valiant son
 rogero claimed equal due
 child courteous answer
  names either side announced  foes
 bold defiance speak come blows

 lxxix
 bold dudon iron mace
 deathless fame many fight
 wherewith proved fully race
 good danish warrior famed might
 best faulchions iron case
 cuirass casque wont bite
 youthful rogero scabbard snatched
 martial dane valour matched

 lxxx
 gentle youth ever willed
 offend ladylove least could
 knew offend spilled
 disastrous battle dudon's blood
 well lineage french houses skilled
 wist beatrice's sisterhood
  bradamant's mother  armelline
 mother danish paladine

 lxxxi
 therefore never thrust affray
 rarely smote edge plate chain
 warding mace giving way
 fall descending bane
 turpin believes rogero lay
 sir dudon swordstrokes slain
 yet never dane guard foregoes
 save faulchion's flat descend blows

 lxxxii
 flat featly edge plies
 good faulchion forged stubborn grain
 strange blindman's bluff weary wise
 hammers dudon might main
 often dazzles warrior's eyes
 hardly saddle maintain
 win better audience rhyme
 canto defer time


 canto 41

 argument
 prisoners child danish peer
 consigns homeward bound wrecked sea
 swimming escapes sincere
 faithful servant christ
 meanwhile bold brandimart olivier
 roland fiercely charge hostile three
 sobrino left wounded strife
 gradasso agramant deprived life



 odour wellfashioned bear hair
 find dainty raiment steeps
 gentle stripling damsel fair
  often love awakens weeps 
 ooze forth scent ambient air
 many day virtue keeps
 well shows manifest effects sure
 perfect first perfume pure

 ii
 drink cost good icarus drew
 yore sunburned sicklemen cheer
 'tis said lured celts boi
 alpine hills untouched toil whilere
 well shows cordial draught new
 since preserves virtue year
 tree wintry foliage cleaves
 well shows verdant spring tide leaves

 iii
 famous lineage many years
 courtesy great lasting light
 ever brightening burns appears
 shine flame clearly sight
 well proves sire este's noble peers
 must amid mortals shone forth bright
 fair gifts raise men sky
 glad sun mid glittering orbs high

 iv
 every feat exprest
 rogero's valiant mind courteous lore
 showed tokens clear manifest
 high mindedness shone
  toward dane virtues stood confest
 rehearsed
 belied mighty strength breath
 pity loth put lord death

 v
 danish warrior well certified
 wish slay youthful knight
 spared open side
 wearied could smite
 finally knew plain descried
 rogero scrupled put forth might
 less vigour less prowess steeled
 least courtesy would yield

 vi
 "pardi sir make peace" said "success
 contention cannot fall 
 cannot mine confess
 conquered captive thy courtesy"
 rogero answered "and less
 covet peace 'tis desired thee
 upon condition seven
 freed bondage given"

 vii
 showed seven whereof spake
 bound drooping heads sad array
 adding must hindrance make
 would kings africa convey
 dudon thus allowed child take
 seven allowed bear away
 bark well likes best chooses
 amid vessels africk looses

 viii
 looses bark sail bold wise
 trusting fickle wind seaward stood
 first due course vessel flies
 fills pilot full hardihood
 beach retreats sailors' eyes
 fades sea appears shoreless flood
 upon darkening day wind
 displays fickle perfidious kind

 ix
 shifts poop beam beam prow
 even short season doth remain
 reeling ship confounds pilot
 struck fore aft beam
 threatening billows rise haughty brow
 neptune's white herd lows main
 many deaths appear daunt rout
 waves beat troubled bark

 x
 blows wind front rear
 drives wave anend back
 others reeling vessel's side o'erpeer
 every billow threatens equal wrack
 pilot sighs confused pale fear
 vainly calls aloud shift tack
 strike jibe yard hand
 signs crew thing would command

 xi
 sound signal little boots eye
 sees amid dim rainy night
 voice unheard ascends sky 
 sky louder larum smite
 troubled sailors' universal cry
 roar waters together fight
 unheard every hest
 starboard larboard upon poop prow

 xii
 strained tackle sounds hollow roar
 wherein struggling wind fury breaks
 forked lightning flashes evermore
 fearful thunder heaven's wide concave shakes
 one rudder runs one grasps oar
 several office betakes
 one make fast another let go
 water water others throw

 xiii
 lo howling horribly sounding blast
 boreas sudden fury blows
 scourges tattered sail reeling mast
 almost high heaven water flows
 oars broken fell fast
 tempest pelts prow leeward goes
 ungoverned vessel's battered side
 undefended foaming tide

 xiv
 fallen starboard side beam ends
 turn keel uppermost lies
 meanwhile soul heaven recommends
 surer sure sink piteous cries
 scathe upon scathe malicious fortune sends
 one woe weathered others rise
 o'erstrained vessel splits seams
 many part hostile water streams

 xv
 fierce assault cruel coil doth keep
 upon sides wintry tempest fell
 sight high billows leap
 seems heaven would swell
 plunging wave sink deep
 appear spy gulfs hell
 small hope none faultering breath
 gaze upon inevitable death

 xvi
 despiteous sea livelong night
 drifted wind fury blew
 furious wind dawning light
 abated gathered force anew
 lo bare rock ahead appears sight
 vainly would wretched band eschew
 towards cliff despite impel
 raging tempest roaring swell

 xvii
 three times four palefaced pilot wrought
 tiller vigorous push sway
 bark surer passage sought
 waves snapt bore helm away
 lower ease bellying canvas aught
 sailors power time
 mend ill counsel best
 hard mortal peril prest

 xviii
 perceiving nothing defend
 bark wreck rude rock bare
 private aims alone attend
 preserve life care
 quickest skiff descend
 thought overcrowded
 many invade boat
 gunwaledeep scarce remains afloat

 xix
 rogero beholding master mate
 men abandoning ship speed
 doublet sans mail plate
 hopes skiff refuge need
 finds overcharged weight
 afterwards many succeed
 o'erwhelming wave pinnace drown
 wretched freight goes

 xx
 goes foundering drags whoe'er
 leaving larger bark relies
 doleful shrieks heard 'mid sob tear
 calling succour unpitying skies
 short space shrilling cry rear
 swoln rage scorn waters rise
 moment wholly stop vent
 whence issues sad clamour lament

 xxi
 one sinks outright reappear
 rise bounding billows go
 course head uplifted others steer
 arm unshod leg others show
 rogero tempest fear
 springs upward surface
 little distant sees rock vain
 eschewed attendant train

 xxii
 hands feet warrior rows
 hoping force thereof win shore
 breast boldly importunate flood blows
 unwearied breath foam
 waxing meanwhile troubled water rose
 rock abandoned vessel bore
 quitted unhappy men die
 curst lot death fly

 xxiii
 alas man's deceitful thoughts blind
 ship escaped wreck hope none
 master men charge resigned
 let vessel without guidance run
 would appear wind changed mind
 seeing sailed gone
 blows vessel shallows free
 better course safer sea

 xxiv
 drifted wildly guide
 without made directly africk's strand
 two three miles waste biserta wide
 upon quarter facing egypt's land
 sea went wind died
 stood bedded weary waste sand
 thither roland roved paced shore
 strain rehearsed

 xxv
 willing discover alone
 laden light stranded vessel
 olivier monodantes' son
 aboard shallow bark repair
 beneath hatchways descend none
 human kind see
 find good frontino trenchant sword
 gallant armour youthful lord

 xxvi
 hurried hasty flight
 even time take sword
 orlando known balisardo hight
 erewhile tale's upon record
 ye read well wite
 falerina lost lord
 waste well beauteous bowers laid
 brunello stole blade

 xxvii
 beneath carena plain
 brunello rogero bestowed
 matchless faulchion's edge grain
 experience already showed
 say orlando therefore fain
 heaven's king grateful thanks o'erflowed
 deemed often afterwards said
 heaven pressing need sent blade

 xxviii
 pressing need fight
 redoubted king sericane
 knew besides fearful might
 lord bayard durindane
 knowing anglantes' valiant knight
 highly rated plate chain
 proved valour
 valued less good rich fair

 xxix
 harness little need
 charmed weapons fortified
 olivier left warlike weed
 sword waist tied
 brandimart orlando gave steed
 thus equally spoil would divide
 companions twain equal share
 partners rich discovery

 xxx
 day fight goodly gear
 new warriors seek limbs deck
 blazoned upon orlando's shield appear
 burning bold lofty babel's wreck
 lymedog argent bears sir olivier
 couchant leash upon neck
 motto till comes gilded vest
 worthy drest

 xxxi
 bold brandimart designed upon day
 battle royal father's sake
 honour device gay
 dim surcoat field take
 gentle flordelice dark array
 wrought fairest facing could make
 costly jewels border sown
 sable vest one piece alone

 xxxii
 hand lady wrought vest
 becoming well finest plate chain
 wherein valiant warrior drest
 cloak courser's croup chest mane
 day addrest
 unto task till ended pain
 showed sign gladness
 ever seen smile

 xxxiii
 heartfelt fear torment evermore
 losing brandimart dame pursued
 whilere hundred times
 engaged fierce fearful fight viewed
 ever suchlike terror heretofore
 blanched cheek froze youthful blood
 new sense fear increased trouble
 made trembling lady's heart beat double

 xxxiv
 warriors wind canvas rear
 point device three accoutred
 bold sansonet left england's peer
 intrusted faithful army's care
 flordelice pricked heart cruel fear
 filling heavens vow lament prayer
 far sight followed
 follows sails upon foaming sea

 xxxv
 scarce much labour two captains led
 gazing waters shore
 palace drew bed
 left lady grieved trembling sore
 meanwhile upon quest others sped
 mercy wind weather seaward bore
 vessel made island right
 field appointed fell fight

 xxxvi
 orlando disembarks array
 kinsman olivier brandimart
 side fronts eastern ray
 encamp haply without art
 king agramant arrives day
 tents contrary part
 sun sinking fast forborne
 encounter till following morn

 xxxvii
 skies dawning light receive
 armed servants keep watch
 valiant brandimart resorts eve
 thitherward tents paynims rear
 parleys noble leader's leave
 agramant friends whilere
 underneath banner moor
 france passed africk's shore

 xxxviii
 salutes joining hand hand
 fair reasons friend faithful knight
 pressed leader paynim band
 appointed battle fight
 every town  restored command 
 laying 'twixt nile calpe's rocky height
 vowed roland's license receive
 upon mary's son would believe

 xxxix
 said "for loved
 counsel give deem sane
 since pursue assured must
 mahound hold idol vain
 jesus christ living god see
 conduct way fain
 i' way safety fain would move
 others love

 xl
 "in consists welfare counsel none
 save disaster avail

 meet combat clad plate mail
 profit field
 weighs loss equal scale
 conqueror little gain ensues
 yet little loss results lose

 xli
 "were good orlando others slain
 banded conquer die
 wherefore ye lost domain
 acquire anew forsooth see
 reason hope entertain
 lifeless champaigne lie
 men wanting king charles's host
 guard africa paltriest post"

 xlii
 thus brandimart afick's cavalier
 much would subjoined side
 knight angry voice haughty cheer
 pagan interrupted replied
 " `tis sure temerity madness sheer
 moves whatsoever wight beside
 counsels matter good ill
 uncalled counsellor's duty fulfil

 xliii
 "and think love counsels flow
 bore bear say
 speak truth know
 orlando see day
 ween knowing doomed woe
 marked devouring dragon's prey
 ye mankind would drag nether hell
 eternity pains dwell

 xliv
 "if shall win lose remount throne
 pass future days exile drear
 god knows whose purpose unknown
 turn anglantes' peer
 befall may shall nought done
 unworthy king shameful fear
 death must certain portion
 rather wrong princely blood die

 xlv
 "ye may depart save ye better play
 warrior tomorrow's listed fight
 ye plaid embassador today
 arms second ill anglantes' knight"
 agramant ended furious say
  angry bosom boiling despite
 said  warriors parted repose
 till neighbouring sea day arose

 xlvi
 first whitening dawn seen
 armed moment leapt horseback
 short parley past puissant foes
 stop interval
 laid rest lances keen
 foul fault fall
 meseems lord deeds tell
 let rogero perish swell

 xlvii
 cleaving flood nimble hands feet
 swims amid horrid surges' roar
 threatening wind tempest beat
 harassed conscience vexes
 christ's wrath fears since waters sweet
 time fair occasion served yore
 folly baptism little prized
 fears bitter waves baptized

 xlviii
 many promises remembered
 whereby ladylove tied
 oaths sworn good rinaldo
 nought fulfilled upon side
 god hope would hear spare
 repented oftentimes cried
 land scape mortal scaith
 christian vowed heart faith

 xlix
 ne'er succour moorish train
 sword lance faithful offend
 france charlemagne
 would render honour due forthwith wend
 bradamant idle words
 cheat bring love honest end
 miracle vows

 l
 vigour grows unwearied mind
 still arms billow throw
 billow followed fast behind
 whereof one lifts high one sinks low
 rising falling vext wave wind
 gains child shore labour slow
 rocky hill slopes seaward
 drenched dropping climbs rugged coast

 li
 others plunged flood
 end o'erwhelmed wild waters died
 rogero providence seemed good
 mounted solitary islet's side
 safe upon barren rock stood
 new alarm stripling terrified
 within narrow bounds confined
 die hardship hunger pined

 lii
 yet unconquered heart intent
 suffer heavens ordained
 o'er hard stones steep ascent
 towards top feet intrepid strained
 hundred yards gone bent
 years long fast vigil stained
 worthy much worship one espied
 hermit's weed descend mountain's side

 liii
 cries approaching "saul saul
 persecutest thou faithful seed"
 whilom said saviour saint paul
 blessed stroke smote steed
 "thou thought'st pass sea pay withal
 thought'st defraud pilot meed
 thou seest god arms reach smite
 farthest thou deem'st god might"

 liv
 holiest anchoret pursued
 night foregoing god send
 vision slumbered foreshewed
 thither aid child wend
 wherein past future life reviewed
 seen well unhappy end
 sons grandsons every heir
 fully revealed good hermit

 lv
 anchoret pursues upbraid
 rogero first comforts finally
 upbraideth delaid
 beneath easy yoke bend knee
 done whilom prayed
 called christ  uncompelled free 
 done little grace turned god
 saw threatening rod

 lvi
 comforts  christ aye heaven allows
 late early heaven desire
 labourers gospel shows
 paid vineyard's lord equal hire
 charity warm devotion glows
 instructs venerable sire
 toward rocky cell resides
 weak steps slow rogero guides

 lvii
 hallowed cell hill's brow
 little church receives rising day
 commodious fane fair enow
 thence beach descends thicket gray
 fertile fruitbearing palmtrees blow
 myrtle lowly juniper bay
 evermore threaded limpid fountain
 falls ceaseless murmur mountain

 lviii
 'twas well nigh forty years since stone
 goodly friar fixed quiet seat
 live holy life alone
 saviour chose harbourage meet
 pure water drink plucked one
 plant wild berries meat
 hearty robust ailments clear
 holy man reached eightieth year

 lix
 hermit lit fire heaped board
 different fruits within small repair
 wherewith child somedeal strength restored
 dried clothes dripping hair
 better ease god's word
 mysteries faith expounded
 day following fountain clear
 anchoret baptized cavalier

 lx
 dwells young rogero well content
 rugged sojourn allow
 friar showed shortly intent
 send fain would turn prow
 meanwhile many argument
 handles often god's kingdom
 things appertaining case
 rogero's blood future race

 lxi
 lord every thing doth see hear
 holiest anchoret bewrayed
 exceed seventh year
 dating christian made
 death pinabel whilere
 lady's deed rogero laid
 well bertolagi's slain
 false maganza's ill impious train

 lxii
 treason smothered
 sign thereof outwardly appear
 evil people dealt blow
 entomb youthful cavalier
 vengeance follow albeit slow
 dealt consort sister dear
 wife long sought
 weary womb heavy burden fraught

 lxiii
 'twixt brenta athesis beneath hills
 erst good antenor contented
 sulphureous veins liquid rills
 mead field furrows glad indented
 left pools xanthus fills
 ida ascanius long lamented
 till child forests bear
 little distant ateste

 lxiv
 child might beauty grown
 like sire rogero shall hight
 trojans trojan lineage known
 shall lord elect solemn rite
 next charles succour whose crown
 lombards shall stripling fight
 fair land dominion shall obtain
 honoured title marquis gain

 lxv
 charles shall say latin `este'
  lords dominion round
 entitled future season este
 shall good omen beauteous ground
 thus ancient title ateste
 shall two first letters lose sound
 god also servant foresaid
 vengeance taken rogero's dead

 lxvi
 shall vision consort true
 appear somedeal dawn day
 shall relate traitor slew
 body lies shall say
 marphisa hence valiant two
 fire sword earth shall poictiers lay
 shall son befitting age
 less harm maganza mighty rage

 lxvii
 azos alberts obysons dwell
 hermit hoar offspring bright
 borso nicholas leonel

 curbs tongue recite
 rogero fit reveals
 fitting conceal conceals

 lxviii
 meanwhile orlando bold brandimart
 good knight marquis olivier

 name well befitting sericana's peer
 two  adverse part
 footpace coursers steer
 say king agramant king sobrine
