 lxix
 encounter mid field pellmell
 sky flew every shivered lance
 loud noise sea seen swell
 loud noise echoed even france
 gradasso roland met befel
 fairly balanced might appear chance
 vantage rinaldo's horse
 made gradasso seem greater force

 lxx
 baiardo shocked steed lesser might
 backed orlando might main
 made courser stagger left right
 measure next length upon plain
 vainly raise strove anglantes' knight
 thrice nay four times rowels rein
 balked end lights upon field
 draws balisarda uplifts shield

 lxxi
 agramant encounters olivier
 fitly matched foaming coursers gall
 bold brandimart unhorsed career
 sobrino plain withal
 'twas fault horse cavalier
 seldom good sobrino used fall
 courser's misdeed
 sobrino found without steed

 lxxii
 brandimart upon earth descried
 king sobrine assailed man
 gradasso anglantes' pride
 equally unhorsed fury ran
 agramant oliviero's side
 meanwhile warfare stood began
 broken bucklers spears
 swords encountered returning peers

 lxxiii
 roland saw gradasso guise
 showed return little cared
  return brandimart aye plies
 presses sericana's monarch hard
 turns round like afoot descries
 sobrino doubtful strife unpaired
 sprang haughty look
 heaven warrior trod terror shook

 lxxiv
 foreseeing assault wary eye
 prepared close ward behold moor
 pilot cresting nigh
 threatening billow comes hollow roar
 towards turns prow high
 views sea would gladly ashore
 sobrino rears buckler withstand
 furious fall falerina's brand

 lxxv
 fine steel balisarda's blade
 arms little shelter
 person puissance swayed
 roland singe world rare
 splits shield nowise stayed
 though bound steel edges
 splits shield bottom rends
 shoulder underneath descends

 lxxvi
 upon shoulder though twisted chain
 double plates encase paynim foe
 hinder much sword stubborn grain
 opening wide parted flesh
 sobrino orlando smites vain
 valiant count every blow
 special grace king heaven
 body charmed arms given

 lxxvii
 valorous count redoubling still blows
 thought trunk monarch's head smite
 sobrino strength clermont knows
 shield ill boots retired fight
 yet far upon brows
 fell dread faulchion anglantes' knight
 'twas flat might main
 crushed helm stupefied brain

 lxxviii
 stunned furious stroke pressed shore
 long ere rise
 paladin believes warfare o'er
 deprived life sobrino lies
 lest gradasso ill pass sore
 bring sir brandimart flies
 paynim overmatched horse
 arms faulchion perhaps force

 lxxix
 bold brandimart guides frontino's rein
 goodly courser erst rogero's steed
 well contends sericane
 king yet little seems foe exceed
 tempered plate chain
 bold paynim lord would better speed
 felt illarmed knight
 often gave ground traversed left right

 lxxx
 better good frontino horse none
 obey upon sign cavalier
 'twould seem courser sense shun
 sharp durindana's fall
 meanwhile elsewhere horrid battle done
 royal agramant olivier
 may deemed well matched warlike sleight
 champions differing much martial might

 lxxxi
 orlando left sobrino said
 earth sericana's pride
 desirous valiant brandimart aid
 even afoot fury hied
 prompt assail gradasso blade
 loose walking mid field espied
 goodly horse sobrino thrown
 bowned straight make steed

 lxxxii
 seized horse none deed gainsaid
 took leap vaulted prize
 hand bridle grasped blade
 orlando's motions good gradasso spies
 coming king dismaid
 name paladin defies
 partners fight
 hopes make dark 'tis night

 lxxxiii
 leaving foe facing brava's lord
 thrust collar shirt mail
 else beside flesh faulchion bored
 pierce would every labour fail
 time descends orlando's sword
 balisarda bites spells avail
 shears helmet cuirass shield
 cleaves whate'er rakes headlong blow

 lxxxiv
 face bosom thigh seamed
 beneath mail king sericane
 blood till never streamed
 since armour wore new rage pain
 thereat warrior felt strange seemed
 sword cut yet durindane
 roland struck home nearer
 head belly cleft clean

 lxxxv
 arms trust cavalier
 heretofore proved arms
 care caution whilere
 prepares parry faulchion keen
 entered brandimart sees brava's peer
 snatched battle
 conflicts placed
 needed might succour bear

 lxxxvi
 fight balanced 'mid foes
 sobrino earth long time lain
 returned uprose
 face shoulder suffering grievous pain
 lifts face eyes throws
 thither distant plain
 sees leader long paces steers
 stealthily none coming hears

 lxxxvii

 agramant warrior's rear
 wounded upon hocks fierce wise
 courser unheeding olivier
 falls headlong beneath lies
 valiant master foot clear

 lxxxviii

 thought head neck shorn
 forbids armour bright show
 vulcan hammered hector worn
 brandimart sees risque foe

 sobrino head smote flung
 straight earth fierce old man upsprung

 lxxxix
 turned anew olivier speed
 warrior's soul promptly way
 least baron impede

 bold olivier whose better arm freed
 sword could fend lay
 meanwhile smites longes
 sword's length holds ancient peer

 xc
 hopes little withstood
 shall straight delivered pain
 sees wholly strained wet blood
 spills much open vein
 'twould seem speedily must subdued
 weak hardly sustain
 often oft rise marquis strove
 yet could beneath courser move

 xci

 storms paynim cavalier

 worse southern king's career

 xcii
 great vantage another part
 proof perfect iron weed
 venture took sir brandimart
 could haste suchlike need
 hopes anger puts heart
 change better coat speech
 albeit moorish king bitter blow
 made blood right flow

 xciii

 laughing matter scanned

 roland's gradasso's battle weighed

 xciv

 xcv

 xcvi
 would done

 good sword fell upon

 xcvii

 county stroke astounded sore

 xcviii

 xcix

 c
 father heaven 'mid spirits chosen thee

 ci

 two inches thick broke fell blow

 cii
 come county turns eye

 'tis time suspend lay


 canto 42

 argument
 victory count orlando lies
 good rinaldo bradamant heart
 one angelica sighs
 young rogero suffer cruel smart
 chase indian damsel hies
 disdain preserves thence depart
 towards italy courteous cheer
 welcome guested cavalier



 bit iron curb found
 could adamantine rein
 make wrath keep order due bound
 within lawful limits contain
 one constant heart bound
 linked love solid bolt chain
 see violence foul deceit
 mortal damage dishonour meet

 ii
 mind sometimes possest
 ill savage action led astray
 may deserve excuse breast
 reason's sovereign sway
 achilles beneath borrowed crest
 saw patroclus crimsoning way
 murderer's slaughter ill content
 till mangled corse dragged shent

 iii
 unconquered duke alphonso anger
 inflamed thy host day weighty stone
 wounded thy forehead grievous blow
 believed rest gone
  inflamed fury foe
 rampart fosse wall defence none
 one within works lay dead
 wight left woeful news spread

 iv
 seeing thy fall caused thine mighty pain
 fury moved hadst thou lord
 maintained thy footing haply might thy train
 less licence plied murderous sword
 enough thee thy bastia regain
 fewer hours replaced beneath thy ward
 cordova's fierce granada's band
 took days erewhile wrest thy hand

 v
 haply heaven's vengeance ordered befel
 case thy wound hindered thee
 end cruel outrage foul fell
 done band punished
 unhappy vestidel
 wearied hurt sought clemency
 among mostly unchristened train
 mid hundred swords unarmed slain

 vi
 end say rage none
 weighed equal wise
 kindles injury done
 kinsman friend lord eyes
 justly orlando's heart one
 dear might sudden fury rise
 saw extended sand
 slain stroke fierce gradasso's brand

 vii
 nomade swain darting way
 slippery line horrid snake seen
 young son amid sands play
 killed venomed tooth enflamed spleen
 grasps batoon poisonous worm slay
 sword every sword keen
 fury grasped anglantes' knight
 wreaked agramant first despite

 viii
 scaped bleeding helm loosened form head
 half shield swordless mail
 sore wounded places said
 dull envious falcon's nail
 escapes unhappy sparrowhawk half dead
 ruffled plumage loss tail
 orlando came smote
 helmed head confined bust

 ix
 loosed helm neck without band
 like rush severed sword
 downfell shook last upon sand
 heavy trunk libya's mighty lord
 spirit flitted stygian strand
 charon crooked boathook dragged aboard
 orlando wastes pain
 sword hand seeks sericane

 x
 headless trunk africk's cavalier
 extended shore gradasso's viewed
 never befallen whilere
 shook heart troubled visage shewed
 coming anglantes' peer
 presageful fate appears subdued
 seeks means fence foe
 fierce orlando deals fatal blow

 xi
 orlando levels better side
 beneath lowest rib faulchion bright
 crimsoned hilt hand's breadth wide
 flank sword appears sight
 well mighty puissance testified
 spoke strongest living knight
 stroke warrior undone
 better paynimry none

 xii
 little victory good orlando cheers
 quickly saddle throws
 face disturbed wet tears
 brandimart haste warrior goes
 field red blood appears
 helmet cleft hatchet's blows
 spungy rind frail
 would defended worse mail

 xiii
 orlando lifts helmet descries
 brandimart's head destructive brand
 cleft even nose eyes
 yet wounded knight spirits manned
 pardon king paradise
 death able demand
 exhort patience brava's peer
 whose manly cheeks wet many tear

 xiv
  "roland thy helping orisons
 beseech thee remember me" cried
 "nor recommend thee less warmly "
  flordelice would could say  died
 sounds songs angels sky
 soul parts heard every side
 prison freed mid hymns love
 ascends blissful realms

 xv
 orlando albeit joy heart
 death holy certified
 called bliss brandimart
 heaven opened knight described
 human wilfulness  aye takes part
 weak senses  hardly abide
 loss one brother dear
 refrain many scalding tear

 xvi
 warlike sobrino much blood bereaved
 flank wounded visage rained
 long since fallen reversed sore aggrieved
 vessels well nigh drained
 olivier lies stretched retrieved
 retrieve crippled foot save sprained
 almost crushed long plain
 stout courser jammed limb lain

 xvii
 orlando helped woe begone
 weeping olivier brought low
 could released limb alone
 released endures pain woe
 helpless warrior cannot stand upon
 shift withal wounded foot
 benumbed crippled leg
 without assistance cannot move

 xviii
 victory brought orlando small delight
 heavily hardly weighed
 slaughtered brandimart piteous sight
 sure oliviero's life made
 sobrino yet survived little light
 wounded monarch amid much shade
 almost spend ebbing life remained
 fast crimson blood drained

 benignly comforts speaks fair

 xx

 canto 43

 argument
 rinaldo courteous landlord hears
 folly destroyed every good

 toward ravenna falling flood

 christens sobrino heals olivier



 execrable avarice vile thirst
 sordid gold doth astound
 easily thou seizest soul immersed
 baseness taint unsound

 worthy praise avoided thee

 ii
 earth sea heaven us square
 know nature's causes works properties
 beginnings endings
 soar till heaven open eyes
 yet steadier aim better care
 stung thy venom sordid wise
 gather treasure single scope
 every comfort every hope

 vi

 xxxii

 twixt fierce threatening horns foaming po

 xxxvi

 wends melissa
 wholly ease madonna view
 woman attendant squire
 suppliant prayer forthwith sue
 next goads evil deed apply
 show emerald ruby diamond might serve
 make firmest heart honour swerve

 xxxvii
 "and declare gift small
 may hope make
 vantage speak hall
 husband present time gone
 long recall
 since knew love shown
 loving faith end
 might worthily reward pretend

 xxxviii
 "at first somedeal disturbed became
 like scarlet would listen say
 seeing bright jewels flash like flame
 stubborn heart softened gave way
 brief speech feeble said dame
 remember takes life away
 wishes said would comply
 sure unseen watchful eye

 xxxix
 "me wife's words like poisoned weapon thrill

 transformed mine ancient shape anew
  bethink thee hue wife became
 taken notorious shame

 xl

 stand silent downcast eye

 furrow fall woeful cheeks

 xli
 "shame stings sore yet sorer wise

 night stream haste descends

 xlii
 "and morn presents
 loved cavalier
 whose semblance whose borrowed face wore

 xliii

 evil brought

 little remnant life possest
 well believe year died

 xliv

 xlv

 whether death speedy slow

 xlvi
 "impatient treated disdain
  loved life said 
 forthwith mistress remain

  behold present cause pain

 ever woman heard"

 xlvii
 tale mournful cavalier taught
 closed history

 "right ill advice thee melissa brought

 xlviii
 "if thy wife avarice inclined
 break faith thee untrue

 xlix
 "with fierce arms thou ill didst assail
 behold brave defence thou sought

 meseems thou tempting didst fail
 quickly caught
 know tempted thee much
 thou thyself hadst better stood touch"

 l
 ends rinaldo  parley done 
 rises rest desires go
 awhile repose gone

 idly little time bestow
 mansion's master made reply
 house might pleasure lie

  would take counsel guide 
 comfort might sleep throughout night
 yet advance miles "for thou" cried
 "shalt pinnace rapid flight
 without risque shall current glide
 therein shalt thou night pursue thy way
 thy journey gain withal day"

 lii
 good seemed proffer rinaldo's eyes

 cliv

 gradasso came behind thee
 thee might succoured single cry

 clxi
 "and haply nimbly might made
 stroke might caught
 head buckler stayed
 little ill dying would wrought
 anyhow shall die  debt paid 
 melancholy death profit nought
 died defending thee strife
 could better bestowed life

 clxii
 "even averse hard destiny
 heaven's host thee sought aid
 least tears bathed thy visage
 last kiss thereon least laid
 ere amid blessed hierarchy
 thy spirit mixt `depart'  said 
 `in peace wait thy rest
 where'er thou art swiftly shall repair'

 clxiii
 "is brandimart reign
 whose honoured sceptre thou wast take
 thee dommogire thy fair domain
 thus went thus welcome dost thou make
 alas hope today thou renderest vain
 ah designs fell fortune dost thou break
 ah wherefore fear since lot blest
 lost lose well worthless rest"

 clxiv
 repeating plaint spite
 fury waxed despair
 made new assault upon tresses bright
 fault wholly hair
 wildly hands together doth smite
 gnaw nails lip bosom tear
 return roland peers
 bemoans melts tears

 clxv
 roland olivier much requires
 leech's care anguish allay
 worthy place desires
 much wherein sir brandimart lay
 steers lofty mountain fires
 brightens night smoke obscures day

 widely distant lies land

 clxvi
 fresh wind favour blows
 loose hawser close day
 heaven silent goddess shows
 shining horn guide way
 following morn rose

 roland orders ensuing night
 needful funeral rite

 clxvii

 westering sun's fair light spent
 many nobles neighbouring town
 invital girgenti went
  shore torches blazing
 sounding wide cries loud lament 
 thither returned late life bereft
 friends beloved life death left

 clxviii

 age's heavy burden bows

 might well wept away eyes brows
 upbraiding skies stars cavalier
 like lion whose veins fever glows

 hoary hair rends wrinkled skin

 clxix
 upon paladin's return cry
 redoubled mourning louder grew
 orlando corse approached nigh

 pale eve acanthus' dye
 lily's plucked morn drew
 heavy sigh warrior dead
 fixing stedfast eyes county said

 clxx
 "o comrade bold true liest slain
 dost live heaven know
 rewarded life thy glorious gain
 neither heat cold take woe
 forgive thou beholdest complain
 sorrow remain
 share delights thee
 thou art left behind

 clxxi
 "alone without thee nought may
 ever possess without thee please
 still thee tempest affray
 ah wherefore thee calm ease

 follow thee soul release

 partner thy guerdon

 clxxii
 "thine guerdon mine loss thy gain
 single single woe

 clxxiii

 clxxix

 clxxx
 ceremonies would long say

 clxxxi

 clxxxii

 clxxxiii
 seeing tears unceasing flow

 ease satisfy sad desires

 till wearied corse soul expires

 clxxxiv

 wholly serve god willed

 clxxxv
 still sepulchre dwelt worn

 long ere parcae shorn

 three christian warriors homeward borne

 fourth comrade remained behind

 clxxxvi

 might ease wound warlike olivier
 beginning could ill
 salved hard heal meanwhile hear

 discoursed thereon skipper moved

 clxxxvii

 whose isle none seeking succour vainly tread
 whether counsel aid
 hath done superhuman deeds dead

 cxcii

 canto 44

 argument
 rinaldo sister child hath plight
 marseilles warrior gone
 crimsoned wide field fight
 therein arrives king otho's valiant son
 paris thence squadron bright
 mighty grace wonderous honour done
 child departs resolved leo's slaughter
 duke aymon betrothed daughter



 poor abode mid paltry walls bare
 amid discomforts calamities
 often friendship heart united
 better roof lordly guise
 royal court beset snare
 mid envious wealth ease luxuries
 charity spent every side
 friendship unless counterfeit spied

 ii
 hence ensues peace pact
 princes peers shortlived wear
 today king pope emperor leagued seen
 marrow deadly foemen
 outward mien
 heart spirit sovereigns bear
 since wholly careless right wrong
 profit look faithless throng

 iii
 though little prone friendship sort
 loveth dwell
 talk earnest sport
 speak except cozening tale tell
 yet together poor resort
 prisoned fortune false fell
 friendship speedily discern
 though years past yet learn

 iv
 retreat ancient eremite
 could bind inmates faster noose
 true love firmly unite
 could domes courtiers use
 enduring knot tight
 nothing short death tie could loose
 benignant hermit found crew
 whiter heart swans outward hue

 v
 kind found courteous lore
 untainted iniquity wise
 painted nevermore
 go forth unless concealed disguise
 injuries among done
 memory comrades buried lies
 could better love one womb
 one seed warlike band come

 vi
 rinaldo lordly train
 rogero graced lovingly caressed
 well listed plain
 proved peer strong martial gest
 courteous humane
 knight e'er laid lance rest
 much many ground
 mighty obligation bound

 vii
 fearful risk richardetto run
 knew rogero bested
 time spanish monarch's hest done
 daughter seized bed
 delivered either son
 good duke buovo erewhile said
 bertolagi maganza's hand
 evil followers paynim band

 viii
 honour hold rogero dear
 sir rinaldo thought debt constrained
 could done whilere
 warlike lord sorely grieved pained
 one africk's monarch couched spear
 one cause royal charles maintained
 rogero christian knew
 could done would

 ix
 welcome endless proffers side
 honour good rogero paid
 prudent sire kindness spied
 opening made pass assayed
 "and nothing else remains" hermit cried
 "nor trust counsel gainsaid
 conjoined friendship shall
 yet faster coupled affinity

 x
 "that two bright progenies none
 equal illustrious blood
 race may spring brighter sun
 shine wherever bright sun may glow
 years ages run
 course yet endure fairer show
 orbits burn heavenly fires
 instruction god inspires"

 xi
 discourse pursuing still seer
 spake moves rinaldo rede
 give sister cavalier
 albeit either small entreaties need
 together orlando olivier
 counsel lauds would union speed
 king charles aymon hopes approve
 france welcome wide wedded love

 xii
 spake together peer paladine
 knew aymon king charles' consent
 unto grecian emperor constantine
 give gentle daughter intent
 young leo lofty line
 heir hope crave maid sent
 warmth praises worth inspired
 love unseen leo fired

 xiii
 hath aymon answered alone
 cannot conclude thereon sort
 first hath spoken son
 rinaldo absent charles's court
 winged haste deems thither run
 joy kinsman high report
 high regard bears heir
 nought resolve till thither repair

 xiv
 good rinaldo father wide
 imperial practice knowing nought
 promised beauteous sister bride
 upon well roland's thought
 others harboured cell beside
 hermit wrought
 marriage 'twas peer's belief
 could choose pleasure clermont's chief

 xv
 day night following day
 great part sage monk warriors spent
 scarce mindful crew coming stay
 albeit wind blew fair intent
 impatient long delay
 one message warriors sent
 return barons urged sore
 parforce parted hermit hoar

 xvi
 child long banished stayed
 lone rock whereon waters roared
 farewell holy master made
 taught true faith anew sword
 orlando girt side blade
 frontino martial hector's arms restored
 knowing horse arms whilere
 well kindness peer

 xvii
 though enchanted sword better right
 would worn good anglantes' chief
 fearful garden might
 blade mickle toil grief
 rogero faulchion bright
 received good frontino thief
 willingly thereof rest
 soon asked warrior repossest

 xviii
 hermit blessings band implores
 bark fine return sails
 give winds waves oars
 clear skies gentle gales
 vow prayer patron makes moors
 pinnace marseilles
 safely harboured let chiefs remain
 till conduct astolpho train

 xix
 bloody dearbrought victory
 scarcely joyful tale astolpho knew
 seeing evermore fair france would
 secure mischief moorish crew
 homeward send king aethiopy
 devised together army
 sandy desert selfsame track
 led biserta's sack

 xx
 erewhile restored afric waters ride
 sir dudon's ships paynims rout
 whose prows new miracle poop side
 soon sable crews
 changed anew leaves far wide
 raised sudden breeze blown
 scattered midair like light gear
 go eddying wind disappear

 xxi
 home horse foot nubian host arraid
 squadrons wasted africk go
 king first thanks astolpho paid
 said eternal debt owe
 person given aid
 might main foe
 skins astolpho gave confined
 turbid tempestuous southern wind

 xxii
 say enclosed skins wind gave
 fury blows noon high
 moves shifting plain many wave
 fills eddying sand troubled sky
 carry scathe save
 squadrons lest dusty whirlwind fly
 bids arrived home unnoose
 bladder's vent let prisoners loose

 xxiii
 lofty atlas passes
 horses nubian riders bear
 turpin relates changed stone
 steeds return
 time duke france gone
 thus provided care
 main places moorish land
 made hippogryph anew wings expand

 xxiv
 reached sardinia one flight shear
 corsica sardinia o'er
 foaming sea venturous course steer
 inclining somewhat left griffin's soar
 seamarshes last light career
 stopt rich provence's pleasant shore
 hyppogryph done
 erewhile enjoined sainted john

 xxv

 provence winged courser borne
 nevermore saddle bit
 gall let lair return
 already planet whither flit
 things lost earth sound deprived horn
 hoarse mute remained
 soon holy place astolpho gained

 xxvi
 thence marseilles came came day

 arraigns son calls arrogant

 xxxviii
 beatrice believes highminded fair
 hest exhorts reply
 rather constrained pair

 wrong rinaldo bear
 regard mother's eye
 let refuse keep stedfast course
 free rinaldo cannot force

 xxxix
 silent stands mournful bradamant dares
 meanwhile ladymother's speech gainsay

 thinks choice left obey
 yet foul fault eyes appears
 falsely say
 cannot since
 guidance great small mighty love

 xl
 deny dared yet seem content
 sighed spake  uncontrolled
 could  gave secret sorrow vent
 eyes tears like billows rolled
 portion pains torment

 beat uptore brake
 thus made lament thus spake

 xli
 "ah shall wills right
 sovereign mistress
 shall hold cheaply slight
 mother's satisfy

 xlii

 rogero surrender
 new hope new love new

 good children good parents due

 duty happiness pleasure

 dispose love
 think dispose strict sway

 xliv

 xlv

 fair deed other's good wrought
 yearly bee whose labour's fruit

 xlvi
 "if shall obey father's hest

 greater wisdom far possest

 one side

 members house beside

 xlvii

 xlviii
 cruel thoughts afflicted maid torment

 albeit sad tidings vent

 xlix
 goods nature's hand supplies

 regal splendour magnanimity

 l
 whose disposal honours lie
 give take away renown
 vulgar herd vulgar

 emperor pope king raised high

 li

 lii

 lvii

 lviii

 lix
 things rogero said beside
 discoursing strain
 oftentimes afflicted warrior cried

 lamented sorrows

 lx

 vex rogero works woe

 lest grecian prince forego

 drive comfort knight bestow

 lxi

 faithful
 deals love kindness scorn
 hath doubtful fortune good ill store
 rock faith sea

 changed calm storm
 ever change eternity

 lxii
 "sooner shall file chisel made lead
 rough diamond various forms impart
 stroke fickle fortune sped
 love's keen anger break constant heart
 sooner return alp fountainhead
 troubled streams summit part
 e'er change chances good nought
 shall wander way stedfast thought

 lxiii
 "all power o'er bestowed

 know prince whose throne new

 ever surer state wide world

 thou need'st dig ditch build tower

 lxiv
 "for thou hire aids assault none

 shall riches

 dazzle silly vulgar train

 shall ever make thee slight

 lxv
 "thou hast cause amid thy griefs fear
 heart ever bear new impress
 deeply thine image graven
 cannot removed heart's core
 wax proved love whilere
 smote hundred times
 blows single scale displaced
 time therein hand thine image traced

 lxvi
 "ivory gem every hardgrained stone
 best resists griding tool may break
 save form hath taken none
 ever graver's iron take
 heart like marble thing least prone
 beneath chisel's trenchant edge flake
 love may wholly splinter ere may
 another's beauty core enlay"

 lxvii
 many words comfort rife
 full love faith said beside
 might thousand times given life
 albeit thousand times knight died
 clear tempestuous strife
 friendly port hopes appeared ride
 hopes foul furious wind anew
 far sheltering land seaward blew

 lxviii
 gentle bradamant fain
 would far hath signified
 wonted daring armed heart
 boldly casting respect aside
 one day stood king charlemagne
 "sire ever yet" damsel cried
 "i found favour eyes deed
 done heretofore deny meed

 lxix
 "and entreat claim fee
 royal promise plight
 grant prayer fain would see
 shall demand right"
 "thy valour damsel dear deserves
 boon wherewith thy worth requite"
 charles answered "and content thee swear
 though kingdom thou should'st claim share"

 lxx
 "the boon highness sue
 let parents accord

 prowess lord
 let contend tourney
 would assay sword
 wife let wins wear
 let loses pair"

 lxxi
 cheerful face emperor made reply
 entreaty well worthy maid
 tranquil mind might rely
 would accord boon prayed

 news others conveyed
 day withal told
 ears beatrice aymon old

 lxxii

 alike sudden anger fraught
 plainly perceive claim
 rogero leo wrought
 active prevent damsel's aim
 safe conclusion brought
 privily take king charles's court

 lxxiii
 castle royal charlemagne
 given aymon days
 built carcasson perpignan

 resolved send eastward twain
 prison kept evermore
 willing nilling must forsake
 rogero lord must leo take

 lxxiv
 martial maid less modest vein
 bold full fire foe
 albeit guard castellain
 hath set free come go

 yet prison death every pain woe
 suffer resolved constant maid
 rogero betrayed

 lxxv
 rinaldo thus ravished hand
 ancient aymon's craft sister spied
 saw could wedlock's band
 dispose vain affied
 old sire complains doth brand
 laying filial love fear aside

 maid likes best

 lxxvi
 rogero bearing sore afraid
 shall lose bride leo take
 left alive force love maid
 resolved within nothing spake
 constantine's heir perish blade
 augustus god would make
 save hope deceived vain
 would sire son deprive life reign

 lxxvii
 limbs arms trojan hector's
 afterwards tartar king's steeled
 bade rein frontino wonted wear
 exchanged crest surcoat emblazoned shield
 emprize pleased bear
 argent eagle azure field
 white lily unicorn
 upon field crimson worn

 lxxviii
 chose attendant squires best
 willed none else accompany
 gave charge ne'er exprest
 rogero's name place
 crost meuse rhine pricked upon quest
 austrian countries hungary
 along right bank danube made
 rode anend reached belgrade

 lxxix
 save dark danube makes descent
 sea increased doth flow
 saw imperial ensigns spread tent
 white pavilion thronged troops
 constantine town bent
 anew late bulgarian foe
 person son constantine
 empire's force host line

 lxxx
 within belgrade neighbouring peak
 even bottom waters lave
 bulgar fronts armies seek
 wateringplace intermediate save
 bridge across rapid stream greek
 would fling bulgar would defend wave
 thither came rogero engaged
 beheld hosts fight hotly raged

 lxxxi
 greeks affray four one
 pontoons bridge stream supplied
 bold semblance host put
 crossing river's side
 leo meanwhile river gone
 covert guile took circuit wide
 thither made return bridges placed
 bank bank past stream haste

 lxxxii
 many horse foot battle dight
 nothing twenty thousand rank
 along river rode grecian knight
 fiercely charged enemies flank
 emperor son appeared sight
 leading squadrons farther bank
 uniting bridge bark together crost
 upon part stream host

 lxxxiii
 king vatran chief bulgarian band
 wise bold withal warrior
 laboured vain onset withstand
 disorder host repair
 leo prest sore strong hand
 king earth beneath courser bare
 prince's hest fierce
 yield thousand faulchions pierce

 lxxxiv
 bulgar host hath hitherto made head
 see sovereign laid low
 everywhere tempest wax spread
 turn backs erst faced foe
 child mid greeks fled
 borne along beheld overthrow
 bowned battle restore
 hating constantine leo

 lxxxv
 spurs frontino career

 c

 cii

 civ

 cv

 loud voice proud accent "i

 deserv'st honour board

 cvi
 "albeit thy felony plain clear
 thou christened canst disavow
 nathless make yet plain appear

 canst find knight combat thee
 accept  one enow 
 four nay six accept maintain
 words listed plain"

 cvii

 uprose appeal thus replied
  alone  every one

 cviii

 cix

 cx
 marphisa bradamant corslet case
 breast clothe gear
 astolpho led horse noble race
 sir dudon held stirrup far near
 rinaldo namus made mob give place
 assisted marquis olivier
 crowded lists drive speed
 evermore kept order need

 cxi
 palefaced dames damsels troop guise
 pigeons round lists timid show
 homeward bound fruitful field rise
 scared widesweeping winds loudly blow
 mid flash clap sable skies
 threat hail rain harvest's waste woe
 timid troop rogero fear
 ill matched deem fierce cavalier

 cxii
 deemed rabble
 bold cavalier barons thought
 yet memory lost
 paynim paris wrought
 singly fire sword warrior tost
 much fair town ruin brought
 whose signs remained yet long remain
 ever greater havoc plagued reign

 cxiii
 bradamant's heart others' beat
 deemed saracen might
 valour heartcore hath seat
 prowess youthful knight
 oft gives success martial feat
 paynim better right
 yet cannot ill misgivings quell
 upon love fear sits well

 cxiv
 oh fear willingly
 battle rogero would done
 lifeless listed field lie
 surer sure  fight ulien's son
 one death would consent die
 withal could suffer one
 rather unhappy strife
 would see cherished consort risk life

 cxv
 prayer availed damsel's part
 make rogero leave quest
 mournful face beating heart
 stood view pair fight addrest
 right left peer paynim start
 run lance rest
 spears seem ice shivers fly
 fragments birds mount middle sky

 cxvi
 rodomont's lance smote career
 upon midshield yet harmed little
 perfect famous hector's iron gear
 hardened vulcan's hand safe blow
 well shield levelled spear
 rogero guides good buckler  though
 well steeled within bone
 nigh palm thickness  pierces clean

 cxvii
  lance resists fierce shock
 first assault splinters fly
 bits fragments shivered stock
 seem fledged feathers ascend high
 arms hewn adamantine rock
 spear would pierce paynim's panoply
 end battle breaks withal
 croups staggering coursers fall

 cxviii
 bridle spur martial pair
 raise proud horses nimbly ground
 broke spears faulchions bare
 return bandy fierce cruel wound
 wheeling wondrous mastery
 bold ready coursers round
 warriors biting swords begin
 try either's armour thin

 cxix
 rodomont hard dragonhide
 heretofore cased warrior's breast
 nimrod's trenchant sword side
 accustomed helm temples prest
 bridge spanned narrow tide
 loser dordona's lady vest
 arms suspended votive stone
 left meseems erewhile shown

 cxx
 clad king goodly mail
 yet like first panoply secure
 neither harder scale
 could balisarda's deadly dint endure
 neither workmanship avail
 enchantment temper prime steel pure
 rogero plied sword
 paynim's armour bored

 cxxi
 rodomont beholds fierce close
 widely crimsoned arms restrain
 greater portion griding blows
 biting quick plate chain
 fury rage o'erflows
 mid winter tempestrous main
 flings shield hands outright
 lays rogero's helm might

 cxxii
 excessive force wherewith gin
 erected two barges upon po
 raised men wheels deafening din
 descends upon sharpened piles
 might smote paladin
 either hand never direr blow
 charmed helmet helped  force 
 stroke would divided man horse

 cxxiii
 fall youthful lord
 twice nodded opening legs arms anew
 rodomont smote would afford
 foe time spirits renew
 threatened stroke fine sword
 bore hammering shivers flew
 bold saracen bereft brand
 combat left unarmed hand

 cxxiv
 doth rodomont refrain
 swoops upon child unheeding aught
 sore astounded rogero's brain
 wholly overclouded thought
 paynim well awakes
 neck strong arm caught
 gripes grapples mighty force
 falls earth pulled headlong horse

 cxxv
 yet leaps earth nimbly moved spleen
 far less shame gentle bride
 turned eyes fair face serene
 troubled disdainful warrior spied
 sore doubt champion's fall seen
 well nigh sight lady died
 rogero quickly revenge affront
 clutches sword faces rodomont

 cxxvi
 rogero rode rude shock
 shunned warily retiring ground
 past paynim's bridle took
 left turned courser round
 right rider struck
 belly flank breast would wound
 twice sore anguish felt monarch gored
 flank thigh good rogero's sword

 cxxvii
 rodomont grasping still close fight
 hilt pommel broken blade
 layed rogero's helmet might
 another stroke might dismaid
 good rogero win right
 seizing arm king rudely swayed
 bringing left better hand speed
 pulled paynim steed

 cxxviii
 force skill fell moorish lord
 stood match rather ought say
 fell feet rogero's sword
 gave 'twas deemed advantage fray
 rogero stands aloof wary ward
 fain keep paynim king bay
 wise champion let wight
 talk bulky close fight

 cxxix
 rogero flank thigh dyed red beheld
 wounds hoped would failed
 little little welled
 finally prevailed
 hilt pommel fist yet held
 paynim might scaled
 young rogero smote sore
 stripling never stunned

 cxxx
 helmetcheek shoulderbone
 child smit left sore astound
 tripping still staggering fro
 scarce kept falling ground
 rodomont fain would close upon foe
 foot fails weakened wound
 pierced thigh overtasked might
 kneepan fell paynim knight

 cxxxi
 rogero lost time fierce blows
 smote face bosom brand
 hammered held saracen close
 ground bore champion hand
 stirred rose
 gripes rogero fast locked stand
 seconding huge vigour address
 circle one another shake press

 cxxxii
 wounded thigh gaping flank sore
 weakened vigour moorish king
 rogero address mickle lore
 greatly practised wrestlers' ring
 marked vantage strife forbore
 saw blood freely spring
 wounded warrior prest
 paynim feet arms breast

 cxxxiii
 rodomont filled spite rage foe
 takes neck shoulders bends
 towards pushes
 raises earth chest suspends
 whirls grapples throw
 stripling sorely strife contends
 collected rogero wrought
 keep vantage taxing strength thought

 cxxxiv
 shifting oft hold moor
 arms good bold rogero wound
 left flank shoved breast sore
 strained strength engirdled round
 past better leg
 rodomont's knees pushed ground
 uplifted high air moorish lord
 hurled head foremost sward

 cxxxv
 shock wherewith king rodomont
 battered head spine champion smote
 issuing wounds font
 streams red blood crimsoned herbage float
 rogero holding fortune front
 lest rise one hand griped throat
 one dagger eyes addrest
 knees paynim's belly prest

 cxxvi
 sometimes work golden vein
 within pannonian iberian cave
 unexpected ruin whelm train
 impious avarice condemned slave
 load lie opprest pain
 passage prisoned spirit
 less opprest doughty paynim lay
 pinned ground disastrous fray

 cxxxvii
 rogero vizor doth present
 naked poniard's point threatening cry
 slay save yields content
 let live grace apply
 rodomont rather shent
 least deed shame preferred die
 writhed struggled vigour tried
 pull rogero nought replied

 cxxxviii
 mastiff deerhound lies
 fixed gullet fast holding bite
 sorely bestirs vainly tries
 lips besmeared foam eyes alight
 cannot beneath conqueror rise
 foils foe force despite
 vainly strives monarch argier
 rise underneath cavalier

 cxxxix
 yet rodomont twists strives gains
 freedom better arm anew
 right hand poniard strains
 drawn deadly dagger
 would wound rogero underneath reins
 wary youth error knew
 might died delay
 impious saracen forthwith slay

 cxl
 smiting twice thrice horrid front
 raising high could raise air
 dagger buried rodomont
 freed withal care
 loosed icy corse font
 fetid acheron hell's foul repair
 indignant spirit fled blaspheming loud
 erewhile earth haughty proud
